story:
Campaign closed and funds used!

An alpha build has been sent to contributors.




--
We are asking for funding contributions towards some early research & development for our next game. Indiegogo doesn't really have an "open-amount" funding campaign-type, so we're requesting up to $4000 (which is the amount required to pay for new assets at the current rate we're working). Any amount will make this next stage easier and even half is a significant help. We're still figuring ourselves out and this game may be delayed until our direction is clear. In the meantime, and until we work things out, here's:

 

 

Why Vapor?


Early  Map of Priory Street


Nikki Concept

Annette Concept - with accordion Speed Painting Video!

 


Jessie's Flat

 


The Farbank Gazette Entrance

 

 Early Logo and Dining Room

story:
== To test our demo application ==

The game is a multiplayer game that you can run simultaneously on Firefox, Chrome, iPhone or even Android.

On a desktop, point your (Firefox 10 for now) to http://www.bourdeau.pro/ and press the h key to begin.

On a mobile device (iOS, Android for now), connect to http://www.bourdeau.pro/mobile.html


Note: on a mobile device it is recommended to use it over wifi to reduce the latencies.


== The idea ==


Are you tired of playing multiplayer games with people you'll never see? Our project's goal is to bring together in one place (but not limited to) all players on a single or multi-head display.

Set it up on your home TV, in a public place like a store or a bar to get the most fun out of the game!


The only requirement is a web-connected display to show the game! But nowadays everything is connected right?


== Behind the scene ==


This is a pure HTML5 game that runs on any modern web browser and remotely on all web capable smartphones, without the need of Flash or any addon. The server side is made in .NET and runs on any Windows server.


== Future ==


We need funds to:

- finish the current game by improving the front and backend.

- create other multiplayer games on the same platform, Bomberman like, Pacman like,...

story:
What is nJoy

Would you like to have a mobile app where you can create an adventure, then have your friends join you? Or how about an app, when you visit a new city, can lead you on an journey to find and explore the 10 best coffee shops, places to eat or visit? Imagine an app that can do all that –  and allow you to set up fun competition for points, awards and more with your friends through your favorite social networks. This is the world of nJoy.

nJoy was originally conceived as an educational scavenger hunt app where teachers could create a hunt for students. The idea was, let's suppose the class was studying trees. The teacher would create a hunt with the type of trees that the student should find. The teacher could choose to either indicate where the trees are located or leave it to the students to find them independently. The teacher could insert a picture of the each tree so the students would know what to look for, or possibly even give them the geo-coordinates of the trees for which they would be searching.

It didn’t take us long to realize this app would not only be great for educators, but almost anyone could use this app to create their own adventures and share them with their friends.

What Makes nJoy Different

nJoy is different from other scavenger hunt apps. Not only can you create a hunt, but you can add points, awards, or prizes. You can choose to have an open hunt, where it is just a matter of finding the items, or a structured hunt where you need to find the location, or a hint, before you receive the next location. Here is a short list of some of the features we feel will make nJoy the app of choice.

  • You can design multiple types and structures of hunts
  • You can assign points, awards, badges etc. 
  • Share your hunts through you favorite social networks, with anyone or make them invitation only with your friends 
  • Play collaboratively or competitively, alone or in teams
  • Share your hunts –  for others to download and play with their friends
  • Download special hunts that lead you to adventures in new cities, parks, museums, and other popular attractions.

The Vision for nJoy

We see an app that is used to explore the physical world in a fun and social adventure. Here are a few examples of how we see nJoy being used and enjoyed.

Scenario 1: Tom  I’m Tom and I’m creating a hunt for my cousin Gregg’s birthday party. He and his friends are big into sports memorabilia so I’m creating a hunt for them to visit the 10 top memorabilia spots in our city of St. Louis. I’ve programmed in the sequence of places I want them to visit. They get a clue, and off they go. Once they find the spot programmed, the app will tell them what they need to find and take a picture of, then give them the next clue for the next spot. It’s set up in teams so I expect 2 to 3 people per team going out and competing. It all ends at one of our favorite sport bars where we can share our pics and stories of the hunt – and oh yeah celebrate Gregg’s birthday.

Scenario 2: Stacie  I’m a teacher for 7th grade science and we have a field trip coming up to the Museum of Natural Science. I’ve put together a hunt for my students so that as they go through the museum they will have to find certain exhibits. When they find the exhibit, they will get special information that I’ve added about the exhibits for them. There are certain items I want them to take pictures of, and then we are going to use these in the classroom the next day. A friend of mine Lea is really into museums and she wants to use the hunt next time she goes just to have an added experience. I’m pretty sure Lea and my students are going to have a lot of fun with this hunt.

Scenario 3: Mike & Sheryl  A small group of us are heading out to bike through the Sonoma Valley. We noticed in our nJoy app a downloadable hunt for the Best 15 Kept Secrets of the Sonoma Valley. So we’re going to download it and use the hunt as our way creating our route. The six of us going, think this will be very exciting. The description says it includes eateries, wineries and secluded spots for picnicking. Best yet it was made by another bicyclist who mentions that it doesn’t backtrack. We are all really looking forward to this trip – Last one to the next spot picks up the tab.

Meet Our Team

Jeff Kurtz, Instructional Design Program Manager at Dreem Digital. Jeff has a passion for the use of mobile technology in the classroom as a tool for engaging students in an authentic learning environment. He believes the teacher is the key contributor to making mobile technology the most effective. He received his Master’s Degree at Willamette University’s Graduate School of Education in Teaching, authorized in Early Childhood, Elementary, and ESOL. Mr. Kurtz has worked with children for over 18 years and has been teaching in the classroom for 2 years. As an ELD teacher at Boones Ferry Primary School, in Wilsonville, Oregon, he has been innovative in using iPads and sound pedagogy with his K-5 students.  Jeff provides a hands-on experience with mobile technology focused on helping teachers engage students and enhance the effect of instruction. Jeff is the father of three boys with a background in youth programming, music, art, and drama. 

Laura Levin is an Instructional Design Program Manager with Dreem Digital. She brings with her over 8 years of graphic design experience in education settings. She brings with her a number of different languages that she can work in and has experience working with collegiate websites and learning management systems. She received her B.F.A. from Colorado State University and a Web designer Certificate from the Pittsburgh Art Institute.

John Marr has been developing software for over 20 years. In addition to programming he is experienced in graphic design, creating both illustration and digital artwork. John has managed the development of more than 50 apps placed in the iTunes Store and these apps have had accumulated millions of downloads. Some of his apps have been featured on the front page of the Apple App Store worldwide. Seven of his apps are in the top 10 of Free Music Downloads in 34 countries and commanding 18 of the top 20 spots in China.

What Will We Do With Your Contributions

Your contributions will be going directly to building nJoy. We will be paying information architects, instructional designers, graphic artists, and programmers. We also are working on some great in-app content and a small portion will be spent on obtaining this content. The more we raise, the more features we can program at launch and beyond. 

Contributing

We appreciate any person who wants to contribute any amount to this project. We would like to point a few items on the rewards. Each Founder Level will have a unique Gamer's Badge that will be awared to that individual's account. These badges will only be available for the founders through this campaign, and you earn social bragging rights since your badges will be available to be seen in your nJoy public profile and your name will be included in the credits.

Another great feature starts at the Gold Level Founder ($75). At this level and above you are invited to create and name a hunt that will be included in the app. If you really want to be part of shaping the app we have ten (10) spots available that will get you invited to a prodcution team meeting where you will have a chance to provide your input towards the completed game.

Why Support This App

nJoy started as a basic educational app with a few functions. At the same time we were looking for a way to offset some of the programming costs because our goal was (and still is) to provide this to classrooms for free as a learning resource. We started to realize that the concept had merit well beyond the classroom,  and to make the app really unique and fun, the feature list and the cost to produce this app increased. One of our staff suggested crowdfunding and the two ideas merged. Let's create a killer app out of the box versus a basic educational app, and to fund it, energize a community interested in this app becoming a reality for gaming and education.

We believe this app is one that you will be proud to be a part of creating and that it will add to fun and excitement of many lives. We would ask yu to please consider contributing to this project which will help many school children learn and can be enjoyed by almost anyone who want to explore their world. Please consider liking our project and telling all of your friends whether you contribute or not.

Thank you for considering us. We need your help to share this with the world, and we believe this is an app worth sharing.

story:
I'm excited to show you a game I've been working on called "Gods of Fantasy". This project represents phase one of my effort to publish a card game.
 
"Gods of Fantasy" is a card game that puts you in control of fantasy creatures. You act like a God and you lead a tactical fight. Each player plays cards from their own hand. You can have Creature and Items cards. The Adventure cards are drawn from a central draw pile. 
The game is simple enough that it can be learned and played in a short time, and the battles are different each time you play a new game. This is a game for 2-4 players and pairs. You can play "Gods of Fantasy" on your own, but you will lose much of the surprises. Experienced players should be able to finish one game in 30 minutes.

To win, you must be the only one that has one or more cards in your hand.

The goal of my project is to raise the funds necessary to pay art work and produce the initial print run of "Gods of Fantasy". I will also set up a professional website.
 
I really want this project to succeed – I am not interested in profit.




The deck of cards contain 72 cards. Each deck represents the unique creatures, items and adventure cards. The cards are well-balanced and competitive straight out of the box. This guarantees that you will have a satisfyingly unique game experience every time.

Each copy includes:
 
1. 72 card deck designed by professional artists
a) 24 creature cards
b) 12 item cards
c) 16 adventure cards
d) 2 bonus cards
e) 18 manual cards - full color with rules and lots of examples of play
 
Setup
 
This game can be played in following setups and modes:
1. 2 players (classic 1 vs. 1)
2. 3 players (single-attack and multi-attack mode)
3. 4 players (single-attack and multi-attack mode)
4. 2 vs. 2 (playing in pairs)

Turn overview
 
Each turn has three phases (A, B and C) in the order shown:
A. Deploy phase - deploying the Creature and Item cards
B. Adventure phase - resolving the Adventure card
C. Clean-up phase - cleaning up
After the players complete all three phases, one turn ends.

To win, you must be the only one that has one or more cards in your hand.

There is only one deck and that's it! You don't have to buy special cards to make better decks!

Download unoffical manual here:
http://www.croweb.net/gof/GOF-manual_v0.57.doc



In addition to a minimum project threshold, I hope to reach more. The more funds I raise - the higher the quality product I can produce for everyone. If we over-fund, at certain levels, new bonuses would be achieved. I am using this campaign to fund the printing and publishing of the card deck and accessories, as well as the printing and shipping costs of the other items produced as reward incentives. With enough money, we can afford a larger print run at a cheaper cost per unit.

 




1. All card frames: creatures, items, adventures
2. All card backs
3. Logo design - several designs
4. Tuck box design for cards
5. Play testing
6. Preparation for printing




1. Pay artwork - there are 54 cards and 54 illustrations. One illustration costs $200-400.
2. PDF manual and hard copy manual
3. Production samples
4. First print run
5. Pay for a professional website design
 
 



I'm very confident that this game is both interesting and appealing. Why is that? Because of a game mechanics, 30-40 people that tested this game on numerous occasions were thrilled. After hundreds of matches we found out that this game is very well balanced and gives great pleasure. There is no winning tactics and luck is not so important. It takes 10 minutes to read a manual and start playing. After 4-5 matches, you can forget about manual.
 
After 5 prototypes I finally decided to come here and ask for a help. I found out that card game production is expensive. A successful project is a great way to start a production, pay for illustrations and send first copies to all the backers. Your support as a backer would be greatly appreciated.

Let's do this together!

story:
What is SUN2020?

Something new. A revolution.

SUN2020 will change the game market upside down for being the first real multi platform game on the market. It will be the pioneer in its class.
Playable whenever and wherever you want.
You get a MMORPG that is truly made for mobile phones, tablets, computers, consoles and even for your television.
The game experience will stay the same.


Where are we now?

At this point we have produced about 40% of the basic world. That includes more than 1.000.000 various outfit combinations, over 100 different locations and shops, various different characters and a defined storyline. We´ve spend about 35.000€ of our own money in the past 2 years, cause we believe that SUN2020 will be a great success and that people will follow our passion for it.


Why are we crowdfunding SUN2020?

Its not about quality, its about time. With a larger team SUN2020 becomes faster than you can imagine. We will be able to get more features in every version.  With your help the world of SUN2020 will become a living world accessible in many different languages with huge storylines implemented, dynamic events and more massive battles.
Help us to make this vision come true and be part of it.


We think ...

“Making a real multi platform game is difficult, but not impossible. We will prove that.” Mathias

“Travelling a lot means to be dependent on your available device and connection quality. Playing our game will be possible everywhere.” Robert

“In my childhood games have been fun and innovative, today I feel lost, flooded by commercialized sequels and copies. SUN2020 will make a change.” Maya

”Everybody can pay to win. In SUN2020 your credit card will not help you. Only your decisions and skills matter.” Frederic

We are a group of ambitious and passionate artists, engineers, designers and programmers.


You get the full experience regardless of your device.

  • All operating systems: Windows, Mac and Linux
  • All desktop browsers: Firefox, Internet Explorer, Safari, Google Chrome, Opera
  • All mobile devices: Firefox mobile, Internet Explorer mobile, Safari mobile, Google Chrome mobile, Opera mobile
  • Low data traffic thanks to REST API

  • Apps - Windows Phone / Android / iOS / Facebook

  • Game Consoles - Xbox 360 / Xbox ONE / Playstation 3 / Playstation 4 / WII U

You can play SUN2020 whenever and wherever you want - the game adapts to your needs. Play at home on your computer, outside on your smartphone, in transit, on a break and with friends.

How is this possible?

Our game is based on multiple REST API’s. This is the state of the art of web apps and websites.
We use this technology and our experience in crafting websites to make it possible to create a real multi platform game.
A non relational database in a cloud computing environment gives us the required performance and freedom to realize such an innovative project.
Our team provides more than 10 years experience in developing high performance websites. During the last years we worked on several international projects.

Game Scenario of our Sci-Fi MMORPG

The scenario is a mix of science fiction and post apocalyptic disaster. The game is derived on recent scientific accomplishments. You are a citizen trying to survive in a world which is permanently changing, depending on the choices you make. Every player can change the world drastically. Your choices decide about the metropolis Welkins rise or fall. Explore districts, investigate mysteries and comb freely through every single building. Not a single day will be like the other.

Welkin

Story Impressions

"Slightly dizzy, Caleb opened his eyes. The heart throbbed and the world around him shimmered a little cloudy. His gaze was directed towards the window watching the golden glance of the evening sun passing by. The digital clock was standing cold next to it. The last thing he remembered was the clock radiating the time into the room, which Caleb avowedly did not know anymore. Now it stopped working. He had survived! Whatever it was, Caleb had survived! The next moment he noticed a robot at the door from the corner of his eye. As the rear lights of an electric car at night, the two red eyes wandered hastily out the door. Caleb felt weak and realized that this must have been mere imagination, as the eyes of the Robot have been red instead of blue. For a moment he sat there quiet..."

Personal Customization

With over 1.000.000 various outfit combinations you have the possibility to create your very own individual character, buy estates, rent an apartment and join a company. You can buy these features with real world money.

Pay to Win

Regardless of how much money you spend, it won't make you faster, stronger or better than any other gamer. Every purchase is optional. You will have the full gaming experience of SUN2020 without spending any money - no "Pay to Win"

RMS - Real money stores

As a player

In our city you will find RMS. These stores are fully integrated in our gaming world. This means you have to visit a RMS to spend real money. Each store sells specific features/clothes. If you want to have your favourite item, a journey to the right store is necessary.

As a backer

You get the chance to own a RMS. Choose your preferred interiors and place your real world advertisements. Due to our game mechanics the players are forced to visit your shop.


PvP

PvP is an important aspect of SUN2020. You have the chance to win a league or a tournament, no matter how long you have been a citizen in Welkin.

SUN2020 will provide official leagues and tournaments. Here you can show your skills and rise to the top of the leagues. The rewards will increase your reputation compared to other gamers.

Furthermore you can create your own PvP challenges.


Dynamic Environment

The urban scenario is divided into rings. Each ring has a diameter of 2 kilometers and by default each additional ring increases the living area. Each ring consists of 4 districts and all have their own construction style. The whole metropolis is linked through the U-Line. The world can change drastically, through random activated events, which all are twisted and intertwined. On one day whole districts can fall victim to destruction or prosper depending on each player's decisions.

Everything you do has consequences.

Special Events

In addition to the daily struggle for survival, unique special events occur. Epic challenges with multiple stages and game changing consequences.

Joining forces will be essential for survival.

Every special event is nonrecurrent. You get only one chance to take part.

Epic Boss

Permanent Death

The most noticeable feature about SUN2020 is that an in-game death is permanent. If you die in Welkin your account will be lost and there is no way to regain access to it. Be aware that failing in normal fights and normal events will not kill you. You have to be in dangerous locations and/or take part in special events to actually die.

Be aware that your death is permanent.

  • All operating systems: Windows, Mac and Linux
  • All desktop browsers: Firefox, Internet Explorer, Safari, Google Chrome, Opera
  • All mobile devices: Firefox mobile, Internet Explorer mobile, Safari mobile, Google Chrome mobile, Opera mobile
  • SUN2020 will provide official leagues and tournaments. Here you can show your skills and rise to the top of the leagues. The rewards will increase your reputation compared to other gamers.

  • 2 Rings; each ring has a diameter of 2 km and will offer a massive play ground and living space

  • We will work on a translation into German, Spanish, Chinese and Japanese - everyone playing in the same world - this will increase the fun and variety of the game

  • Apps - Windows Phone / Android / iOS / Facebook

story_txt:
What is SUN2020?
Something new. A revolution.
SUN2020 will change the game market upside down for being the
first real multi platform game on the market. It will be the pioneer in its
class. 
Playable whenever and wherever you want. 
You get a MMORPG that is truly
made for mobile phones, tablets, computers, consoles and even for your television.
The game experience will stay the same.

Where are we now?At this point we have produced about 40% of the basic world. That includes more than 1.000.000 various outfit combinations, over 100 different locations and shops, various different characters and a defined storyline. We´ve spend about 35.000€ of our own money in the past 2
years, cause we believe that SUN2020 will be a great success and that people will follow our passion for it.Why are we crowdfunding SUN2020?

Its not about quality, its about time. With a larger
team SUN2020 becomes faster than you can imagine. We will be able to get more
features in every version. 
With your help the world of SUN2020 will become a living world accessible in
many different languages with huge storylines implemented, dynamic events and more massive battles.
Help us to make this vision come true and be part of it.
We think ...
“Making a real multi platform game is difficult, but not impossible. We will prove that.” Mathias
“Travelling a lot means to be dependent on your available 
device and connection quality. Playing our game will be possible 
everywhere.” Robert“In my childhood games have been fun 
and innovative, today I feel lost, flooded by commercialized sequels and
 copies. SUN2020 will make a change.” Maya”Everybody can pay to win. In SUN2020 your credit card will not help you. Only your decisions and skills matter.” FredericWe are a group of ambitious and passionate artists, engineers, designers and programmers.You get the full experience regardless of your device.
Devices

All operating systems: Windows, Mac and Linux

All desktop browsers: Firefox, Internet Explorer, Safari, Google Chrome, Opera

All mobile devices: Firefox mobile, Internet Explorer mobile, Safari mobile, Google Chrome mobile, Opera mobile

Low data traffic thanks to REST API


Apps - Windows Phone / Android / iOS / Facebook

Game Consoles - Xbox 360 / Xbox ONE / Playstation 3 / Playstation 4 / WII U
You can play SUN2020 whenever and wherever you want - the game 
adapts to your needs. Play at home on your computer, outside on your 
smartphone, in transit, on a break and with friends.





Art Style Preview
How is this possible?
Our game is based on multiple REST API’s. This is the state of the art of web apps and websites.We use this technology and our experience in crafting websites to make it possible to create a real multi platform game.A non relational database in a cloud computing environment gives us the required performance and freedom to realize such an innovative project.Our
 team provides more than 10 years experience in developing high 
performance websites. During the last years we worked on several 
international projects.
Game Scenario of our Sci-Fi MMORPG
The
 scenario is a mix of science fiction and post apocalyptic disaster. The
 game is derived on recent scientific accomplishments. You are a citizen
 trying to survive in a world which is permanently changing, depending 
on the choices you make. Every player can change the world drastically. 
Your choices decide about the metropolis Welkins rise or fall. Explore 
districts, investigate mysteries and comb freely through every single 
building. Not a single day will be like the other.



Welkin



Story Impressions
"Slightly dizzy, Caleb opened his 
eyes. The heart throbbed and the world around him shimmered a little 
cloudy. His gaze was directed towards the window watching the golden 
glance of the evening sun passing by. The digital clock was standing 
cold next to it. The last thing he remembered was the clock radiating 
the time into the room, which Caleb avowedly did not know anymore. Now 
it stopped working. He had survived! Whatever it was, Caleb had 
survived! The next moment he noticed a robot at the door from the corner
 of his eye. As the rear lights of an electric car at night, the two red
 eyes wandered hastily out the door. Caleb felt weak and realized that 
this must have been mere imagination, as the eyes of the Robot have been
 red instead of blue. For a moment he sat there quiet..."

story:
Paranormal Fighters es un juego de peleas protagonizado por monstruos miticos  de Costa Rica y de la cultura latinoamericana para android

Paranormal Fighters is a fighting game style. Starring mythical monsters of Costa Rica and the Latin American culture. for android




Features:

  • Educacional: Basados en mitos y leyendas "reales" de Mesoamerica.
  • Juego divertido completamente original.
  • graficos fotorealista.
  • 10 diferentes monstruos

  • Educational: Based (this time) on myths and legends of Latin America.
  • Fun game play.
  • Photorealistic graphics.
  • Original art.
  • 10 diferent monsters.


History;

1625

Antiguo pueblo de Aserri;

La bruja Zarate a entrado en Crisis, el hombre que amaba le a roto el corazon y ella en venganza a lanzado una hechizo sobre el pueblo de aserri, convirtiendo a todos sus habitantes en animales.

Esta mala accion no ha sido vista con buenos ojos por el poderosisimo Dios Sibu, que como castigo a arrebatado la mayoria de los poderes de la hechicera; depositandolos en una pequeña esfera. Y para contener la maldición a creado una inmensa roca donde antes estaba el pueblo.

Viendo la desgracia de zarate fuerzas oscuras comenzaron a manifestarse y a tomar formas fisicas. Antiguos enemigos que fueron exorcizados vuelven por venganza…

Pero Sibu es bueno y no dejara a una de sus hijas desprotegida, espiritus benignos tambien han sido convocados.

1625

old aserri

The Zarate  witch have the broken heart, the man she loved has cheated.

and her in vengeance bewitched  to all the people, turning everyone into animals

This bad action has not been viewed favorably by Sibu a powerful God, who as punishment caught most of the powers of the sorceress, depositing them in a small ball. 

And to contain the curse created a huge rock on the town of old aserri.

Seeing the misfortune of zarate, dark forces begin to manifest and take physical forms. Old enemies return for revenge.....


Characters

Segua: es el espiritu de una mujer  que utilizaba su belleza para aprovecharse de los hombres: solo una vez se enamoro y el hombre la engaño. Ella en venganza vendio su alma al diablo y se convertio en un horrible mostruo que desprecia a todos los hombres.

Segua: the spirit of a woman who used her beauty to take advantage of men only once fell in love and she lover cheated. She revenge sold his soul to the devil and transform in a horrible monster who despises all men.


Padre sin cabeza: un sacerdote ajusticiado por la inquisicion.

Father headless: a priest executed by the Inquisition.




Tule vieja: una horrible  bruja que usa un gran sombrero y tiene apariencia de arpia

.a horrible witch who wears a large hat and looks like a harpy.


chupacabras: un hibrido extraterrestre que se alimenta de sangre

an alien hybrid that feeds on blood



Oso-caballo animal magico que protege el ambiente.

  magic animal  that protects the environment.



Espantajo azul: Alma descarnada cubierta por las llamas azules del infierno

 naked soul  covered by blue flames of hell


Cadejo: espirito protector que se manifiesta en forma de perro negro.

protective spirit that manifests as a black dog.



La llorona: espiritu en pena de una mujer que asesino a su propio hijo

spirit of a whomen who killed her son.


El viejo del monte: protector del ambiente creatura de caracteristicas simiescas como un pie grande.

Environment protector like ape  creature.



La Mona: Monstruo femenino parecido a un simio.

 Female monster like a ape.

story:
Our Story

Blackwyrm Books And Games is a publisher of experimental fiction and quality roleplaying games. In conjunction with Hero Games' release of the Star Hero 6th Edition roleplaying game at GenCon 2011, we are attempting to simultaneously release seven science fiction settings that can be played using the Star Hero rules.  

 

We're calling this entire undertaking Project WyrmStar. 


The Impact

Hero Games isn't planning on releasing any settings for Star Hero: only the core rulebook and some equipment books. We are hoping to "fill the gap" that leaves by releasing unique and interesting setting books that can be used to play the game immediately, rather than forcing Game Masters to take the time to create their own setting. 

 

Posthegemony: Terra Nomenklatura for HERO System 6th Edition is one of these settings. 

What We Need & What You Get

Posthegemony: Terra Nomenklatura (by Jason Walters) is a unique science fiction setting designed to evoke the mood of films such as Logan’s Run, The Island, and Idiocracy. Using a decision chart and guided by the game master, the players construct a spaceship and escape from the Posthegemony, a futuristic worldwide society loosely based on Chinese utopian ideals.


Interpersonal relationships and collective storytelling play a large part in Posthegemony. The player characters (known as “Interesting Persons”) must describe how they meet one another, how they acquire and assemble the parts of their spacecraft, and how they protect one another from “ReEducation” while they do it. They can also “fill in the blanks” of Posthegemony society as they see fit, describing where their characters live, what their particular city is like, and how the peculiar psychological problems inherent in urban living have effected them.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell other gamers about Blackwyrm and Project WyrmStar!

story:
Short Summary

I want to make games for the future. Using the Oculus Rift I plan to do that. I am goign to make "Peripheral Darkness" no matter what. This campaign will just help me to speed up the process. 

What We Need & What You Get

If i get the money I can start working on the compatibility with the Oculus Rift:

  • I only needed $350 for the headset. I have all the other things I need.
  • Any extra Money goes to a new computer and the pro version of Unity - Unity is the program the game is being built in.
  • If I don't reach the entire goal I will still be doing this project.

The Impact

This will make a huge impact on me:

  • Having this will help me to move forwarded in game development.

story:
It has been my belief for months now that Android deserves to have a high-quality real time strategy game. Touch screens seem like the ideal way to control a strategy game, so how come no one has done it yet? Well, with Vanir's Vengeance I aim to strike the ultimate balance between mobility and a full hardcore gaming experience to bring the RTS genre to life in your palms!


Vanir's Vengeance will feature three incredible game modes:

  • A Challenge mode
  • A Campaign mode
  • An Online mode

The Challenge Mode

The challenge mode was cleverly designed to hone your skills for campaign and online play through a series of progressively more difficult situations. 

Campaign Mode

Campaign will allow you to play through the epic story and watch as the Vanir expand into a planet inhabited by hostile alien creatures; and as the King of Vanir loses his son in the push for control over this planet.


Online Play!

The Vanir

  • Capture the scrapyards to secure income and produce more units!
  • Conquer your opponents in intense real-time strategical combat!
  • Cast awesome and original spells and abilities!

The Aesir

  • Devour your opponents to steal their life and spawn more Aesir!
  • Destroy the scrapyards to deny your opponents source of income!
  • Defend your homeland and cast the Vanir back to the skies!

How Can You Help?

So why do I need your help? Well, if you choose to donate, your money will be used in one of the following  areas:

  • Graphics! More units, prettier landscapes and a WAY better overall experience. This is definitely an area of priority for me.
  • Game Components! Writing a server isn't easy or cheap, but it can be done with a little help :)
  • A KILLER Online Mode! An online game can't be successful without YOU! You are the most preeminent element of my game!

How Does My Budget Look?

$1500 - Models and Graphics!

  • I need 4 more Aesir units (Aliens) which should cost $400
  • I need 5 more Vanir units which should cost $500
  • I need touch feedback graphics (arrows that show where you ordered units) - Est. Cost - $50
  • Remaining buttons and logos - $300
  • Scrapyard graphics - Est. Cost - $250

$500 - Servers!

  • The Server software as well as online map elements will total to $500.

$500 +  - REWARDS!

  • Producing and sending the rewards should cost about $500 or slightly more depending on the amount of backers!

What's In it for You?

Expect quality, expect tournaments, expect prizes, expect an author who will listen to your ideas and work with you; this is what I offer you if you want to join in the process of bringing these ideas to life.

Development Process

I thought it would be pretty cool to let you guys see the whole development process, so I decided to keep footage of gameplay throughout the lifetime of this project.

When I first started programming the game, I was using Java and LibGDX. Don't get me wrong, I love LibGDX... but after a month...

Month 1

 It just wasn't cutting it... This wasn't what I had in mind when I was thinking "Awesome mobile RTS!"

I decided to switch to Unity for the purpose of development time and product quality. I was able to achieve in a day what had taken me months in Java.

Month 2

 So I continued to fuss around with graphics, with models, with health bars and with networking. Soon or later I had my first version running on android!

Month 3

At this point in time, I was hooked. I began planning how the final product should be in much greater depth, I began purchasing graphics, I added in a simple combat system.

Month 4

At this point, I felt as though I had the core mechanics that I wanted, but there was just something missing.. So I got some of my friends (Thanks Victor, Greg and Blake for the input!) to test out the game and tell me what they would like to see changed to make the experience more complete. After this, I added new shaders, better lighting, fixed up the combat system and just had a great time watching things look better and better!

Month 5


Unit Bios!

So, at this point maybe you're interested in the units and what their roles are in this incredible story. I've prepared some info for the units seen above to show you!



$2

  • Thanks for Donating $2 :D You get a DRM FREE copy of the game! This means you can install it on as many devices as you like free of charge!

$5

  • Wow! $5! You got both the DRM FREE copy of the game AND I will personally thank you from the deepest places in my heart :)

$25

  • We're making the big bucks now! For your loyalty and support, I will thank you (Yes, from the deepest places in my heart), send you a DRM FREE copy of the game AND I'll even throw in a 2.5In. CUSTOM FIGURINE of the Marine seen in game!

$30

  • Thanks so much for making the jump from $25 to $30. Your kindness will not go unnoticed! You will receive BETA TESTING opportunities where me and you will personally discuss and find the best solutions to issues in the game. Of course, you will also get the figurine, the DRM Free copy of the game and a personal thanks from yours truly.

$50

  • Now we're really talking! If you donate $50, I will send you both a Vanir and an Aesir figurine as well as the latest inside scoop on development, BETA Testing opportunities and of course, the DRM FREE Copy of Vanir's Vengeance. Not only will I personally thank you, I will send a hand written letter to you in gratitude of your support!

Special Thanks!

  • Deandre - The Awesome Video! (deandrejaynes@gmail.com)
  • Scott Pereksta - The Amazing Music! (spereksta@gmail.com)
  • Sean Pereksta - The Insane Story Line and Norse Mythology references (sean.pereksta@gmail.com)
  • Bruce Mortland - Allowing me to take his class time to work on my Kickstarter campaign as well as providing resources and suggestions.
  • Laz - Super Cool Graphics and Amazing Support! (lazcht@gmail.com)
  • Blake Harrington, Gregory Dudley, J. Parker, Andrey R., Tyler James, Adam Theide, OMGTallMonster - Constant Support and Suggestions throughout development

If you would like Music, Story Design, Graphics, etc. feel free to contact the people mentioned above; They're all awesome people :)
story_txt:
It has been my belief for months now that Android deserves to have a high-quality real time strategy game. Touch screens seem like the ideal way to control a strategy game, so how come no one has done it yet? Well, with Vanir's Vengeance I aim to strike the ultimate balance between mobility and a full hardcore gaming experience to bring the RTS genre to life in your palms!Vanir's Vengeance will feature three incredible game modes:
A Challenge mode
A Campaign mode
An Online mode
The Challenge ModeThe challenge mode was cleverly designed to hone your skills for campaign and online play through a series of progressively more difficult situations. Campaign ModeCampaign will allow you to play through the epic story and watch as the Vanir expand into a planet inhabited by hostile alien creatures; and as the King of Vanir loses his son in the push for control over this planet.Online Play!The Vanir

Capture the scrapyards to secure income and produce more units!

Conquer your opponents in intense real-time strategical combat!

Cast awesome and original spells and abilities!
The Aesir

Devour your opponents to steal their life and spawn more Aesir!

Destroy the scrapyards to deny your opponents source of income!

Defend your homeland and cast the Vanir back to the skies!
How Can You Help?So why do I need your help? Well, if you choose to donate, your money will be used in one of the following  areas:

Graphics! More units, prettier landscapes and a WAY better overall experience. This is definitely an area of priority for me.

Game Components! Writing a server isn't easy or cheap, but it can be done with a little help :)

A KILLER Online Mode! An online game can't be successful without YOU! You are the most preeminent element of my game!

This means you can install it on as many devices as you like free of charge!$5Wow! $5! You got both the DRM FREE copy of the game AND I will personally thank you from the deepest places in my heart :)$25We're making the big bucks now! For your loyalty and support, I will thank you (Yes, from the deepest places in my heart), send you a DRM FREE copy of the game AND I'll even throw in a 2.5In. You will receive BETA TESTING opportunities where me and you will personally discuss and find the best solutions to issues in the game. Of course, you will also get the figurine, the DRM Free copy of the game and a personal thanks from yours truly.$50Now we're really talking! If you donate $50, I will send you both a Vanir and an Aesir figurine as well as the latest inside scoop on development, BETA Testing opportunities and of course, the DRM FREE Copy of Vanir's Vengeance. Deandre - The Awesome Video! (deandrejaynes@gmail.com)

Sean Pereksta - The Insane Story Line and Norse Mythology references (sean.pereksta@gmail.com)

story:
About Us: The Studio

GameRocketStudio is a newly established game design studio that focuses on creating mobile Role Playing Games (RPGs). The Studio is currently based in Berkeley, California and was funded by Andrew Hazlett, a software developer with a BFA in computer animation and over 20 years’ experience in software engineering.

We specialize in creating great Classic RPGs in digital format, which will allow users to experience a more dynamic game that can change at any time. GameRocketStudio initiated the development of these digital-format RPGs through creation of a RPG utilities. Our dice calculator for use in playing a wide range of RPGs. From the RPG dice calculator platform we will expand digital-format RPG by creating our own original games.

Products and Platforms: Road Map

Magic Dice - Magic Dice is a simple dice-calculating app used for playing RPG-style games. It is our first product and is in the Apple app store now. This will be the basic platform we will use in developing other RPG-style games. 

Dark Dungeon - Dark Dungeon will be the first RPG game developed based on our dice platform. It will include tools for creating your own dungeon designs. 

Project Neptune - This project will be first original RPG game. At the present time I am not going to reveal much about this project. 

Market and Revenue

GameRocketStudio marketing will focus on Comic-Con expos, and our revenue will be generated by in-app purchases and subscriptions.    

Expos: Wizard World  
Attendees:  216,000 
Shows: 16 

Where Your Money Goes: the Budget


For this campaign, the studio will need US $20,000 to cover initial equipment, travel expenses and expo fees, and labor to attend three Comic-Con shows. A breakdown of expenses is as follows:

Equipment - $1,499.00 (computers, mobile communication systems)
Expo Attendance (three shows) - $15,000 (hotel, flights, food, booth workers)
Staff - $3,501.00 (artists and programmers)
Total - $20,000.00 

Our Future

GameRocketStudio strives to create a rich philosophical environment for the individual to explore. We will accomplish this goal by focusing on the creation of RPG worlds from which and individual can create his or her own stories. The mobile market will be used so people can be more social with one another.


Spread the Word!

We will use social media and store fronts (comic book stores) to build interest and feedback about our products and services. We currently have a Facebook page, twitter feed, and website. 


Facebook: www.facebook.com/gamerocketstudio
Twitter: twitter.com/gamerocketstudi
Website: www.gamerocketstudio.com

story:
Why did we start So Wrong! Studios?

Hi, my name is Lauri, and I am the other co-founder of So Wrong Studios. 3D modeling has always been my passion so I studied Digital Arts and Entertainment and got myself ready to go into the industry. But then I met this amazing girl, whom you just met in the video above. She has a condition called Cerebral Palsy, which got worse in the last few years and that made us move to a warmer climate. But because she didn't want to hold me back from making my dream come true we decided to look for people who have the same passion like me to make games. And we found them. Now we have a good global team with one goal. Make good games. And just like that So Wrong Studios was born. Like this I can work from home, and take care of my girlfriend at the same time. And I hope that you will help us in making our dream come true.

Why do we ask your help?

Until now we have been developing these games in our free time. Since most of us have recently (in the last 2 years) graduated we have been developing these games in student/free versions. But in order to publish we need the professional licenses. 

Next to this, we need to start up this company. According to Portuguese law we need a minimum of 5000 euro in the bank for that. Once this is done, we can use this money to pay for a part of our licenses.

As mentioned before so far we have been working without pay. We would like to reward the team for all hard work and use a part of the money to bring in new people so we could bring out even better quality games.

We would also like to add a lot more to the games we are promoting here, more information on this you will find down under stretch goals.


Development team

Lauri Stenroos - 3D Creative/Art Director

Barry Decaluwe -  Lead Rigger/Animator

Pedro Garrano - Programmer

Wayne De Bock - Programmer

Angela Kathryn Helen Long - 2D Creative Artist

Sergio Suarez - 2D Creative Artist

Kate Van Riel - Our inspiration and mascot 


Games

Our goal is to create fun games for all ages. As a start up we have the freedom of trying out different genres so we can find ourselves and define the company along the way. At this moment our main focus is on our mobile game because it is great for a start up to begin with. We have a lot of good ideas in store for the future, but first we need to focus on the present. Because without the present there is no future.
We started out with an endless runner and an RPG, the genres are far from each other but it gives us the ability to grow and find ourselves. So far we have enjoyed working on both games and we know that we can accomplish more given the opportunity. 

Blub is an endless runner for mobile which is set under water. At first you will guide "Blub" the fish to safety by dodging various kinds of obstacles. The further you play the more dangerous and difficult the waters become.
While you are swim for your life, you also need to be aware of the Sea Stars. Save them from the environment, take them with you on your trip, The Sea Star King has lots of nice things for you that he is willing to give you because you saved his kin.
These go from different player models and different skins to several boosts to make your journey a bit easier from time to time. 
Blub is being developed for Android at the moment and we have plans later on to publish it on iOS as well.


The current version of Blub only shows one kind of an environment though in the future we plan to add multiple kinds of levels with various obstacles and player models. 

The additional levels that we would like to implement would mimic those of what we have in the real world. We want to create some hazardous environments to raise ocean and river welfare by showing what those environments are like in the form of our game. 

This is a list of environments we would like to implement. Both Polluted and and Beautiful environments to show what should be fixed, and how it actually can be.

Ganges River (Pollution)
Maui Coral Reef (Beauty)
Mexico Gulf (Pollution)
Amazon Jungle (Beauty)
North Atlantic Gyre (Pollution)
Lagos Caves (Beauty)
Antarctica (Beauty)


The levels are full of obstacles of various kinds; some are living while others are solid objects. The players’ goal is to reach as far as possible by avoiding these obstacles and gathering Sea Stars and boosts along the way.
So far we have Octopus and swordfish as living obstacle.
You have to try and dodge the grabbing arms of the octopus, or you'll become his lunch. The swordfish likes rigging you on his sword. Don't let him.
We will add a lot more fun living obstacles in here. Depending on the level environment, the obstacles will change accordingly.
For solid object we have the anchor. Depending on how you'll hit it, you'll either die, because lets face it, an anchor would give anyone a headache if you'd hit it full in the head. Or you'll loose health because you got scarred on your side. Over time you will heal and you can become fully healthy again.

We also implemented a fishnet. If you swim in it, the game will be over. But if you hit the sides you might just loose some health. And of course here you can also over time heal up again.

There is also the sunken ship which you have to dodge. 
Just like with the living obstacles, we will add a lot more obstacles under this category and these will change according to the level environment.


Additional player models can be purchased from the in game store with Sea Stars you gather by playing the game. Additional player models will have special abilities that will help you in certain environments while they might make the game more challenging in others.


With your help we would like to add features such as global high scores, missions, achievements and plenty of content to play through. Everything to ensure countless hours of fun!



Purrates is our second game which will be for PC. It is an RPG where you as the player are thrown into a fantasy world where three factions are at conflict with one another in a Caribbean environment. The Imperial pugs and the Purrates have migrated from faraway lands into this new promising world only to find themselves amongst new people, the Mizetecs.

Of course the Mizetecs want to protect what is theirs and they will fight for what is theirs. But they are also open to diplomacy.

At the beginning of the game you will make your unique character from one of the three factions. But depending on what you choose to do in the game you can become friends or enemies with your own and the other factions. Everything is open to what you decide. This is so that when you decide you want to make a new character you will get a full new experience.

With this game we promise you endless amount of fun.

We initially considered Purrates as a mobile game though it has grown as a concept beyond the point of being for mobile. From feedback we've learned that a lot of people would be interested in Purrates though if only it were made for PC. Thus we've changed the game to be made for PC and later on we will develop a smaller mobile game based off the gameplay.


The Purrates are a group of cats that seek the pirate way of life in plundering treasure and living free from chains. While they are not a particularly organized faction they do follow a simple chain of command that ensures the well being of all Purrates.

The Purrates are based on the pirates from the 18th century like we know them from the history books. They are mean and viscious but they have their own rules and code that they live by. They do not look kindly on traitors, but that doesn't mean if you want to side with the Mizetecs because hey a cat living between mice, it's just something you want to do, that you can't. You can do whatever you want! But you'll have to live with the wrath of a cat!


The Imperial Pugs represent law and order in a civilized manner and have migrated from faraway lands into the new promised land to find new knowledge and riches of the world. Leading this expedition is their King himself Charles Wrinkles who by example inspires his nation to greatness.

The Imperial Pugs are based on the 18th century Royal colonies. They would never break rules, but you wouldn't be the first one to turn pirate because you don't like the stiff rules from the Imperium. But know that they'll never stop to hunt you down.


The Mizetecs are the original inhabitants of this region of the world and have been put to the test in preserving their culture of cheese and blood rituals by having to fend off the two occupants. By godly right their high priestess has united the tribes and has taken the lead role in preserving their society.

The mizetecs are based on the 13th century aztec civilization. They don't like outsiders unless it's to sacrifice them. Only that one rare stranger might be able to worm his way in. While most mizetecs prefer to stay within the safety of their city's wall, some are curious and will venture to sea to protect their homeland. Once in a while one might find himself compelled to join a different faction and will from then on be marked for death by its own faction.


You will forge your own story as you progress through out the game. At the beginning you may choose your faction and a character that goes with it. After the short tutorial quest can the player begin their adventure as they see fit!

We plan to add various types of ships. Each ship has different attributes and functionality to ensure different gameplay styles. Some ships will be deemed superior for combat while others are more trade orientated. 


Each faction has its own main story line as well as additional side quests and repeatables. The multitude of quests for each faction ensures that the player would have enough content to play enjoy Purrates for a long time to come! 

Actions such as completing quests, battling and trading can earn you reputation points. The reputation of an adventurer in the eyes of the factions comes important when choosing sides as it determines if the player is considered an ally or an enemy in the eyes of the factions. 
By siding with the enemy faction you may be able to switch sides.


Combat in Purrates is divided into two parts. The first takes place in form of cannon fire where the player has to weaken its foe to have greater and faster chance of capturing the opponent.

Cannon fights will require some tactics as different ship classes will act in different manners in order to try and send you to the locker. Ships vary from firepower, speed, maneuverability to the location of the guns. To ensure you that there will be challenging and unique cannon fights, we have been quite inventive in designing different kinds of ships. When you successfully land hits on your enemies their ships will lose health and crew size. This is crucial to the next phase of combat as you should never attempt to capture or be captured by a ship with larger crew or health than your own.

The second part of combat is all about capturing your opponent. In Purrates you are limited to sail with one ship at a time but you may hold a captured ship under your control. With the second ship, you may either switch to use it as your flagship or you can sail to a port to sell it. Captured ships firepower will not have any effect in battles, only the flagships matter.

Capturing itself is as easy as colliding with your target during combat with capture mode turned on. Once the process has begun the game will give you a time of how long till the ship has been secured. This is not that difficult but while you are performing this action, you are vulnerable to other ships attacks so choose your target and time wisely.


Trading is the best way to make money, though it comes with its own set of risks. The concept doesn’t differ that much from real life, buy low sell high. Trading successfully requires a few things. First you need a ship that can carry a decent amount of cargo. Secondly you need a place to buy and a place to sell.

There are certain situations where trading really pays off. Certain locations in the world map will occasionally run out of items and creates a shortage of goods. These random events are the most desirable moments a trader is after. Shortages are usually very local though as only the neighboring ports will know of them.

The first 5000 euro we will use and reuse. How?
We need 5000 euro to start up a company officially in Portugal. Once that is in the bank and we deliver proof of that we are allowed to take it out and reuse it for more important things like buying crazy expensive licenses that we sadly enough need.
Here is the breakdown:
All of these are single purchase 

  • Max 2016                                    4.920,00 EUR
  • Photoshop                                      615,00 EUR
  • Unity Pro Android                      1140,00 EUR
  • Quixel suite                                   440,00 EUR
  • Zbrush                                            380,00 EUR
All of this is the nice sum of 7495 euro.

Where does the rest come in then?
Well, even though we have really enjoyed working on these projects, from time to time we would like to give our team members some motivation in the form of a bonus until we can finalize the games and publish them. We all have worked very hard for the past year and I do believe we all deserve it.

We will send you a Thank you Email with a link to the blooper videos from the making of.

You will get the full Purrates PC game.

Sea Stars are the currency for the shops. We will give you a bundle of sea star credits so you go all crazy in the shop from the Sea Star King

                     

These are a few examples of the shirts that will be available. After the campaign is over we will contact you where we will give you all choices and so we know in what size we have to make these for you. All shirts are in excellent quality.

This will be a player model with special abilities that will be only available for this campaign. 


We will name a NPC (non player character) in Purrates your name or a name of your choosing. (for example: If you are a gamer and you have a favorite character name)

We will add level environments that are based on world known locations. We would like to have your input on that. You can choose one of the levels you would like to see.


Become part of the So Wrong! Studios family, It might be a big buy in, but from now on you will get a part of the profit every year. After the campaign is over we will make contact with you and your lawyer so we can bring all the paper work in order.


9000 EUR
With this we can finish the basic Blub game and the basic Purrates game

12500 EUR

  • Expanding the team with another programmer

  • Additional level environments for Blub


17500 EUR

  • Additional ship classes in Purrates

  • Additional player models for Blub


25000 EUR

  • Extensive amount of additional quest content for Purrates

At this moment our main focus is on our mobile game because it is great for a start up to begin with. We have a lot of good ideas in store for the future, but first we need to focus on the present. Because without the present there is no future.
We started out with an endless runner and an RPG, the genres are far from each other but it gives us the ability to grow and find ourselves. So far we have enjoyed working on both games and we know that we can accomplish more given the opportunity. 




Blub is an endless runner for mobile which is set under water. At first you will guide "Blub" the fish to safety by dodging various kinds of obstacles. The further you play the more dangerous and difficult the waters become.
While you are swim for your life, you also need to be aware of the Sea Stars. Save them from the environment, take them with you on your trip, The Sea Star King has lots of nice things for you that he is willing to give you because you saved his kin.These go from different player models and different skins to several boosts to make your journey a bit easier from time to time. 

Blub is being developed for Android at the moment and we have plans later on to publish it on iOS as well.






The current version of Blub only shows one kind of an environment though in the future we plan to add multiple kinds of levels with various obstacles and player models. 
The additional levels that we would like to implement would mimic those of what we have in the real world. We want to create some hazardous environments to raise ocean and river welfare by showing what those environments are like in the form of our game. This is a list of environments we would like to implement. Both Polluted and and Beautiful environments to show what should be fixed, and how it actually can be.
Ganges River (Pollution)Maui Coral Reef (Beauty)Mexico Gulf (Pollution)Amazon Jungle (Beauty)North Atlantic Gyre (Pollution)Lagos Caves (Beauty)Antarctica (Beauty)




The levels
are full of obstacles of various kinds; some are living while others are solid
objects. The players’ goal is to reach as far as possible by avoiding these
obstacles and gathering Sea Stars and boosts along the way.
So far we have Octopus and swordfish as living obstacle.You have to try and dodge the grabbing arms of the octopus, or you'll become his lunch. The swordfish likes rigging you on his sword. Don't let him.We will add a lot more fun living obstacles in here. Depending on the level environment, the obstacles will change accordingly.

For solid object we have the anchor. Depending on how you'll hit it, you'll either die, because lets face it, an anchor would give anyone a headache if you'd hit it full in the head. Or you'll loose health because you got scarred on your side. Over time you will heal and you can become fully healthy again.

We also implemented a fishnet. If you swim in it, the game will be over. But if you hit the sides you might just loose some health. And of course here you can also over time heal up again.

There is also the sunken ship which you have to dodge. Just like with the living obstacles, we will add a lot more obstacles under this category and these will change according to the level environment.




Additional player models
can be purchased from the in game store with Sea Stars you gather by playing the
game. Additional player models will have special abilities that will help you
in certain environments while they might make the game more challenging in
others.





With your help we
would like to add features such as global high scores, missions, achievements
and plenty of content to play through. Everything to ensure countless hours of
fun!






Purrates is our second game which will be for PC. It is an RPG where you as the player are thrown into a fantasy world where three
factions are at conflict with one another in a Caribbean environment. The
Imperial pugs and the Purrates have migrated from faraway lands into this new
promising world only to find themselves amongst new people, the Mizetecs.
Of course the Mizetecs want to protect what is theirs and they will fight for what is theirs. But they are also open to diplomacy.
At the beginning of the game you will make your unique character from one of the three factions. But depending on what you choose to do in the game you can become friends or enemies with your own and the other factions. Everything is open to what you decide. This is so that when you decide you want to make a new character you will get a full new experience.
With this game we promise you endless amount of fun.
We initially considered Purrates as a mobile game though it has grown as a concept beyond the point of being for mobile. From feedback we've learned that a lot of people would be interested in Purrates though if only it were made for PC. Thus we've changed the game to be made for PC and later on we will develop a smaller mobile game based off the gameplay.







The Purrates are a
group of cats that seek the pirate way of life in plundering treasure and
living free from chains. While they are not a particularly organized faction
they do follow a simple chain of command that ensures the well being of all
Purrates.
The Purrates are based on the pirates from the 18th century like we know them from the history books. They are mean and viscious but they have their own rules and code that they live by. They do not look kindly on traitors, but that doesn't mean if you want to side with the Mizetecs because hey a cat living between mice, it's just something you want to do, that you can't. You can do whatever you want! But you'll have to live with the wrath of a cat!



The Imperial Pugs
represent law and order in a civilized manner and have migrated from faraway
lands into the new promised land to find new knowledge and riches of the world.
Leading this expedition is their King himself Charles Wrinkles who by example inspires
his nation to greatness.
The Imperial Pugs are based on the 18th century Royal colonies. They would never break rules, but you wouldn't be the first one to turn pirate because you don't like the stiff rules from the Imperium. But know that they'll never stop to hunt you down.



The Mizetecs are the
original inhabitants of this region of the world and have been put to the test
in preserving their culture of cheese and blood rituals by having to fend off
the two occupants. By godly right their high priestess has united the tribes and has taken the
lead role in preserving their society.
The mizetecs are based on the 13th century aztec civilization. They don't like outsiders unless it's to sacrifice them. Only that one rare stranger might be able to worm his way in. While most mizetecs prefer to stay within the safety of their city's wall, some are curious and will venture to sea to protect their homeland. Once in a while one might find himself compelled to join a different faction and will from then on be marked for death by its own faction.



You will forge your own story as you progress through out the game. At the beginning you may choose your faction and a character that goes with it. After the short tutorial quest can the player begin their adventure as they see fit!





We plan to add various types of ships. Each ship has different attributes and functionality to ensure different gameplay styles. Some ships will be deemed superior for combat while others are more trade orientated. 





Each faction has its own main story line as well as additional side quests and repeatables. The multitude of quests for each faction ensures that the player would have enough content to play enjoy Purrates for a long time to come! 




Actions such as completing quests, battling and trading can earn you reputation points. The reputation of an adventurer in the eyes of the factions comes important when choosing sides as it determines if the player is considered an ally or an enemy in the eyes of the factions. 
By siding with the enemy faction you may be able to switch sides.





Combat in Purrates is divided into two parts. The first takes place in form of cannon fire where the player has to weaken its foe to have greater and faster chance of capturing the opponent.
Cannon fights will require some tactics as different ship classes will act in different manners in order to try and send you to the locker. Ships vary from firepower, speed, maneuverability to the location of the guns. To ensure you that there will be challenging and unique cannon fights, we have been quite inventive in designing different kinds of ships. When you successfully land hits on your enemies their ships will lose health and crew size. This is crucial to the next phase of combat as you should never attempt to capture or be captured by a ship with larger crew or health than your own.
The second part of combat is all about capturing your opponent. In Purrates you are limited to sail with one ship at a time but you may hold a captured ship under your control. With the second ship, you may either switch to use it as your flagship or you can sail to a port to sell it. Captured ships firepower will not have any effect in battles, only the flagships matter.
Capturing itself is as easy as colliding with your target during combat with capture mode turned on. Once the process has begun the game will give you a time of how long till the ship has been secured. This is not that difficult but while you are performing this action, you are vulnerable to other ships attacks so choose your target and time wisely.






Trading is the best way to make money, though it comes with its own set of risks. The concept doesn’t differ that much from real life, buy low sell high. Trading successfully requires a few things. First you need a ship that can carry a decent amount of cargo. Secondly you need a place to buy and a place to sell.There are certain situations where trading really pays off. Certain locations in the world map will occasionally run out of items and creates a shortage of goods. These random events are the most desirable moments a trader is after. Shortages are usually very local though as only the neighboring ports will know of them. 







The first 5000 euro we will use and reuse. How?We need 5000 euro to start up a company officially in Portugal. Once that is in the bank and we deliver proof of that we are allowed to take it out and reuse it for more important things like buying crazy expensive licenses that we sadly enough need.

Here is the breakdown:All of these are single purchase 


Max 2016                                    4.920,00 EUR


Photoshop                                      615,00 EUR


Unity Pro Android                      1140,00 EUR


Quixel suite                                   440,00 EUR

Zbrush                                            380,00 EUR

All of this is the nice sum of 7495 euro.

Where does the rest come in then?
Well, even though we have really enjoyed working on these projects, from time to time we would like to give our team members some motivation in the form of a bonus until we can finalize the games and publish them. We all have worked very hard for the past year and I do believe we all deserve it.










We will send you a Thank you Email with a link to the blooper videos from the making of.
You will get the full Purrates PC game.


Sea Stars are the currency for the shops. We will give you a bundle of sea star credits so you go all crazy in the shop from the Sea Star King

                     These are a few examples of the shirts that will be available. After the campaign is over we will contact you where we will give you all choices and so we know in what size we have to make these for you. All shirts are in excellent quality.
This will be a player model with special abilities that will be only available for this campaign. 
We will name a NPC (non player character) in Purrates your name or a name of your choosing. (for example: If you are a gamer and you have a favorite character name)
We will add level environments that are based on world known locations. We would like to have your input on that. You can choose one of the levels you would like to see.
Become part of the So Wrong! Studios family, It might be a big buy in, but from now on you will get a part of the profit every year. After the campaign is over we will make contact with you and your lawyer so we can bring all the paper work in order.

9000 EURWith this we can finish the basic Blub game and the basic Purrates game
12500 EUR

Expanding the team with another programmer
Additional level environments for Blub


17500 EUR

Additional ship classes in Purrates
Additional player models for Blub

25000 EUR
Extensive amount of additional quest content for Purrates

story:
Join my discord!

  • Immediate News and Updates on the game
  • Beta Access!
  • Exclusive Emojis!
  • Contest Giveaways!
  • Stream Updates, Blog Posts and more

 

The Atmospheric Sword Dueling Game

 

Short Summary

  • Ato is a game that is familiar but also non-traditional in several aspects. Unlike most games that have you slaughter hundreds of weak and forgettable enemies, the game focuses those combat sequences on unique and memorable opponents.
  • ​Explore areas, find secrets and obtain new powers as you journey though colorful environments. As you play the game, you will experience atmospheric music both relaxing and combative. The visuals of the game combine both emotive animations with beautiful particle effects. When you come across former members of the clan you served, you will be challenged with a variety of opponents both big and small, each with their own personality and fighting style.
  • The game is about half way complete and the rest of the content that is going to be added will involve more puzzle types, more secrets to explore, special upgrades, enemy encounters and a completed story arc.

 

What I Need & What You Get

  • The funding is used to pay for the Steam registration fee, and to pay for marketing costs.
  • The perks will allow you to secure a PC virtual copy of the game when it comes out as well as other exciting bonuses such as your own character idea as a statue or an actual enemy encounter (click the perks to see more information).

 

The Impact

  • The goal is to immerse the player into a world with a powerful atmosphere and be transported to a place that is both tranquil and mysterious.
  • Tell a Visually Driven Story, bypass the language barrier by using little to no words as possible.
  • Be engaged in tense moments and feel accomplishment when you overcome every obstacle in your path.

Risks & Challenges

  • I have already shipped finished products onto Steam and Itch.io.
  • Ato is a very focused game that still requires a lot of work as a solo developer. The unfortunate truth is that while I want to add as much stuff as possible to the game, there is also the limitation of time and energy to reach the end of the project and not constantly add new stuff.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Even if you can't contribute financially, you can still be of great help by telling friends about this game. Seriously, it really saves me an arm and a leg.
  • Share this project with other people through social media.
  • Try out the demo and Join my discord! 

​Game PC Demo Download

 

Thank you,

-Brandon
