story:
What Is Footstock and Why is it Unique?

Footstock takes the skill of ‘fantasy footy’ – the thrill of ‘football betting’ - and the age-old addiction of ‘player trading cards’ to a ‘full on’ level – and rolls it all into one neat, user-friendly app. Footstock is a game that is always on. A game where there is no final whistle.

 

 

 

Who is the ‘Ideal’ Footstock User?

The fan who never stops thinking about the beautiful game.

The one who has it built into their DNA. The one who can’t imagine life without it.

The genius fan who knows more about their own team than any player currently wearing their clubs sacred shirt.

The one who feels the pain in every loss. The hope in every draw. And the ecstasy in every win.

The one who can spot real talent in a player before the shirt even fits them.

The one who always filled their ‘Panini’ album faster than their mates.

The one ready to test their skills of selection/formation/transfers/real player card trades and much more – not only for bragging rights over their mates – but also for cold hard cash.

 

You.

 

The Footstock USP

This is a unique ‘football experience’. A game where there is no final whistle.

Footstock takes all the much-loved elements of fantasy footy to a ‘pro’ level - and combines them with the thrill of rising/falling stock market player prices.

You build your own squad by buying/winning player cards. And because there is no salary cap, there are huge premiums attached to getting the best cards.

Every player card price fluctuates up/down against supply and demand - and of course, recent form.

This creates a unique opportunity to use your football knowledge and instinct - to buy and sell players for profit.

So, do you splash the cash on a big star someone else is selling in the hope he rediscovers his form? Maybe that under-21 international who’s just broken into the first team is worth a punt? Or do you keep faith with the squad you’ve already built?

Footstock is where your football prowess shines and rewards like never before. Where the decisions you make - reap real cash rewards (if you’re right).

 

 

Footstock is 24/7 for a Reason

Emotion and football - impossible to separate. And rightly so.

The joy of winning, the despair of losing and the cruel unpredictability of the game keep our emotions bubbling constantly. We love it.

When no midweek fixtures are on – or the dreaded international break tugs at your nuts and puts a shopping trolley over your toes – we hate it.

That’s why Footstock is always on, keeping you tapped into the world of real football long after the final whistle.

The players from your rivals that you ‘hate’ but would secretly ‘love’ to be in your squad – will be. You may even be rooting for them to perform (unless they’re playing you this week, right?).

You’ll soon start supporting these players in your Footstock squad almost as much as you support your own players on a matchday. After all, there’s pride (and cash) at stake.

You live the 24/7 non-stop life of a Premier League manager.

Constant tweaking of your squad – should you sell that striker who keeps promising to have a stormer but is yet to deliver? Eyes always wide open for a huge deal or a ‘clued-up’ bargain.

You also live the 24/7 non-stop life of a Premier League chairman where the buck stops at your door - and it’s your money on the line to invest (or not) in players.
 

 

How the Unique Footstock Algorithm Works

Footstock is based on a trading card system. Every Premier League player has their own trading card.

 

Each card has stats unique to that player which reflect their real-life skills and are aggregated to give them an overall score.

The buying price for a player is the cheapest purchase price for that player. And, the selling price (if you own that player) represents the highest price you can sell for.

Prices and stats change depending on form and demand. The game might be fantasy, but the money involved is real pounds and pence, all adding to the thrill of the game.

Players are ranked into 5 classes via their overall performance score. The better a player performs, the rarer and more valuable his cards become.

 

PLAYER CLASSES

 

HOW TO GET YOUR PLAYER CARDS:

The cheapest way is to buy packs. Every pack contains 5 cards that are semi-randomly selected by our algorithm. There`s a chance you`ll find the occasional Ballon d'Or winner in a cheap pack, but generally speaking, the more you pay for a pack, the higher the chance you have of bagging world-class players.

You can also buy cards from other users and earn cards the more you use and move up the ranks in Footstock.

 

 

 

The 3 Ways To Make Money From Footstock

 

  1. DOING WELL IN FOOTSTOCK FANTASY FOOTBALL COMPETITIONS

 

  1. TRADING PLAYERS ON THE FOOTSTOCK MARKET

 

  1. WINNING CARDS AT THE FOOTSTOCK CASINO

 

How to Earn Money in Footstock Fantasy Football Competitions

We offer Fantasy Football style tournaments on all matchdays.

The rules are simple: you pick 3 of the players you currently own and pay a buy-in price into the pot.

The Footstock scoring system awards points for the actions your players take in ‘real games’ on matchday. If your players score more points than anyone else -you win the pot.

Most tourneys have guaranteed prize pools, and there are several freeroll tournaments every week including ‘Pro Level freerolls’ with £50 (or higher) prize pools.

 

*We don’t charge tournament fees:

When you play a £50 tourney, you pay £50 into the pot, and that’s all.  There’s no buy-in fee (like you’d pay in an online poker tournament).

So, while your FOOTSTOCK squad won`t come completely free (unless you have crazy skill/ luck), it gives you fantastic fantasy football odds once you build it. 

 

 

Earn Money On The Footstock Market

This is football’s version of the FTSE index where you get to trade player cards with other fans.

Selling Players

  1. Look to see if someone else wants your player
  2. Decide whether you’re happy with the price they’re offering – if so, agree to sell. They get your player. You get their money.
  3. If you’re not happy with the price, suggest a price at which you’ll be happy to sell.
  4. Wait to see if anyone snaps up your player for the price you’re offering. Seal the deal.

Buying players is equally easy. Just browse the available players, put in bids for the ones you want and hold tight to see if the owner accepts it. If not, consider upping your bid or walking away.

The better a player performs in real-world Premier League games (according to our scoring system) the more money he makes you in tourneys. And the market knows – so, find the next Salah, Aguero or Kane early, get him in your squad - and watch his price go through the roof.

 

How to Earn Money in The Footstock Casino

Another unique feature is the Footstock Casino.

Eventually, there will be loads of games here, but we’re opening this feature with STAT ROULETTE. It’s easy, fast and fun, and you can win great players in seconds.

Just pick one of your player cards, and the bank randomly selects an opponent player card and a competition stat (e.g. goals). If your player has the better value (e.g. your player has scored 3 goals and the other guy has only 1) you win the opponent’s card. If the other guy wins, you lose your card.

Creating Interest in Footstock from the Kick-off

In our quest to gain as many early adopters of Footstock as possible, we will be rewarding those who sign-up early for their courage and trust.

They get a 25% discount on all player packs.

We will raise the pack prices by 25% when the 2019/20 season kicks off in August 2019 and by another 25% on Boxing Day 2019.

The pack prices impact the prices in the market. Get in early and profit from the fact that prices will be higher for everyone who joins after you. 

 

 

Meet the Footstock Team:

TILL (Centre-mid. Highly driven, loyal and passionate)

Till is from Cologne and is totally crazy about FC Cologne. His best football experience was a trip to London last season to watch them play Arsenal, even though they lost 3:1. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rchw8WShP7E 

Till studied business in Switzerland and has earned an MBA from the University of St. Gallen. Before joining forces with Oliver to work on Footstock, Till was Managing Director of a group of private universities and taught marketing classes. After having the idea for Footstock; Till quit his job to work on making it happen.

 

OLIVER (Centre-back. Technically brilliant. Big motivator)

Oliver is a computer genius from Gmunden (Austria). As CTO of Footstock; he’s in charge of all the technical aspects of our project. Together with Till, he co-founded WR digital GmbH in 2017 and has developed the Footstock app since then. Before joining this adventure, Oliver worked as lead programmer of a casino software company. Oliver discovered his passion for coding at the age of 12 and just LOVES good code.

 

RATKO (Centre-forward/false 9. Creative flair. Razor sharp vision)

Ratko is our design artist. He`s from Serbia, and we were lucky to find him via 99designs. After completing his Bachelor`s degree in Educational/ Instructional Media Design, Ratko started out as a logo designer but switched to UI design more than 3 years ago. Ratko also designed this page.

 

The Footstock Timeline 

 

Why We Need Funding (and where your money is going)

Stats are vital for the success of Footstock. They are the driving force of player cards and are used to calculate the overall performance score, determine the winners in tournaments and in the Footstock Casino.

The funding we receive will be used to buy a data feed that gives us all these stats in ‘real time’:


We need your courage, your trust and, of course, your money to reach our goals.

 

 

Extra Rewards for Backing Our Goal:

A big discount on your first players is not all you’ll get in return for supporting Footstock. Pledge cash and you can get your name forever in our credits list, plus discounts on all Footstock packages:

You are also invited to become part of the ‘FOOTSTOCK COMMUNITY’. We will keep you fully updated and share exclusive behind-the-scenes content with you.

You`ll be invited to live video sessions to discuss the future of our app: new features, release planning, user rewards, etc.

You could see the features you came up with - in action on the app.

We want to make Footstock the best possible app for our supporters, so we take your feedback very seriously.

 

Over to you …

The Footstock goal is to become the only fantasy football app that matters – the ultimate in card trading – and the future of football betting.

It’s entirely designed by true football fans – for true football fans.

With your help – it simply can’t miss.

If you can’t pledge right now, help us spread the Footstock buzz with fellow footy fans who like a bet, love fantasy football, and would be well up for trading real players for real money.

 

Thanks for listening.
story_txt:
What Is Footstock and Why is it Unique?Footstock takes the skill of ‘fantasy footy’ – the thrill of ‘football betting’ - and the age-old addiction of ‘player trading cards’ to a ‘full on’ level – and rolls it all into one neat, user-friendly app. Footstock is a game that is always on. A game where there is no final whistle.   Who is the ‘Ideal’ Footstock User?The fan who never stops thinking about the beautiful game.The one who has it built into their DNA. The one who can’t imagine life without it.The genius fan who knows more about their own team than any player currently wearing their clubs sacred shirt.The one who feels the pain in every loss. The hope in every draw. And the ecstasy in every win.The one who can spot real talent in a player before the shirt even fits them.The one who always filled their ‘Panini’ album faster than their mates.The one ready to test their skills of selection/formation/transfers/real player card trades and much more – not only for bragging rights over their mates – but also for cold hard cash. You. The Footstock USPThis is a unique ‘football experience’. A game where there is no final whistle.Footstock takes all the much-loved elements of fantasy footy to a ‘pro’ level - and combines them with the thrill of rising/falling stock market player prices.You build your own squad by buying/winning player cards. And because there is no salary cap, there are huge premiums attached to getting the best cards.Every player card price fluctuates up/down against supply and demand - and of course, recent form.This creates a unique opportunity to use your football knowledge and instinct - to buy and sell players for profit.So, do you splash the cash on a big star someone else is selling in the hope he rediscovers his form? Maybe that under-21 international who’s just broken into the first team is worth a punt? Or do you keep faith with the squad you’ve already built?Footstock is where your football prowess shines and rewards like never before. Where the decisions you make - reap real cash rewards (if you’re right).  
Footstock is 24/7 for a Reason 
Emotion and football - impossible to separate. And rightly so.The joy of winning, the despair of losing and the cruel unpredictability of the game keep our emotions bubbling constantly. We love it.When no midweek fixtures are on – or the dreaded international break tugs at your nuts and puts a shopping trolley over your toes – we hate it.That’s why Footstock is always on, keeping you tapped into the world of real football long after the final whistle.The players from your rivals that you ‘hate’ but would secretly ‘love’ to be in your squad – will be. You may even be rooting for them to perform (unless they’re playing you this week, right?).You’ll soon start supporting these players in your Footstock squad almost as much as you support your own players on a matchday. After all, there’s pride (and cash) at stake.You live the 24/7 non-stop life of a Premier League manager.Constant tweaking of your squad – should you sell that striker who keeps promising to have a stormer but is yet to deliver? Eyes always wide open for a huge deal or a ‘clued-up’ bargain.You also live the 24/7 non-stop life of a Premier League chairman where the buck stops at your door - and it’s your money on the line to invest (or not) in players.  How the Unique Footstock Algorithm WorksFootstock is based on a trading card system. Every Premier League player has their own trading card. Each card has stats unique to that player which reflect their real-life skills and are aggregated to give them an overall score.The buying price for a player is the cheapest purchase price for that player. And, the selling price (if you own that player) represents the highest price you can sell for.Prices and stats change depending on form and demand. The game might be fantasy, but the money involved is real pounds and pence, all adding to the thrill of the game.Players are ranked into 5 classes via their overall performance score. The better a player performs, the rarer and more valuable his cards become. PLAYER CLASSES HOW TO GET YOUR PLAYER CARDS:The cheapest way is to buy packs. Every pack contains 5 cards that are semi-randomly selected by our algorithm. There`s a chance you`ll find the occasional Ballon d'Or winner in a cheap pack, but generally speaking, the more you pay for a pack, the higher the chance you have of bagging world-class players.You can also buy cards from other users and earn cards the more you use and move up the ranks in Footstock.   The 3 Ways To Make Money From Footstock DOING WELL IN FOOTSTOCK FANTASY FOOTBALL COMPETITIONS TRADING PLAYERS ON THE FOOTSTOCK MARKET WINNING CARDS AT THE FOOTSTOCK CASINO How to Earn Money in Footstock Fantasy Football CompetitionsWe offer Fantasy Football style tournaments on all matchdays.The rules are simple: you pick 3 of the players you currently own and pay a buy-in price into the pot.The Footstock scoring system awards points for the actions your players take in ‘real games’ on matchday. If your players score more points than anyone else -you win the pot.Most tourneys have guaranteed prize pools, and there are several freeroll tournaments every week including ‘Pro Level freerolls’ with £50 (or higher) prize pools. *We don’t charge tournament fees: When you play a £50 tourney, you pay £50 into the pot, and that’s all.  There’s no buy-in fee (like you’d pay in an online poker tournament).So, while your FOOTSTOCK squad won`t come completely free (unless you have crazy skill/ luck), it gives you fantastic fantasy football odds once you build it.   Earn Money On The Footstock MarketThis is football’s version of the FTSE index where you get to trade player cards with other fans.Selling Players 
Look to see if someone else wants your player
Decide whether you’re happy with the price they’re offering – if so, agree to sell. They get your player. You get their money.
If you’re not happy with the price, suggest a price at which you’ll be happy to sell.
Wait to see if anyone snaps up your player for the price you’re offering. Seal the deal.
Buying players is equally easy. Just browse the available players, put in bids for the ones you want and hold tight to see if the owner accepts it. If not, consider upping your bid or walking away.The better a player performs in real-world Premier League games (according to our scoring system) the more money he makes you in tourneys. And the market knows – so, find the next Salah, Aguero or Kane early, get him in your squad - and watch his price go through the roof. How to Earn Money in The Footstock CasinoAnother unique feature is the Footstock Casino.Eventually, there will be loads of games here, but we’re opening this feature with STAT ROULETTE. It’s easy, fast and fun, and you can win great players in seconds.Just pick one of your player cards, and the bank randomly selects an opponent player card and a competition stat (e.g. goals). If your player has the better value (e.g. your player has scored 3 goals and the other guy has only 1) you win the opponent’s card. If the other guy wins, you lose your card.Creating Interest in Footstock from the Kick-offIn our quest to gain as many early adopters of Footstock as possible, we will be rewarding those who sign-up early for their courage and trust.They get a 25% discount on all player packs.We will raise the pack prices by 25% when the 2019/20 season kicks off in August 2019 and by another 25% on Boxing Day 2019.The pack prices impact the prices in the market. Get in early and profit from the fact that prices will be higher for everyone who joins after you.   Meet the Footstock Team:TILL (Centre-mid. Highly driven, loyal and passionate)Till is from Cologne and is totally crazy about FC Cologne. His best football experience was a trip to London last season to watch them play Arsenal, even though they lost 3:1. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rchw8WShP7E Till studied business in Switzerland and has earned an MBA from the University of St. Gallen. Before joining forces with Oliver to work on Footstock, Till was Managing Director of a group of private universities and taught marketing classes. After having the idea for Footstock; Till quit his job to work on making it happen. OLIVER (Centre-back. Technically brilliant. Big motivator)Oliver is a computer genius from Gmunden (Austria). As CTO of Footstock; he’s in charge of all the technical aspects of our project. Together with Till, he co-founded WR digital GmbH in 2017 and has developed the Footstock app since then. Before joining this adventure, Oliver worked as lead programmer of a casino software company. Oliver discovered his passion for coding at the age of 12 and just LOVES good code. RATKO (Centre-forward/false 9. Creative flair. Razor sharp vision)Ratko is our design artist. He`s from Serbia, and we were lucky to find him via 99designs. After completing his Bachelor`s degree in Educational/ Instructional Media Design, Ratko started out as a logo designer but switched to UI design more than 3 years ago. Ratko also designed this page. The Footstock Timeline   
Why We Need Funding (and where your money is going)Stats are vital for the success of Footstock. They are the driving force of player cards and are used to calculate the overall performance score, determine the winners in tournaments and in the Footstock Casino.The funding we receive will be used to buy a data feed that gives us all these stats in ‘real time’:We need your courage, your trust and, of course, your money to reach our goals.  Extra Rewards for Backing Our Goal:A big discount on your first players is not all you’ll get in return for supporting Footstock. Pledge cash and you can get your name forever in our credits list, plus discounts on all Footstock packages:You are also invited to become part of the ‘FOOTSTOCK COMMUNITY’. We will keep you fully updated and share exclusive behind-the-scenes content with you.You`ll be invited to live video sessions to discuss the future of our app: new features, release planning, user rewards, etc.You could see the features you came up with - in action on the app.We want to make Footstock the best possible app for our supporters, so we take your feedback very seriously. Over to you …The Footstock goal is to become the only fantasy football app that matters – the ultimate in card trading – and the future of football betting.It’s entirely designed by true football fans – for true football fans.With your help – it simply can’t miss.If you can’t pledge right now, help us spread the Footstock buzz with fellow footy fans who like a bet, love fantasy football, and would be well up for trading real players for real money. Thanks for listening.

story:
Credit card reward programs are complicated, and that means customers lose out on rewards they could be earning.

The average credit card customer has 3-4 cards. Credit card issuers like Discover, Bank of America, Capital One and so on all provide reward programs with different terms and conditions. Discover might offer 5% back on movies one month and gas the following month. Bank of America might give you 2% back on groceries, but limit that 2% to only the first $1500 you spend on groceries in a quarter after which it goes down to 1%. These programs are great, but all those rules make it very difficult for the average customer to make the best decision possible to save money. In fact, the average customer could make hundreds of dollars or more on their credit card rewards every year just by choosing the best card.

Reward Summit makes it easy to choose the right card by providing a simple mobile application that will tell a customer which card offers the best rewards in seconds. A Reward Summit user can open up the application and select a merchant and get an instant recommendation in just a few seconds, or if you connect your Reward Summit account to Foursquare, we can give you a recommendation automatically when you check-in. (Watch our video to see an early version of the application in action!)

To do this, Reward Summit only needs to know what type of credit cards you carry, but you never have to give the application your account number. If you want to provide some more details about your card balances and limits, the application will take that into consideration when making a recommendation. We maintain a database of credit card reward program conditions and determine the optimal card to use for each individual transaction.

As you can see from our video, we already have an application for iPhone working and functionality for the first release of the application working on our website. The entire demo is 100% real working code, not a prototype. What we need your help with is funding the design work so we can turn this very functional, useful application into one that looks great and customers love to use! The money you pledge as our backers is going to fund the design work and application changes to make this look great. Backers who pledge enough for beta access will get to see this evolution happen as we release these improvements to the folks who are helping test our app!

We have great designers and developers available to us that we have used for previous projects. We've already planned a local pilot beginning in Charlotte, North Carolina with a launch strategy around how we will get the application attention with local consumers and media. Now we just need your help to fund these last few steps to get the application off the ground.

About Us

Reward Summit was created by John Espey and Chris Hart:

John Espey is an experienced IT veteran with a track record of building early stage companies. He was employee #9 at Amentra, an IT services consulting company and was COO when the company was bought by Red Hat. Following that he was an angel investor in Nexgrid, a smart grid technology company, where he led the company through two successful rounds of financing as COO. He is the co-founder of TheGoalMine.com, an online marketplace for personal goal setting. John has experience leading IT projects and teams, holds a BS in DMIS from George Mason University, and is a graduate of Duke University's Fuqua School of Business where he earned his MBA.

Chris Hart is an experienced IT veteran who has focused on financial services technology for the last 15 years. He was the technology leader responsible for building the online banking credit card site infrastructure at FleetBoston Financial, led the integration of online banking and brokerage web sites for one of the largest banks in the United States, and helped design and launch a person-to-person payment network competitor to PayPal. He was the co-founder and technical director of ScheduleOn, a web-based scheduling and business management solution for service-based businesses. Chris has led 50+ member global technology teams and has a B.S. in Computer Science.

What We Need & What You Get

We've set a $15,000 goal so we can begin tackling the following improvements:

  1. Complete of the redesign of our iOS application
  2. Complete development of an Android mobile application
  3. Pay legal fees related to our terms of service and privacy policy
  4. Fund the marketing related to our limited-availability product launch in the Charlotte, North Carolina market to test the application with the general public

Obviously we really want to achieve our $15,000 goal. If we are not able to meet that goal, we can still use whatever funds we are able to raise - we just will need to adjust the scope of the work and prioritize the most important pieces.

Ther perks for contributors to our project are designed to keep everyone involved in the development process of the application and evolution of our product. We want you to be as excited as we are about Reward Summit!

The Impact

Reward Summit eliminates the confusion created by credit card issuers related to reward programs so the average consumer can save real money. Think about how much an extra $250, $500 or even $1000 a year means to you... Extra dinners out with your significant other, a car payment (or two or three), even more money in your savings account... Together we are helping democratize and demystify credit card rewards for everyone in a way that makes a tangible, financial difference in peoples' lives. That's huge!

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not everyone can afford to give money. That's okay. If you think our project is a good idea, please help us get the word out. Send a note to your family or friends, share a link to this campaign on Twitter, or mention us next time you and your friends are talking about interesting startups.

story:
Summary

3KB have always wanted to take our level of interaction to the next level and this is the future of 3KB! Become a part of it. Playbytes Live will be all about interacting with our viewers. The goal is to get a PC for streaming all types of video games. Not only do we plan on playing games with everyone but we also plan on setting up a Minecraft Server!

The goal is to get 3KB a gaming PC for Live Streaming Playbytes Live. There will be a few different shows that will come out of this. The first major will be PC Game reviews and the second will be Playbytes Live! An interactive show for all 3KB fans to be able to come and play video games with us! We will also be setting up a new channel just for Playbytes Live!

story:
To bridge the Digital Divide, one computer at a time.

The Digital Bridge Foundation is committed to bridging the digital divide, one computer at a time, with a computer refurbishment program for underprivileged students. The Digital Divide is the inequality of individuals, households, and various groups of different socioeconomic levels in access to information technology, and in information technology skills and know-how. In order to accomplish this mission, The Digital Bridge Foundation is asking for your support.

The Digital Bridge Foundation will help alleviate the disparity of the Digital Divide by providing a home computer for students that don’t have access to a home computer. Also, by providing a computer refurbishment program The Digital Bridge Foundation will be recycling and reusing hundreds of pounds of E-Waste, rather than sending it to the local landfills. The Digital Bridge Foundation receives used computers and computer accessories from local businesses and households to refurbish and deliver to underprivileged students. The Digital Bridge Foundation also dismantles and recycles computers and computer parts that cannot be reused/or refurbished.

Academics are moving towards a digital medium, from emailing assignments to having live webcast lectures. At any given point there are 6,000,000 students in the United States who are enrolled in online classes. 80% of teachers say that eLearning increases the student’s engagement and quality of work, so it is vital to connect these disadvantaged students with home computer access.  With the ever increasing rate of going digital, it is leaving some students and families behind. In 2012, 46% of the lowest income households in the United States did not own a computer. 100,000,000 households in the United States still do not have a high speed internet connection, nor does it help when the cost of new technologies in the United States is significantly more expensive than other developed countries. The Digital Bridge Foundation will offset the initial expense of a home computer purchase by providing a refurbished home desktop PC for students and families.

This Indiegogo fundraiser will aid in the transition to a full scale nonprofit organization; which will provide a digital access point for underprivileged students. The goal for The Digital Bridge Foundation's fundraiser is to raise enough money to purchase new and used computer parts and accessories. The main items that will be purchased are mice, keyboards, monitor cables, and power cables. These items have the lowest frequency of donation, mainly because they are easily reused in many other products. The money contributed will be used for the production and printing of a basic computer skills booklet. This will encompass how to set up a desktop PC, network set-up, security and privacy settings, keyboard shortcut lists, and how to safely browse the internet. After all, the computer will not be a successful tool until the user knows how to operate it properly.

I(Michael McMacken, Founder) was enrolled in an at risk youth mentorship program when I was in college, and I realized that the Digital Divide is a not only a global issue, but also a local issue that needs to be addressed. This change must start with the younger generations, more specifically our students.  

With your contribution, you will help ensure that a student will have the necessary tools for academic success.  Together we can make the community better for the present, and for our future. So now is your chance to help us bridge the Digital Divide once and for all! Every little bit helps!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just don’t have a dollar to give right now, please consider helping us by sharing our campaign on facebook, twitter, or your blog.  The more people that see this campaign the better chance we have of raising the money we need. Every dollar counts. Thank you for your support!

story:
In Adorables you can play with 3 fully customizable cute characters in 6 different game types. Play against your friends, collect coins, customize your characters and win the Tournament or the World Tour modes. Adorables offer a lots of fun for you, don't miss it! Help us, and with your support, Adorables may become one of 2014's best games.
And don't forget to check the REWARDS section, I guess you will find something what you want to have. The gifts will never be available in stores.

The control is very simple. You only need to touch the character to control and aim with the arrow. 

Try the game NOW:
Windows demo
Android demo



Remember: the gifts will NEVER be available in stores. So if you contribute, you will got something really special.

$1 We send you a BIG thank you e-mail

$2 -We send you a BIG thank you e-mail
  -Got the android version of the game

$5 -We send you a BIG thank you e-mail 
  -Got the android version of the game
  -You will be in the credits’ Special Thanks section

$10 -We send you a BIG thank you e-mail

·  Platform free multiplayer 

·  3 single player modes (practice, world tour and tournament)

·  Character customization

·  6 games (soccer, beach ball, CTF, Last Adorable Standing, Ice Hockey, Mummy)

·  Turn based and fast game modes

·  Avaible for Android and Windows platforms

·  5 languages (English, German, Spanish, Chinese, Hungarian)

·  Achievements, leaderboards

·  You can select from 222 countries to represent in the competitions

·  MOGA controller support








Adorables has been developed for almost 6 months and we are very proud to present it to you in these forecoming days! After hundreds of hours the work is almost done and the game is in the final stage and we will launch it in July 2014. So why do we need your support?

·  Software and hardware are (unfortunately) very expensive

·  We need to add sound effects and music

·  We need to market the game (domain, web hosting, advertising, etc.)

·  We need funds for localizing the game for multiple languages

·  We need to be able to afford test devices for support & testing

·  We would like to make the game available on more platforms

·  We would like to add more supported languages

·  By supporting us you can get cool benefits!

Beyond financial help we also want to share our project ideas with the whole world. We would really appreciate if you could spread the game and share this project with all of your friends who are interested in our game and in this campaign. We are very thankful for every kind of support you can afford.





White Rabbit Games is a Hungarian indie game development team that developed games like Candy Blast. Now we are trying to make a step forward to a bigger game.

The team has 4 members:
Zoltán Riskó - Artist
Tamás Nagy - Programmer
László Takács - Programmer
Bodza, the hedgehog - Artist trainee

Play against your friends, collect coins, customize your characters and win the Tournament or the World Tour modes. Adorables offer a lots of fun for you, don't miss it! Help us, and with your support, Adorables may become one of 2014's best games.And don't forget to check the REWARDS section, I guess you will find something what you want to have. The gifts will never be available in stores.The control is very simple. story:
ZappYou is ultimate outdoor fun

"ZappYou is like Call of Duty, but in the real world!”

In short

The aim of the game is to zapp other players with a virtual laser beam. Beyond your mobile phone, all you need are your wits and the speed of your movements. It's as easy as that.

You can build your own Base or venture out to conquer other Bases. You can strengthen your Base with AR-objects like ZappBots, Barricades and ZappTrapps. Want to climb the ranks? Conquer a SuperBase by working together with other players. You can choose distinct roles for yourself, like Conztructor, Zpy, ChargeMazter or Zneek.

ZappYou is already in Beta and ready to play, but we need your input to make the final improvements. Test ZappYou, right now! Order your unlimited license below and receive every update until the official launch of ZappYou in the second quarter of 2017.

No extra hardware needed

ZappYou uses the on-board sensors of your mobile phone.  To Zapp other players, you use virtual laser beams, which are made possible by the unique algorithms we developed. You don’t need any extra hardware to play it. Just download the app and start zapping!

Different Zappers are available. They vary in range, precision, damage done, ammo needed and reload time.

Game Modes

Free4All

In the default Free4All mode you compete against everyone else. In this mode you will usually start with locating and collecting parts. When you have enough parts you can assemble Zappers, Defences and other objects.

You can also create your own UserBase and conquer it, train it and make it stronger. You also can conquer another’s UserBase. If there is a SuperBase nearby, you can Zapp together with other players and try to defeat it, in order to become a star on the ranking list!

Unit vs. Unit

Become a team leader and form your ZappYou Unit. Then challenge another Unit for a ZappYou Battle. Choose the duration and type of play. Own your area on the map and review each battle with the replay function, so you can learn how to improve your strategies.

Obstacle Run

In parks and other suitable green locations ZappYou Obstacle Runs will be made available. Easily locate the starting point and go! Don’t forget to pass the checkpoints and beware of ZappTrapps and ZappBots. You can get to the top of the leaderboard by eliminating as many ZappBots as you can. At the same time you must avoid being zapped by the ZappBots yourself. Try to be the fastest one to pass all checkpoints on your way to the finish.

Choose how to support us

Community perk: playing ZappYou is healthy!

Outdoor gaming is fun and healthy. That is why we want ZappYou to be the very best outdoor mobile game on the market. ZappYou offers you a way to improve your health! The game gets you running outside and performing fun and sometimes challenging moves.
 
Don’t limit the use of your phone to that small screen. Start using it as your tool to play outside.
Experience the real world in a new way. Play with your family, friends or colleagues, or anyone nearby!

 

Aspects of the game

Genergy and LifeBytes

At the start of the game and at the start of each new level you will always have 100% Genergy and LifeBytes. For zapping you need Genergy. And different zappers require different amounts of Genergy. If your Genergy runs out, you can just run a short distance to re-Genergize. You can also reset your Level but then you lose the XP for the next Level.

When someone else zapps you, you lose LifeBytes. If you run out of LifeBytes before reaching the next level there are several options. Easiest is a 40% boost by watching an ad if you want to avoid resetting your Level and losing your XP. Alternatively you can try to find a LifeByteCharger location, or find a team member with the ChargeMazter role to charge you up again.

Best played with headset

In order to let you play freely we have paid special attention to audio. You can play ZappYou with other players while minimizing screen time and getting all information through text to speech updates and instructions.

XP and Levels

With every successful zapp you will earn XP. With enough XP you can reach higher Levels,  unlocking new features in the game. You will also earn XP by accomplishing special feats, like hitting the same target repeatedly, finishing an Obstacle Run, creating your UserBase or eliminating ZappBots.

Roles

SuperBases and UserBases

A key feature of ZappYou evolves around the conquering of Bases. Famous landmarks will be set up as SuperBases by the ZappYou organization. These will be difficult to conquer and you will have to work together with other players to accomplish the feat. Once the base is conquered, the top conquerors will become the new owners. They can start strengthening the Superbase by adding more ZappBots, Barricades and ZappTraps. The current owners of the SuperBase can also participate in defending the SuperBase against the next wave of conquerors.

On a smaller scale each player can create their own UserBase. At the start your Inventory will already contain a UserBase flag, a ZappBot, ZappTrap and several Barricades. You can decide to build the UserBase with those elements. You can also collect more items first and build a stronger UserBase later on. Additionally you can strengthen the UserBase by training it. This involves trying to defeat your own UserBase. If successful it will become stronger and more difficult to conquer.

As a stretch goal we plan to offer an Augmented Reality view of Bases and Courses. This will enable you to view your surroundings on screen using the camera and augmented with all the Barricades, UserBase/SuperBase Markers and other GeoObjects.

Available Zappers

 

App availability

We will bring out new releases of ZappYou-Beta every two months with new features until the final release in the second quarter of 2017. Our current release Beta contains Zapping, Obstacle Run and Unit vs Unit-matches. The Beta will be available soon in the App Store and Google Play. You need the Unlimited License to actually play ZappYou.

By supporting us you will get the unlimited Beta license right now and all interim releases. At launch everyone can get the free app and we will convert your license amount to the double amount in Z-currency (used in ZappYou for special boosts).

Team

Our team is a combination of experienced IT guys together with young talent. We all love gaming and outdoor activities.

The two founders were co-responsible for the award-winning innovative social app Superwijzer (transferred to Questionmark) in the Netherlands.

  • Robert Meijer, ­ Founder, CTO and Lead Developer
  • Fer Palasthy, ­ Co Founder and Project Manager
  • Wien Smit, ­ App Developer
  • Sophie de Haan, ­ Art Director, UI/UX Designer
  • Barbara Tammes, Business Development Director
  • Jeroen Brus, Exer Game Specialist
  • Vikash Ramsoekh, Organiser and Tester
  • Henk van Dijken, ­ Copywriter
  • Joyce Ritsema, ­ Marketing and Event Manager
  • Jonathan Sipkema, Filmproducer and editor
  • Jorden van den Berg, Music Producer
  • Warner Verduijn, Sound Effects

Join our community!

Three years ago we came up with an idea for a new killer app. We took it literally. After completing another successful app two years ago, we started the development of ZappYou. We committed our own funds and gathered a new crew. A year ago our friends and family joined us by investing.

Now we turn to you: We need your support to finalize the first virtual laser game for mobile devices!

Start with a license so you can test the new releases coming out in the next six months.

Join our community and discuss the features, realize our plans and help create the best outdoor app game in the world!

The game gets you running outside and performing fun and sometimes challenging moves. Don’t limit the use of your phone to that small screen. Start using it as your tool to play outside.Experience the real world in a new way. Play with your family, friends or colleagues, or anyone nearby! Aspects of the gameGenergy and LifeBytesAt the start of the game and at the start of each new level you will always have 100% Genergy and LifeBytes. For zapping you need Genergy. And different zappers require different amounts of Genergy. If your Genergy runs out, you can just run a short distance to re-Genergize. You can also reset your Level but then you lose the XP for the next Level.When someone else zapps you, you lose LifeBytes. If you run out of LifeBytes before reaching the next level there are several options. Easiest is a 40% boost by watching an ad if you want to avoid resetting your Level and losing your XP. Alternatively you can try to find a LifeByteCharger location, or find a team member with the ChargeMazter role to charge you up again.Best played with headsetIn order to let you play freely we have paid special attention to audio. You can play ZappYou with other players while minimizing screen time and getting all information through text to speech updates and instructions.XP and LevelsWith every successful zapp you will earn XP. With enough XP you can reach higher Levels,  unlocking new features in the game. You will also earn XP by accomplishing special feats, like hitting the same target repeatedly, finishing an Obstacle Run, creating your UserBase or eliminating ZappBots.RolesSuperBases and UserBasesA key feature of ZappYou evolves around the conquering of Bases. Famous landmarks will be set up as SuperBases by the ZappYou organization. These will be difficult to conquer and you will have to work together with other players to accomplish the feat. Once the base is conquered, the top conquerors will become the new owners. They can start strengthening the Superbase by adding more ZappBots, Barricades and ZappTraps. The current owners of the SuperBase can also participate in defending the SuperBase against the next wave of conquerors.On a smaller scale each player can create their own UserBase. At the start your Inventory will already contain a UserBase flag, a ZappBot, ZappTrap and several Barricades. You can decide to build the UserBase with those elements. You can also collect more items first and build a stronger UserBase later on. Additionally you can strengthen the UserBase by training it. This involves trying to defeat your own UserBase. If successful it will become stronger and more difficult to conquer.As a stretch goal we plan to offer an Augmented Reality view of Bases and Courses. This will enable you to view your surroundings on screen using the camera and augmented with all the Barricades, UserBase/SuperBase Markers and other GeoObjects.Available Zappers App availabilityWe will bring out new releases of ZappYou-Beta every two months with new features until the final release in the second quarter of 2017. Our current release Beta contains Zapping, Obstacle Run and Unit vs Unit-matches. The Beta will be available soon in the App Store and Google Play. You need the Unlimited License to actually play ZappYou.By supporting us you will get the unlimited Beta license right now and all interim releases. At launch everyone can get the free app and we will convert your license amount to the double amount in Z-currency (used in ZappYou for special boosts).TeamOur team is a combination of experienced IT guys together with young talent. We all love gaming and outdoor activities.The two founders were co-responsible for the award-winning innovative social app Superwijzer (transferred to Questionmark) in the Netherlands.
Robert Meijer, ­ Founder, CTO and Lead Developer
Fer Palasthy, ­ Co Founder and Project Manager
Wien Smit, ­ App Developer
Sophie de Haan, ­ Art Director, UI/UX Designer
Barbara Tammes, Business Development Director
Jeroen Brus, Exer Game Specialist
Vikash Ramsoekh, Organiser and Tester
Henk van Dijken, ­ Copywriter
Joyce Ritsema, ­ Marketing and Event Manager
Jonathan Sipkema, Filmproducer and editor
Jorden van den Berg, Music Producer
Warner Verduijn, Sound Effects
Join our community!Three years ago we came up with an idea for a new killer app. We took it literally. After completing another successful app two years ago, we started the development of ZappYou. We committed our own funds and gathered a new crew. A year ago our friends and family joined us by investing. Now we turn to you: We need your support to finalize the first virtual laser game for mobile devices!Start with a license so you can test the new releases coming out in the next six months.Join our community and discuss the features, realize our plans and help create the best outdoor app game in the world!

story:
Hey There!!!!

My name is Daniel Dyer. I work in the medical billing field. I am 27 years old originally from NYC and reside in Maryland. I think just about everyone has a dream and goes thru different stages in life to get to that dream.

At the present I am transitioning to a full time poker player. I find that poker has a stereo type that defines it as mere gambling or luck. I find poker to be a game of skill. Luck is of course part of equation as is most things in life. Luck in poker though can be controlled with a solid style of play especially over the long haul. Besides the possibility of financial success poker offers many life lessons. 

Some of these lessons  include bank roll management, patience, tolerance of others, and also math. Poker players have to learn to win with class and lose with the same knowing that correct play will show a profit over time. These are all traits that I and most parents would love there kids to have.

With poker success I would be able to reach out and help other people find a unconventional way to earn extra income, or just learn some life skills. With or without the financial implications Poker has many lessons for society and with your contributions I aim to reach others based on my success. I would also have the opportunity to explore goals after poker.

Funding Goals!

I am a above average player because I study the game and have had excellent results part time. I aim to turn $15000 into a $100000 and move that goal forward accordingly. I will post videos of my progress online (YouTube).

For every $15000 my bank roll improves I will give out commemorative T shirts. When I am able to develop a educational poker product I will also offer that to all contributors. No matter how much I raise I will apoach these goals the same.

Your help is valuable!

Your contribution will be helping to create wealth which in turn can he used to spread positive energy in the world and economy. I have had success as a part time player and aim to make it a full time venture. This is a project that  you will be able to follow and see the results.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute please spread the word positive energy counts!!

Please use the  Indiegogo share tools to spread the word!

Thank You!

story:
Choice: Texas is an interactive fiction game about abortion access in Texas

Choice: Texas is an educational interactive fiction game which will be freely available on the web. Players will explore the game through one of several characters, each of whom reflects specific socioeconomic, geographic, and demographic factors impacting abortion access in Texas. Although billed as interactive fiction, Choice: Texas is based on extensive research into healthcare access, legal restrictions, geography, and demographics, and is reflective of the real circumstances facing women in the state.

Choice: Texas is being developed by Allyson Whipple (writer, editor, and poet) and Carly Kocurek (writer and cultural historian) with the help of illustrator Grace Jennings.

What Funding Will Cover

We are looking to raise $9,250 to fund the completion of the game. This amount covers web development, including design and hosting services; the promotion of the game through conferences; payment for professional illustrations; and, of course, all the neat swag we’re offering to campaign contributors. Funding will ensure the game is as accessible and polished as possible.

This is a flexible fundraising campaign, which means if we raise part of the money, we’ll still receive all funds raised. Because of this, we might wind up with only part of our budget. However, we have carefully prioritized our costs to ensure that we fulfill all our obligations to contributors and still produce a playable game that is published to the web. So, no matter what you contribute, and no matter what the total of funds raised, rest assured that you will be directly contributing to the success of the game.

Stretch Goal: $10,500

(added 9/12/13)

We are excited to announce that we are adding a stretch goal of $10,500. If we reach this level, we'll be working with an established sex educator to produce a collection of lesson plans for high school and college teachers interested in using Choice: Texas in the classroom. These lesson plans will be included as part of the Choice: Texas site and will be freely available for anyone who wants to use them. We have just six days to go, so please spread the word! And, as always, thank you for all the incredible support so far. Choice: Texas wouldn't be possible without you.

Perks

We’re offering a lot of perks at varying levels, most featuring game artwork by Grace Jennings. Grace’s work is beautiful, and we’re thrilled both to be working with her, and to be offering her original illustrations as a perk at the $500 level. While you can see all the perks over in the right column, we’d like to draw your attention to a few in particular:

Tote Bags

We will be producing a limited run of reusable tote bags featuring the Choice: Texas logo. A tote bag will be mailed to everyone who contributes $50 or more.

Producer Credit

If you contribute $250 or more, you will be listed as a producer in the game credits on the official website, alongside the designer, illustrator, and other members of the development team.

Original Artwork

We have a very limited number of original, custom digital illustrations by Grace Jennings. to give away. Each illustration will be of the person or pet you choose, and will be delivered to you electronically for whatever print or electronic use you deem fit. To receive this perk, contribute $500 or more.

(Shipping is included in the price of all perks.)

The Impact

We are billing Choice: Texas as “a very serious game,” and we mean that. While the game is intended to be engaging, the issues it addresses are very serious. Women’s access to reproductive healthcare in Texas is significantly limited, a state of affairs that is especially true for women who are working class or poor, or who live in rural areas. One of the great strengths of games is that they can invite players to explore other people’s experiences; Choice: Texas is such a game, and asks players to seriously consider the plight of Texas women.

Choice: Texas has already gained some positive responses, including acceptance into the Future and Reality of Gaming (F.R.O.G.) 2013 Conference in Vienna. We will have a working prototype of the game prepared by the conference dates in late September, and look forward to completing the game by February 2014. Both Allyson and Carly have a long track record of successful creative projects, ranging from poetry chapbooks to blog posts, to conferences, websites, and public programs. We know we can complete this project. We have already invested the time necessary to complete research and preliminary drafts. Funding will help make Choice: Texas the best it can be.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know not everyone has the resources to contribute financially to this campaign, and that is completely okay. We’re already grateful that you took the time to learn more about our project. But, if you’re excited about the project and want to help out, there are a lot of things you can do, the biggest help of which is getting the word out. Post this campaign to Facebook or Twitter, e-mail your friends, take advantage of IndieGoGo’s social tools. Every bit helps, and is greatly appreciated.

story:
exosyphen studios is an indie studio founded over 10 years ago and authors of the successful Hacker Evolution game series. 

Hacker Evolution is the longest standing game in its genre, hacking simulations.
We are still true to our indie roots and we are probably one of the few companies that offers a very friendly and personal service to its gamers.

What we want to do

Develop the world's first ONLINE MULTIPLAYER hacking simulation game and we want you to be a part of it.
The single player version has already been released and it has enjoyed a great success. Many gamers want us to take this game to the next level and create an online hacking simulation game where you can play against each other.
Take a look at the current single player game to get a feeling of how the online version will look, here:

http://www.HackerEvolutionDuality.com

What we need from you

Funding, valuable ideas and feedback. All our games have been built keeping a close contact with our fans and shaping the games based on their feedback.

Even if we don't reach our funding goal, the game will get developed and we will fund the rest of it. All funds will be accounted for and the entire development process will be transparent. You will get see how a game gets done, behind the curtains.

10 years after we launched our first game we want to see if we still have the same level of trust from our fans.
This is why we are offering some extremely generous perks for all contributors.

We will be offering existing game titles we have released to match the value of your contribution. We are willing to put at stake at least as much as you do.

story:
Here is an article that I wrote a few years ago when I met an outstanding young man named Nishan Patel.

Why Do You Wrestle?

By John Passaro

Yesterday while I was on the side of the mat next to some wrestlers who were warming up for their next match, I found myself standing side by side next to an extraordinary wrestler.

He was warming up and he had that look of desperation on his face that wrestlers get when their match is about to start and their coach is across the gym coaching on another mat in a match that is already in progress.
“Hey do you have a coach.” I asked him.

“He's not here right now.” He quietly answered me ready to take on the task of wrestling his opponent alone.

“Would you mind if I coached you?”

His face tilted up at me with a slight smile and said. “That would be great.”
Through the sounds of whistles and yelling fans I heard him ask me what my name was.

“My name is John.” I replied.

“Hi John, I am Nishan” he said while extending his hand for a handshake.
He paused for a second and then he said to me: “John I am going to lose this match”.

He said that as if he was preparing me so I wouldn’t get hurt when my coaching skills didn’t work magic with him today.

I just said, “Nishan - No score of a match will ever make you a winner. You are already a winner by stepping onto that mat.”

With that he just smiled and slowly ran on to the mat, ready for battle, but half knowing what the probable outcome would be.

When you first see Nishan you will notice that his legs are frail - very frail. So frail that they have to be supported by custom made, form fitted braces to help support and straighten his limbs.

Braces that I recognize all to well.

Some would say Nishan has a handicap.

I say that he has a gift.

To me the word handicap is a word that describes what one “can’t do”.

That doesn’t describe Nishan.

Nishan is doing.

The word “gift” is a word that describes something of value that you give to others.

And without knowing it, Nishan is giving us all a gift.

I believe Nishan’s gift is inspiration.

The ability to look the odds in the eye and say “You don’t pertain to me.”

The ability to keep moving forward.

Perseverance.

A “Whatever it takes” attitude.

As he predicted, the outcome of his match wasn’t great.

That is, if the only thing you judge a wrestling match by is the actual score. Nishan tried as hard as he could, but he couldn’t overcome the twenty-six pound weight difference that he was giving up to his opponent on this day in order to compete. You see, Nishan weighs only 80 pounds and the lowest weight class in this tournament was 106. Nishan knew he was spotting his opponent 26 pounds going into every match on this day. He wrestled anyway.

I never did get the chance to ask him why he wrestles, but if I had to guess I would say, after watching him all day long, that Nishan wrestles for the same reasons that we all wrestle for.

We wrestle to feel alive, to push ourselves to our mental, physical and emotional limits - levels we never knew we could reach.

We wrestle to learn to use 100% of what we have today in hopes that our maximum today will be our minimum tomorrow. We wrestle to measure where we started from, to know where we are now, and to plan on getting where we want to be in the future. We wrestle to look the seemingly insurmountable opponent right in the eye and say, “Bring it on. - I can take whatever you can dish out.”

Sometimes life is your opponent and just showing up is a victory.

You don't need to score more points than your opponent in order to accomplish that.

No Nishan didn’t score more points than any of his opponents on this day, that would have been nice, but I don’t believe that was the most important thing to Nishan. Without knowing for sure - the most important thing to him on this day was to walk with pride like a wrestler up to a thirty two foot circle, have all eyes from the crowd on him, to watch him compete one on one against his opponent - giving it all that he had. That is what competition is all about. Most of the times in wrestling you are competing against yourself. Nishan is no different.

They say 80% of life is just showing up.

Nishan showed up today.

He showed up when most others would have stayed in the stands.

Today all of Nishan’s opponents may have scored more points than him, but he competed. He competed against his opponents, he competed against himself and he competed against life.

And no matter what the score may have said in any one of his matches - he won in every case.

You later learn in life how important the disciplines of wrestling are to you in handling real life problems, especially when facing a seemingly insurmountable opponent in a disease or illness.

If you live long enough, life will throw you to your back.

And when it does - you are much better off if you have had wrestled.

You will know how to fight like hell to get off of your back, to get back on your feet and to move forward.

Chances are that I probably will never see Nishan again.

That is just how life works.

“Wrestling brother” - keep moving forward.

And thank you for the gift.

You are an inspiration.

__________________________________________________________

Prologue:
I have had the pleasure of being Nishan Patel facebook friend for a few years now and I have watched him go after every one of his dreams.

He is currently going to represent the USA at the International Level this summer at the Paralympic games.

He needs some support in order to make that dream a reality.
And I would like to help him make his dream a reality.

story:
OnQui - das vernetzte Quiz

Die Idee ist, das Wissen der Menschen miteinander zu vernetzen. Wer weiß was und wie viel im Vergleich zu den anderen, öffentlich oder anonym. Google vernetzt die Suche, Facebook den sozialen Bereich und OnQui das Wissen der Menschen.

Mein erster Gedanke zu OnQui entstand bereits im Jahr 2010. Damals habe ich überlegt, wie man jedem Menschen einen Wissenskurs, vergleichbar einem Wertpapier Kurs an der Börse, zuordnen kann. Nach vielen Unwegsamkeiten und verschiedensten Versionen ist die aktuelle Version von OnQui daraus entstanden.

Nach mittlerweile 2 Jahren Planung, Entwicklung und Realisierung ist OnQui schon sehr ausgereift und ich erhalte immer wieder Lob und Anregungen von den Spielern. Deshalb möchte ich, wenn irgendwie möglich das Spiel weiter ausbauen und einer breiten Öffentlichkeit zugänglich machen. Allerdings erreicht mittlerweile das Projekt eine personelle und finanzielle Größe die ich alleine nicht mehr stemmen kann.

Ich bin Einzelunternehmer und werde schon von zwei motivierten freiwilligen Helferinnen unterstützt. Für ein tragendes Geschäftskonzept bedarf es jetzt aber einer finanziellen Kraftanstrengung, und da wende ich mich an Dich und die Crowd.

Wenn dir das Konzept gefällt, dann schau doch einfach bei OnQui vorbei und unterstütze uns...

OnQui gibt es mittlerweile schon als
- Desktop Version
- Mobile Version
- Android App im Google Play Store

OnQui als Website 
OnQui als App bei Google Play Store 

Deine Spende wird für was verwendet?

Mit dieser Kampagne finanzierst Du den nächsten Entwicklungsschritt von OnQui.

20% werden verwendet für
- 2000 neue Fragen

20% für
- Head to Head Duell:
Der Spieler kann zusätzlich zum aktuellen Spielmodus Fragen direkt mit anderen Gegenspielern im selben Quizlevel beantworten. Wer die Frage am schnellsten richtig beantwortet ist der Gewinner.

60% für
- Werbung zur Neukundengewinnung im Internet und Google Play Store

Welche Perks erhälst Du?

Als Dankeschön für Deine Spende haben wir uns folgende Perks überlegt:

1.) ein Eintrag in OnQui’s ewiger Spenderliste mit Verlinkung
2.) plus ein eigener individueller Avatar nach deiner Wahl
3.) plus eine visuelle Hervorhebung, dass Du ein Spender von OnQui bist

Falls in Zukunft realisiert:
4.) plus ein kostenloser werbefreie Account für Dich
5.) plus ein 1:1 Guthaben für den Kauf virtueller Güter bei OnQui

Wenn das Kampagnenziel nicht erreicht wird, verwenden wir Dein Geld für die Erstellung neuer Fragen, Online Werbung  und den Perks 1.) und 2.). Allerdings kann das Spiel dann im Augenblick leider nicht weiterentwickelt werden.

Die Auswirkung

Dein finanzieller Beitrag sorgt dafür, dass OnQui weiterentwickelt und wieder ein großes Stück mehr in der Öffentlichkeit (deutschsprachiger Raum) bekannt wird.

Da OnQui als Webapplikation und Android App spielbar ist, kann man jederzeit und überall auf der Welt sein Wissen spielerisch vergrößern. Gerade für Länder mit einem hohen Wissensstandard ist das ein Mehrwert.

Zu meiner Person:
Ich habe Angewandte Physik studiert und mir während den letzten 10 Jahren ein umfangreiches Wissen im Bereich Webentwicklung angeeignet. In den letzten 2 Jahren war ich fast ausschließlich mit OnQui beschäftigt und setze natürlich mein Herzblut in das Projekt. An Motivation fehlt es also nicht.

Andere Wege, wie Du helfen kannst

Wenn dir OnQui gefällt kannst Du uns natürlich gerne weiterempfehlen. Auch das würde uns schon sehr helfen:

  1. eine Weiterempfehlung in deinem Bekanntenkreis
  2. ein Link oder Google+ Empfehlung zu http://onqui.net
  3. ein Facebook Like zu https://www.facebook.com/onqui.net
  4. ein tweet über https://twitter.com/OnQuiNet
  5. ein Download und Bewertung im Google Play Store

story:
September 4th 1951 Harry S. Truman makes the opening speech at a peace conference in San Francisco, this would be the first time a television program was broadcast coast to coast.  This speech would highlight the end of the United States' post war occupation of Japan. The state of the art technology that allowed this transmission were microwave relays.

Thousands of microwave relay towers are scattered across the United States, relics of the amazing system that first connected our nation coast to coast.  I first became interested in these towers in high school a friend took me on a hike to climb on one.  He thought it was a huge air raid siren. With some internet digging I have connected the dots of numerous locations of the remaining towers in California.  I have mapped and planned a route to photograph the towers that still have their microwave transmission horns still attached, many have been destroyed or taken down.  I find these towers to be beautiful relics of amazing civil engineering and I want to document them while they still exist.  

This is where you come in, I need help with the gas money. I have outlined a route that will take me to the four corners of California to photograph 50+ towers.  All of the towers will be documented in beautiful medium format film.  I have already begun the project in my past ramblings around the country. Here are a few of the images I have collected thus far:



This will be an adventure, I will be camping out (hotels are expensive and boring), hiking, biking, probably hopping a few fences, chasing light, sleeping on the side of the road, and whatever else I need to do to document these towers.


here is the rough route of the route I plan to take (with many detours to extremely remote sites).

Los Angeles > Las Vegas > Bakersfield > Santa Barbara > San Jose > Oakland > Sacramento > Redding > Lake Tahoe > Los Angeles.

A more exacting map of the locations of the still intact towers:

The end result will be a group of beautiful photographs to be printed in a 8” x 8” softcover book.  The book/prints will be gifts to you for support.

story:
CHECK UPDATES

For information on the drawings I am offering. You might learn a thing or two more about what I can do.

What's This All About?

So, they call me Cessy. At least online they do ...
I'm not only a youtuber, but I'm a gamer. I've been obsessed with gaming since I was a young girl, and now, so many years later, I'm still at it. Only now, I'm able to share my games with the world through the all so wonderful YouTube.

I've been uploading Let's Plays for just about a year now, and it's truly become quite the passion. It's entertaining to many, and I'm doing what I enjoy doing best, so it's a win win situation really.
Unfortunately though, with these new popular games that are coming out and are becoming more and more advanced, as well as requested, I have come to an almost standstill. This little Acer computer can't seem to handle such great graphics, let alone recording my progress within.
You see, I have some of those high graphics games, and when I play them, I am only able to do so reducing the graphics to low quality, and that's not exactly what I want to show to my fans. I don't find it fair to them, to have them look at really bad quality video. I wouldn't enjoy it, so why would they?
With a new computer, a much more powerful one, I will be able to do what I can only dream of doing right now.
Not only would I be able to enjoy these games with amazing high graphic quality, but I will be able to continue sharing my Let's Plays with the world. Or well, my subscribers that is.
With more quality content, I might even be able to get that partnership I've been aiming towards. The better the quality, the better my chances.

Let's just say that I am ready to move up in the gaming world. I just can't do it just yet.

What's In It For You?

Top of the line gaming computers aren't cheap. The better they are, the more expensive. That's why I'm asking for the money that I am. That $3500 will not only get me one of those top of the line gaming computers, but if I have any let over, I will be able to even get a better quality monitor to show the graphics even better. But that would be for my eyes only. The tower itself is what my heart is yearning for. The one that can bring my gaming to life, and the best quality video for youtube. Something that I just can't wait to achieve.

What do you get out of it? Well, that's quite simple. I'm gathering up whatever resources I can, and giving what I can. Everyone will get a shoutout in a video of mine. In fact, once this campaign is over, whether or not I reach my goal, I will record a video, giving a shoutout to each and every contributor, whether you've donated $1 to $10 to any other amount.
For many, there will be chibi pictures drawn. For others, non-chibi anime pictures. Ah yes, have I mentioned my love of drawing as well? No, I don't believe that I have ...
There will be twitter shoutouts, steam adds, and even meet-ups if you live in the Toronto area. Gaming meet ups of course!
For a limited few, there will be a few games involved that I have indeed received for free, though you will need a steam account to receive them.

Other perks include co-op gaming, uploaded onto youtube including shoutouts, especially if you have a youtube account, gaming or not. I may not be a large youtuber just yet, but I will get there.

Aside from all those perks, as time goes on, I will add even more of them, all depending on what happens between now and 60 days from now.

Ultimately, if I achieve my goal, and have the money leftover, I can use that to purchase other games to not only play myself, but to give to you amazing donators <3 I love you all.

If I do not reach my goal, rest assured that the money received will still go towards a new gaming computer. Even if a little, it will help bring myself closer to a beautiful new gaming rig that will allow me much better videos for the world.

 

But ... Why?

Video game graphics have grown and expanded so much. They have become almost realistic, and are getting better every day. Unfortunately, as these graphics advance, so do gaming computers. The RAM, the processor cores, sound cards, graphic cards ... just about everything within a computer would need to be able to keep up with that particular video game. Either that, or you're stuck not only playing with minecraft-like graphics, but also with lag (and if you're a gamer, you know how annoying that is) and a really bad quality recording. Assuming that recording program will even be able to work if you're using up all the memory just for the game. It's just such an expensive thing to keep up with.

I know I'm just some girl you've never met, and you're probably asking yourself, why help?
Well, you're right. I am just a simple girl who enjoys video games. But see, because of this passion, I have grown to be who I am. When I realized that I could record my gaming, upload it to youtube, and possibly one day become a partner and even get paid for it, I was in awe. Get paid for doing something that I enjoy? I didn't even know that was possible.
Well, surprisingly to most, it is possible. Unfortunately, it does take a little bit of time to get to that point. Time and money. I have the time ... it's the money that's becoming harder and harder to get. Even with jobs, bills and other life necessities seem to get in the way of a dream this grand.
I am a simple girl yes. But I'm a girl with a big dream.

Wolves of the Night Gaming is not just for me. It's for all the gamers who are interested in watching Let's Plays and tutorials. All gamers who wish to have a laugh with the jokes that are said. For all who just want to sit back, and have a good time watching a video that they can relate with and know that the graphics aren't ... well, crappy. You can help, and you won't regret it. Even you will be able to see how much better the quality will become.

 

You can't donate? That's quite alright!

As I said before, even with jobs, it is quite difficult to save money. But aside from just that, it's even harder to donate to a cause you may just want to support.
There are other ways you can help though.
Tell your friends. Tell your family. Tell anyone you know. Maybe, just maybe, there's someone out there who has a few extra dollars they are willing to help out with. Whether it's $1 or $5, every little bit counts. And trust me, every little bit does help, especially in this case.
A tweet, a facebook share, even a link share to a guild, league, clan etc ... or even a youtube shoutout. I would appreciate every bit of help I can get.
You'd be surprised how far just a little shoutout can go.

story:
Short Summary

Star Wars: The Old Republic is a Massive Multiplayer Online Game (MMO) developed by Bioware. One the of the classes players can choose has been so poorly managed by the developers at Bioware that it has become nearly unplayable at the highest level of the game. The developers have ignored the warnings, evidence, and fixes offered by the community on SWTOR's official forums and we would like to send the message in a different way.

What We Need & What You Get

We want to deliver a message to the developers in the form of a cake, cookies, or other edible item. The message might be snarky, witty, plaintive, or plain. We just want Bioware to see how serious we are about this class imbalance being an issue in their game.

Each delivered cake would be about $85 and 3 dozen cake balls would be about $75. We will send as many items as we can afford based on donations, and those with perks will be able to make their choices well ahead of time.
