story:
Help us spread the word about EVIDENTA by supporting it! We truly believe in success of this unique game, but we need your help to make it real. Every single claim will bring us a little bit closer to our goal - funding the project and starting the production.

We did our best and now everything is in your hands!




DID YOU EVER WONDER WHAT WOULD BE IF THERE WERE NO LIMITS IN A CARD GAME

Evidenta has very little similarities with other card games. It is not played like other games and does not follow similar rules and principles. Evidenta is a NEW and UNIQUE card game that supports UNLIMITED number of players and enables you to CUSTOMIZE game rules and play it however you want! Instead of too boring or complicated rules which other card games trap you in (with no way to escape them, arghr!), we are offering you something COMPLETELY DIFFERENT! It is truly a full 180 degree turn in "classic" card game logic.

Thanks to its smart design, Evidenta utilizes your own INTELLIGENCE and CREATIVITY to get the most fun out of it. For the first time, each and every player is also a PROACTIVE GAME AUTHOR! With Evidenta, EVERY SINGLE GAME can be played THE WAY YOU WANT with THE RULES YOU CHOOSE. There are literally NO LIMITATIONS in what you can do with this game!


BASIC GAME CONCEPT

Game consists of Letter Deck, Category Deck, Joker Deck and Player Boards. You can use any of them, any combination of them or all of them to create and play different game scenarios. Letter Deck, Category Deck and Joker Deck are decks of different cards you can combine during the play. Player Boards can be used to write down your results and to compare them to results of other players. Basic game pack consists of 2 decks (1 × Letter Deck and 1 × Category Deck) and 5 Player Boards, but what's cool is that you can add any number of decks or Player Boards (available in Silver, Gold and Author packages) to make your games more fun or harder to play.




GAME DESIGN

Both Decks and Player Boards are professionally designed and made for one and one purpose only - to give you the best possible playing experience. Here are some examples of cards back and front sides, together with one already filled out Player Board:



PACKAGES DETAILS

First of all, thank you for your interest in for helping fund this great and unique game! We truly appreciate it.


There are 5 different IndieGoGo Community packages available for you to choose. ONLINE, BASIC and SILVER PACKAGES are available in unlimited quantities and you can order them at any moment before end of the funding process. However, please note that GOLD and AUTHOR PACKAGES are strictly limited editions. There is just 150 × GOLD PACKAGES and only 15 × AUTHOR PACKAGES available and if you plan to claim one, our advice is to do it as soon as possible (before someone else takes it). Those limited editions represent great collector's value and we are sure you do not want to miss them.

We tried our best to keep claim amounts as low as possible and tried to give you as much as we could for you money. Our primary aim is to reach project founding goal and start the production. Any extra funds after that goal will be directed towards marketing activities and further game design & game play development.


  • APL (AWESOME PEOPLE LIST) / Only awesome people can get on it. You do not want to miss it. It is a pure awesome awesomeness.
  • PDF / All PDFs will be in HIGH QUALITY 300dpi resolution, featuring both FULL COLOR + B&W layout so you can choose output that suits you best.
  • DECKS / Ah, the mighty decks! All decks will be printed on HQ card paper with additional UV protective layer, packed in box and sealed against dust.
  • PLAYER BOARDS / Without them you won't be able to play many game scenarios. All Player Boards will be printed on fully recyclable paper sheets.
  • OFFICIAL RULES (+ GAME SCENARIOS EXAMPLES) / Look here for cool ideas how you can to play game.
  • JOKER DECK / A deck of face-blank cards. Use them to make your own cool Letters or Category cards. Or to draw scary monsters. Anything goes.
  • GOLD / AUTHOR T-SHIRT / High Quality T-Shirts with Evidenta Gold supporter or Author titles.
  • SURPRISE / Randomly selected item: additional Letter deck, Category deck, Joker deck or 45 Player Boards.
  • AUTHOR CARD / Special-type card with author-code that enables you to submit your game scenarios to official list. Only 15 Author cards will be available, so if you want to see your own game scenario and your name in official list, be quick before someone else takes it!
  • LSN CERTIFICATE / All Author packages will come with exclusive collectors decks that will have lowest community serial numbers possible. This official certificate will prove their authenticity and thus raise both sentimental and money values of the whole Author package.
  • 50% FUTURE DISCOUNT / 50 % discount coupon for purchasing any of future Evidenta game edition.


FIND OUT MORE

To find out more about this game and how it's meant to be played, visit OFFICIAL EVIDENTA WEB SITE and check GAME and PLAY sections. You can track project status, daily news and updates using WALL section. You can also use WALL section if you wish to contact us, follow our Twitter account, cast your vote regarding this game or simply read what game testers think about the game. Have fun!
story_txt:
Help us spread the word about EVIDENTA by supporting it! We truly believe in success of this unique game, but we need your help to make it real. Every single claim will bring us a little bit closer to our goal - funding the project and starting the production. We did our best and now everything is in your hands!


DID YOU EVER WONDER WHAT WOULD BE IF THERE WERE NO LIMITS IN A CARD GAME




Evidenta has very little similarities with other card games. It is not  played like other games and does not follow similar rules and  principles. Evidenta is a NEW and UNIQUE card game that supports UNLIMITED number of players and enables you to CUSTOMIZE game rules and play it however you want! Instead of too boring or complicated rules which other card games trap you in (with no way to escape  them, arghr!), we are offering you something COMPLETELY DIFFERENT! It is truly a full 180 degree turn in "classic" card game logic.     



Thanks to its smart design, Evidenta utilizes your own INTELLIGENCE and CREATIVITY to get the most fun out of it. For the first time, each and every player is also a PROACTIVE GAME AUTHOR! With Evidenta, EVERY SINGLE GAME can be played THE WAY YOU WANT with THE RULES YOU CHOOSE. There are literally NO LIMITATIONS in what you can do with this game!



BASIC GAME CONCEPT
Game consists of Letter Deck, Category Deck, Joker Deck and Player Boards. You can use any of them, any combination of them or all of them to create and play different game scenarios. Letter Deck, Category Deck and Joker Deck are decks of different cards you can combine during the play. Player Boards can be used to write down your results and to compare them to results of other players. Basic game pack consists of 2 decks (1 × Letter Deck and 1 × Category Deck) and 5 Player Boards, but what's cool is that you can add any number of decks or Player Boards (available in Silver, Gold and Author packages) to make your games more fun or harder to play.


GAME DESIGN
Both Decks and Player Boards are professionally designed and made for
 one and one purpose only - to give you the best possible playing 
experience. Here are some examples of cards back and front sides, 
together with one already filled out Player Board:






PACKAGES DETAILS
First of all, thank you for your interest in for helping fund this great and unique game! We truly appreciate it.
There are 5 different IndieGoGo Community packages available for you to choose. ONLINE, BASIC and SILVER PACKAGES are available in unlimited quantities and you can order them at any moment before end of the funding process. However, please note that GOLD and AUTHOR PACKAGES are strictly limited editions. There is just 150 × GOLD PACKAGES and only 15 × AUTHOR PACKAGES available and if you plan to claim one, our advice is to do it as soon as possible (before someone else takes it). Those limited editions represent great collector's value and we are sure you do not want to miss them.We tried our best to keep claim amounts as low as possible and tried to give you as much as we could for you money. Our primary aim is to reach project founding goal and start the production. Any extra funds after that goal will be directed towards marketing activities and further game design & game  play development.

 



APL (AWESOME PEOPLE LIST) / Only awesome people can get on it. You do not want to miss it. It is a pure awesome awesomeness.

PDF / All PDFs will be in HIGH QUALITY 300dpi resolution, featuring both FULL COLOR + B&W layout so you can choose output that suits you best.

DECKS / Ah, the mighty decks! All decks will be printed on HQ card paper with additional UV protective layer, packed in box and sealed against dust.

PLAYER BOARDS / Without them you won't be able to play many game scenarios. All Player Boards will be printed on fully recyclable paper sheets.

OFFICIAL RULES (+ GAME SCENARIOS EXAMPLES) / Look here for cool ideas how you can to play game.

JOKER DECK / A deck of face-blank cards. Use them to make your own cool Letters or Category cards. Or to draw scary monsters. Anything goes.

GOLD / AUTHOR T-SHIRT / High Quality T-Shirts with Evidenta Gold supporter or Author titles.

SURPRISE / Randomly selected item: additional Letter deck, Category deck, Joker deck or 45 Player Boards.

AUTHOR CARD / Special-type card with author-code that enables you to submit your game scenarios to official list. Only 15 Author cards will be available, so if you want to see your own game scenario and your name in official list, be quick before someone else takes it!

LSN CERTIFICATE / All Author packages will come with exclusive collectors decks that will have lowest community serial numbers possible. This official certificate will prove their authenticity and thus raise both sentimental and money values of the whole Author package. 

50% FUTURE DISCOUNT / 50 % discount coupon for purchasing any of future Evidenta game edition. 



FIND OUT MORE

To find out more about this game and how it's meant to be played, visit OFFICIAL EVIDENTA WEB SITE and check GAME and PLAY
 sections. You can track project status, daily news and updates using WALL section. You can also use WALL
 section if you wish to contact us, follow our Twitter account, cast 
your vote regarding this game or simply read what game testers think 
about the game. Have fun!

story:
Everybody has been on the receiving end of an awkward comment or a backhanded compliment.  Did you let it go or did you clap back?!

The Ultimate Clap Back™ is a game of witty banter that’s sure to liven up your next party!  If you enjoy party games and don't take yourself too seriously--this game is for you!

How To Play

For 3-8 players.  Ages 17+

At the beginning of the game each player gets dealt 5 yellow clap back cards.

A player draws from the pink deck and says what’s on the card to another player.  That player then responds with their wittiest clap back.

For example:

If the clap back is strong, they have won the hand.  The first person to win 5 hands, win the game!

Why I Need Your Help

In order for The Ultimate Clap Back ™ to reach your card table, I’ll need your support.  I have worked really hard at creating not only a game, but also an experience you will want to have many times over!  Your funds will go towards production, marketing, and the launch of the game.

Testimonials 

“So much fun!”-April E.

“When can I buy it?”-Andre G.

“You’ll say things you’d never say in real life…and you’ll like it!”-Katie H.

“The perfect game where you can talk about somebody and not feel bad for it!”-Jawan J.

“It’s a great way to get everyone laughing, relaxed and having a good time!”-Ariel B.

About Me

The idea for the game came out of the need to channel anxiety into something creative.  Anyone who knows me will tell you, I am quick-witted and like to have a lot of fun.  And with so much going on in the world, we all could use a little laughter--it’s good for the soul! 

Other Ways You Can Help

I appreciate the support even if it’s not coming from a financial donation.  You can definitely help by sharing the campaign with your social media networks, family and friends!

Thank you for your support.

story:
Both campaigns: (take a look in both, in the other campaign may still have Early Bids you want ;)  )

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/976565434/hungry-troll-3-bb-teams

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/hungry-troll-3-bb-teams/x/1702006#/

TOTAL funding quantity (Will BE updateD the soon as posible):

Kick Starter : 7.114 €

Indiegogo: €13,141 EUR

TOTAL:  20,255 €

 

Hi Coaches and other miniature addicts.

 

 

Here we come again with a Fantasy Football campaign. This time with 3 teams at the same time!

Why this time 3 team? , easy; managing a crowfunding campaign takes a lot of effort and time, I decided with my 2 year crowfunding experience that is better to make a big great campaign per year than several of 3 or 4 Moths ones.

This gives me more time to ensure all is perfect (greens, casting and shipping). On your side more stretch goals will be unlocked making 3 teams at the same time and you won´t need to be alert the rest of the year for new surprise and fast campaigns.

 

You won´t see here super pro and pretty look designed campaign with propainted models for a very good reason. This is a crowfunding not a preorder, the models you see here are first shot of the sculptor’s work. On this stage of the production process we are able to change some things counting on your campaign feedback, please I read all your opinions don’t be shy.

Other reason for not seeing a very professional presentation is that our efforts are focused on making the best miniatures and is there where we expend all our time.

 

Another very important detail. This campaign will be in both platforms; Kick Starter and Indiegogo. I am making this as a transition for making the next year’s project only on Kick Starter because people use to prefer it than Indiegogo.

For not losing all the previous Indiegogo bakers I am making this double effort.

Of course THE QUANTITY OF BOTH CAMPAIGNS WILL BE ADDED for unlocking new miniatures and TH Coins

 

I strong suggest you to Like the Hungry Trolls FB for updates and follow Frangne Didier to see in real life timing of the Jurassic Team sculpting.

https://www.facebook.com/Hungry-Troll-540034649355012/

https://www.facebook.com/myfor

 

 

And here comes the candy, the miniatures:

I will be adding a lot of photos in the gallery to show you every detail of all the miniatures.

 

 

Lizards, Jurassic Team

One of the beast ideas I came up with is a Lizardmen team of dinosaurs.

Very easy to difference between the saurus and the little ones.

This team is going to be finish in few weeks but this is not a problem for timing because being sculpted by hand and doesn’t need to be printed as the 3D desings.

 

 

Norses, Fenrir  sons

A very well executed and representative miniatures for this team.

These beer drinkers are the most representative miniatures of the norse background.

 

 

 

 

Chaos Dwarves, Kharlm Bastards

 

As a result of an infidelity between a dwarf and a succubus these dwarf/demons come out.

They have the same thirst as his brothers for bloodweiser but they like too slaving goblins and making demonic artefacts.

 

 

PERKS , what you get for your gold?:

 

Teams perk explanation:

 

Jurassic Dinolizard team

1 Spinogor - Kroxi

6 Saurus

10 Skinks (3 alternative heads)

 

Markers set (turn, RR and ball)

Numbers set (1-16)

 


 

ONE CROWFUNDING EXCLUSIVE FREE EXTRA SKINK!

 

 

 

FULL MINIATURE GALLERY:
https://www.facebook.com/540034649355012/photos/?tab=album&album_id=1379406358751166

 

 

Fenrir sons

 

1 Yeti - Snow Troll

2 Wolfmen

2 Thrower

2 Catcher

2 Blitzer

7 Linemen

 

Markers set (turn, RR and ball)

Numbers set (1-16)

FULL MINIATURE GALLERY:

https://www.facebook.com/540034649355012/photos/?tab=album&album_id=1379408772084258

 


Khralm Bastards

 

1 Minotaur

2 Centaur

6 Dwarf

7 Goblin

 

Markers set (turn, RR and ball)

Numbers set (1-16)

 

FULL MINIATURE GALLERY:
https://www.facebook.com/Hungry-Troll-540034649355012/photos
 

 

 

Perk 1 Addoms:

This perk is for taking separated miniatures.

If you are already a funder or not and want to add more miniatures to your package take this perk and add the quantity of the miniature/s you are going to add.

 

*If you have taken a full Jurassic team, Fenrir sons team or Kharim Bastards team the shipping will be free with the team. If you haven´t taken any of those teams the shipping will be calculate after the campaign ends depending on the total package weight.

 

IMPORTANT

In case you want to add a basic miniature of the 3 teams it must be in metal. For example, you take a team of Fenrir sons in resin and you want to add an extra Linemen number 3, he will be supplied in metal.

The reason for this is that resin teams have been ordered only as full 16 miniature teams for being able to offer them with this great low prices.

(MODIFIED! : NOW YOU CAN TAKE EXTRA BASIC POSITIONAL FROM THE TEAMS IN BOTH MATERIALS) Only the unlocked minis will be casted in metal.

 

Perk 20 - 6 team pack:

You can choose 6 of the 3 crowfunding teams in resin or metal or if you prefer even one the previous teams (Hungry Ogres [6 ogres, 11 snotling] or Plague Fields [14 miniatures team]). Every unlocked coin will count for 6 on this perk, for example if the total crowfundings amount is 10000€ you will have 6x2=12 coins to spend in extras.

 

 

 

Stretch goals:

 

This time instead of getting one specific miniature/freebie you will get a Hungry Troll Coin.

These coins can be change from any Hungry Troll Catalogue or new campaign miniatures.

 Here you have a table with all the miniatures by range of 1, 2 and 3 coins, depending on the miniatures size.

When the campaign finished I will send you the pledge manager so you can choose the minis your prefer.

 

IMPORTANT

In case you want to change HT Coins for a basic miniature of the 3 teams it must be in metal. For example, you take a team of Fenrir sons in resin and you want to add an extra Linemen number 3, he will be supplied in metal.

The reason for this is that resin teams have been ordered only as full 16 miniature teams for being able to offer them with this great low prices.

(MODIFIED! : NOW YOU CAN TAKE EXTRA BASIC POSITIONAL FROM THE TEAMS IN BOTH MATERIALS) Only the unlocked minis will be casted in metal. 

 

 

ANTI BREXIT COINT!

Do you live in the UK? then you will have a FREE COIN to use it in the 12 September crowfunding.

Why I do this? Because with the Brexit the pound was devalued. United Kingdom is where BB was born and I know a lot of great costumers there. This is my way to compensate this non BB related event.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

New campaign miniatures will be unlocked as the campaign gets more funds.

 

 

 

BOTH CAMPAIGNS INDIEGOGO/KICK STARTER will be added to unlock HT Coins and new miniatures.

 

 

 

 

 

 


Casting and quality materials:

 

 

 

 

 

 

I think no metal casting explanation is needed, you have seen the copies in previous campaign and Hungry Troll miniatures, the best of the best white metal.

 

Big Child plastic resin casting.

I discover some Months ago these cool guys live near my home and make a test ordering the miniature of the Freak Wars event, the Freak Warrior.

I have seen the standing detail of resin in other companies and this one too. But what makes it different is the little flexibility that makes the miniature near to unbreakable. Very good news for FF players who use to over abuse our minis on the field.

Resin will be only available for full team sets. During the campaign if a big model (big guy or little bigger) is unlocked we may see the possibility of casting it in resin.

 

This time let me introduce you Big Child Creatives, resin casters of Black Sailors and most of the Cool Mini Or Not miniatures range among other renamed companies.

For small resin casting we will make in GRx Creations, the company who casted Plague Fields.

 

 

 

 

Who is on this campaign?

4 Sculptors

2 concept art designers

3 casters

1 sales manager

 

There is a lot of people involve this time, just working for you to make the best miniatures

 

 

Pedro Ramos, Poncho

Abilities: Hand Sculptor and illustrator

Description: Poncho is one of the most renamed Fantasy Bowl sculptors. He has sculpted more than 200 miniatures related to this game. If you have been in Fantasy Football no more words are needed. His knowledge sculpting BB miniatures and draws helped a lot Fancagne to make the Jurassic Team.

Campaign : Jurassic team concept art and technical advice.

www.ramos-gallery.blogspot.com

 

Fancagne Didier

Abilities: Hand Sculptor

Description: Very skilled sculptor who has work for a lot of companies and has his own brand Kaha Miniatures. His skill sculpting semi human/animal and dinosaur miniatures catch my eye from the first time and decided that if Hungry Troll made a Lizardmen team should be him who sculpt it.

Campaign : Jurassic team sculptor

http://www.kahaminiatures.com/boutique/

 

Adrian Perez Montejano

Abilities: 3D Sculptor

Description: Starting his company Lost Kingdom Miniatures just few Months ago he revealed a great skill sculpting chaos dwarfs. That is the reason to make his Medieval Fantasy Chaos Dwarf in to a BB team.

Campaign : Chaos Dwarf Sculptor.

https://www.facebook.com/LostKingdomMiniatures/

 

Raúl Villareal

Abilities: Expert painter, Hand/3D Sculptor and Illustrator

Description: As in other campaigns Raul helps me a lot showing imagines form the miniatures and making resumes of for extras Perks and stretch goals that make fast and easier to see the campaign details.

Campaign : 3D doc reviser/sculptor and  Illustrator

 

 

Juan Willke, Videador

Abilities: Crowfunding gold summoner

Description:  Hungry Troll owner. As I always say; -I am not a good sculptor, or painter or even don´t know well to play the game so what I can do for the BB world is to make miniatures for it- . Nothing makes me happier than having a miniature company and being able to live working on it.

Campaign : Organize, shipping, respond emails, etc.. (manage the campaign).

www.Hungry-troll.com

 

 

Clockwork Goblin Miniatures

3D Printing service.

Working with then in the last campaign showed me his fast and great quality of 3D printing.

 

 

B-Hidalgo-Beneito Military Miniatures

White Metal Casting

 

 

Big Child Creatives

Plastic Resin Casting.

A great detail of this company is that his central office in only 15 minutes away from my home!

This will speed un a lot the casting process because I can visit them time to time to see the progress or delivery/collecting greens or castings.

 

 

Risks and challenges:

 

If is are already a Backer for previous crowfundings you know I use to have some delays, but always for a good reason; giving you the best miniatures the industry can provide. And if I get a delay longer than 2-3 Moths I always find the way to compensate you for it.

Check previous projects, you will see at the end all are happy and surprised with quality and great deal they with funding the project.

Casting in two material delay some of the models casting but at the end you will get 100% guaranteed the best quality product in less than a year.

That is the reason to make his Medieval Fantasy Chaos Dwarf in to a BB team.Campaign : Chaos Dwarf Sculptor.https://www.facebook.com/LostKingdomMiniatures/ Raúl VillarealAbilities: Expert painter, Hand/3D Sculptor and IllustratorDescription: As in other campaigns Raul helps me a lot showing imagines form the miniatures and making resumes of for extras Perks and stretch goals that make fast and easier to see the campaign details.Campaign : 3D doc reviser/sculptor and  Illustrator  Juan Willke, VideadorAbilities: Crowfunding gold summonerDescription:  Hungry Troll owner. As I always say; -I am not a good sculptor, or painter or even don´t know well to play the game so what I can do for the BB world is to make miniatures for it- . Nothing makes me happier than having a miniature company and being able to live working on it.Campaign : Organize, shipping, respond emails, etc.. (manage the campaign).www.Hungry-troll.com  Clockwork Goblin Miniatures3D Printing service.Working with then in the last campaign showed me his fast and great quality of 3D printing.  B-Hidalgo-Beneito Military MiniaturesWhite Metal Casting  Big Child CreativesPlastic Resin Casting.A great detail of this company is that his central office in only 15 minutes away from my home!This will speed un a lot the casting process because I can visit them time to time to see the progress or delivery/collecting greens or castings.  Risks and challenges: If is are already a Backer for previous crowfundings you know I use to have some delays, but always for a good reason; giving you the best miniatures the industry can provide. And if I get a delay longer than 2-3 Moths I always find the way to compensate you for it.Check previous projects, you will see at the end all are happy and surprised with quality and great deal they with funding the project.Casting in two material delay some of the models casting but at the end you will get 100% guaranteed the best quality product in less than a year.

story:
About Myself


  • I'm Oscar Travis, and I'm a 16 year old guy with almost no experience.
  • I want to raise enough money for me to be able to get a capable computer that can help me expand my Youtube channel, where I record game play and tell stories over the gameplay. I'm currently unable to make the quality of content that I'd like to be making, as the only way for me to record and edit videos is tedious and limited to the few effects I am allowed.
  • With your assistance and contribution, I will be able to get a capable computer that would allow me to record and edit with higher quality, better effects, more options, faster rendering times, and easily accessable features that would cut down time done editing to a fraction of what it takes with the current technology that I have now.
  • If you wanna take a look at my YouTube channel (which I haven't uploaded to seriously in a few months, as what I have now is hard to record and edit with) the link is as follows: http://tinyurl.com/hy7guhr (A word of warning to those easily triggered by "curse words" I swear. A lot. If you're faint-of-heart and can't watch a video of a teenager saying weird things, don't.)

What I Need & What You Get


  • I need roughly $1,400 in total for all costs. Roughly $1,000 for the computer, and an extra $400 for any peripherals I need to replace, and minus 5% (about $70) that Indiegogo takes, the 3-5% that is taken through PayPal, and the 3% taken from credit card payments, all stemming from the belief that all $1,400 will be raised by the end of the 31 day campaign. The whole list of items for the computer itself can be found at this link: http://pcpartpicker.com/guide/WqV323/great-gami...
  • This campaign includes 0 perks, but just because of that doesn't mean you shouldn't donate! People who donate get to know that they got me that much farther to getting what I've wanted and needed for years!

The Impact


  • I've been into gaming and entertainment ever since I was two, when I used to play those old Harry Potter games on a computer with Windows XP, and ever since then it was a dream of mine to be able to use my love of gaming to entertain people. Now, with Youtube, I can do exactly that, and make videos in which I play games with interesting commentary, whether it be a life experience or just me rambling awkwardly whilst playing a game.

Risks & Challenges


  • The biggest risk is not getting to the goal by the end of the campaign, and without the full goal, I cannot build the computer as soon as I hoped that I would be able to build it by.

Other Ways You Can Help


  • Donating isn't the only way to help! You can also ask your friends to donate, and share my campaign to your wall for friends of yours to look at and check out.

story:
Lore:

The corridor leading to the portal, known as The Cleft of Dread, is formed by hundreds of towering glacial shards that seem to pierce the surface of the Ka’O Plateau as they jut skyward. The shards are the only portion of the plateau that do not thaw as the seasons change. The result is that passage through is frigid no matter the season. The winds that pass through the cleft produce a foreboding howl that carries low whispers of each champion’s own demise in terrifying detail. It is disturbing enough to some champions to turn them back and is yet another example of the diverse trials each champion must face during the journey to the tournament.

Next Tournament:

The third Champion's Summit Tournament is taking place on Sunday, June 21st for the European region and on Sunday, June 28th for the North American region! Both will begin at 18:00 server time (14:00 Eastern).

Funding:

All contributions to Champions Summit Tournament Series (less IndieGoGo fees) will go to the tournament's prize pool to be distributed to two grand-prize winning teams--one for each of the European and North American regional tournaments! Our team receives none of the proceeds for organizing the tournament. We do it purely out of our love for Bloodline Champions and out of our commitment to grow its player base. 

The first-place team of the European tournament will be awarded 60% of the prize pool, and the first-place team of the North American tournament will be awarded 40% of the total prize pool.

Finally, if we exceed this month's goal by more than 50% we will put the additional money toward next month's tournament!

Stretch Goal:

If we reach $900 all qualified participants of the next tournament will receive their choice of an armored or gender change outfit! (This is a "pick one" reward.)

Perks:

Contributions of $5 or more will be awarded the silver in-game title,"Turn Back!" and the silver in-game avatar shown below:

Contributions of $10 or more will be awarded the in-game title and avatar above, as well as a select Celebrate Emote or select Silver Weapon. (Metal Warden is the only bloodline that does not have any silver weapons.)

Contributions of $20 or more will be awarded the in-game title and avatar from the first two perks, as well as a select Armored Oufit or select Gender Outfit.

You must choose between the in-game items for each of the perks. You will not receive both.

Contributions of $150 or more may reserve one of the three unique gold avatars below. These avatars are one of a kind! That's right, no one else in Bloodline Champions has or will ever have the avatar you choose!

Once you have chosen this perk, you will be contacted promptly so that you can relay your choice to us. Please be sure to include the best possible contact information during your contribution process.

In addition to the prize money, the tournament's two winning teams will be awarded this special animated in-game avatar.

Keys for these perks will be emailed to contributors upon conclusion of the campaign. You can then use them to unlock the content in game!

story:
Short Summary:

The Aviation Hall of Fame and Museum of NJ, first state aviation hall of fame in the nation, is restoring the last remaining Martin 202A airliner in the world, N-93204. A total of 47 of these twin-engine propeller aircraft were built in the late 1940’s and early 1950’s as a possible replacement for the legendary DC-3. The years have taken their toll and our museum now has the last surviving example of this Martinliner.

A recent grant to completely refurbish the aircraft’s interior was cut in half at the last moment. We were left without the funds to tackle the cockpit. The $1000 we are looking for will enable us to do that once we have finished the passenger cabin restoration.

Literally thousands of people, many of them children, have had the opportunity to imagine what air travel was like in 1950 by touring our Martin 202 since we opened the exhibit nearly 30 years ago. This project will allow them to have a sense of what it was like to board N-93204 when she was brand new!

What We Need and What You Get

The $1,000 will, along with the labor of our dedicated corps of volunteers, be sufficient to restore the two-person cockpit to basically new condition. Work will include refurbishing, and in some cases replacing, all instruments, restoring the instrument panels themselves as well as the sidewalls and flooring (pilot seats are being recovered as part of the original grant.)

We offer the following perks for donors:

1. A $15 or more donation makes you a member of the Aviation Hall of Fame and Museum of NJ with all membership benefits, including our Horizons newsletter and free admission to the Museum.

2. A $50 or more donation will get you a copy of the book: Images of Aviation: Newark Airport by Henry Holden (N-93204 was a regular visitor at Newark flying for TWA and, later, Allegheny.)

3. A $100 or more donation means a brass plate with your name engraved on it mounted directly on the front cabin bulkhead with a thans for what you have helped us accomplish.

The Impact:

Besides the satisfaction of knowing you are taking part in the preservation of a literally one-of-a-kind classic propliner you will also be enabling us to continue our twofold mission of preserving the distinguished history of human flight in the Garden State while also inspiring young people to become the pilots, engineers and astronauts of tomorrow.

Risks and Challenges:

We are a small museum and although we have a track record going back to our chartering over 40 years ago it is always difficult for us to raise money for vital restoration programs like this one. If we do not meet our goal here the Martin 202 cockpit will not be restored to the level it might otherwise have been. The restoration, such as it will be, will also be delayed.

Other Ways You Can Help:

Please get the word out to the airliner and aviation enthusiast community so we can reach our goal. Please also consider sharing the Martin 202 cockpit project through the IndiGoGo share tools.

Thank you!

story:
What

A day of gaming, where gamers from southern Vancouver Island can come together, play board games, RPGs etc and meet new people.  Bring your own games to play, or contribute to/borrow from the game library.

Highlights of the day include:

Board game tournament - 3 round robin games followed by a final 4th game for the top 5 participants; tournament starts at 12:00

Netrunner tournament - starting at 2:30

Door prizes - admission fee includes one entry; draws will be held throughout the day

Learn to play - various board and RPGs will have learn to play sessions throughout the day

Game library - participants are invited to bring their own games to loan to the game library; every 5 games loaned to the library earns an additional entry for the door prize draws (ID will be required to borrow games from the library)

Silent auction - bring your used games etc and include them in the silent auction (10% fee if items sells)

Concession - snacks and beverages will be available for sale (proceeds to local youth group); fresh pizza

All of this and 10 hours of gaming for only $5!  Pre-register here and get an additional entry into the door prize draws.

Admission fee goes towards door prizes and (minimal) admin costs.

Board game tournament is an additional $5, which will go towards prizes.

A detailed schedule will be posted closer to the event.

When

18 August 2013

10:00 am - 8:00 pm

Who

All are welcome - both new and serious gamers, UVic students and the general public.  The event is limited to 250 people, so pre-register to guarantee a spot!

Where

University of Victoria - Clearihue Bldg (C Wing).

 

Free parking in lot nearby.  Parking garage adjacent (fee to park here).

Why Indiegogo?

Having you pre-register allows us to determine how many attendees to expect and plan for.

Please note that Indiegogo requires a minimum campaign goal of $500.  We are charging $10 for basic registration, which will include $5 credit for the concession, to help us meet our goal.  If you don't want the concession credit, we will happily refund you $5 when you arrive.

Need more information?

This event is being organized by me, Michael Greer, in concert with Chris Gensey and Emilie Henriksen, both active in the UVic Games Club and organizers of Concentric, a 3-day gaming convention held at UVic annually in November.

Check out our Facebook event "Day of Gaming", or contact me at coseverde@gmail.com.

story:
AppTag Laser Tag 

Your phone becomes an awesome heads up display, showing laser effects and targeting info over the live video stream. Our game server keeps score, tracks your health, ammo and enemy kills, it even updates your screen in real time.

FRAG YOUR FRIENDS!

The Free multiplayer games for iOS or Android are available now, but will be updated when we release the Bluetooth 4 version of AppTag. You can battle from 1 to 1000's of other players in a single game!

AppTag 2 is UPDATED with Bluetooth 4 low energy, to control the App wirelessly. AppTag 2 also includes a gyro and other sensors for awesome game play! 

We're raising funds to update the electronics and all the Apps.

AppTag 2 will now support: 

  • Up to 4048 players. 
  • Gyroscope, magnetometer and accelerometer.
  • Bluetooth LE - for wireless and trouble free syncing. 
  • Long of battery life.
  • Improved App support, with all new gameplay and updated weapons

Take a look at some winter warfare with AppTag!

AppTag 2 - Real World First Person Shooter - Laser Tag.


I launched AppTag in early 2012, it was crowd funded and we’ve shipped loads of AppTags to backers and customers since then. Some players had problems with older phones but AppTag2 will solve all of them - direct connection with Bluetooth LE.

Games

Capture the Flag, Deathmatch, Tag or Team games include loads of different weapons, health packs, ammo packs, and power ups! Or upgrade for the tactical edge AppTag SWARM is a new style of MMORG - Defend your real City, Country and the Earth against invading enemy hordes - get notifications of local Alien movement and team up with friends to defend your planet.

When I first developed AppTag, Bluetooth was difficult to use, painful to sync and it burned batteries, so I decided to use high frequency sound - which worked without wires or Bluetooth. Now with Bluetooth 4 we can improve the performance and game play. Help us bring new awesomeness to market!

AppTag 1 uses high frequency sound to communicate with the Apps and works great on iPhone 4s and above, iPods with camera Galaxy 1-4 phones running 4.2 and above. Now that Bluetooth LE is more widely supported I've decided to update the electronics and add some features. 

We plan to support the iOS game controller framework - we think AppTag2 will be future proof, since we can update the firmware from our Apps.

Then a few months later I launched a second Crowd Funded Project for the AppTag laser tag toy, which raised $55,679 of $30,000 goal. Both of these products were delivered to backers in late 2012. They are now available for sale online and in many great stores around the world. 

Most recently I completed my third Crowd Funded Project - the Nota Stylus which raised double the $40,000 goal - it is in production and ahead of schedule.


Thanks for checking out AppTag2. Please join us and get AppTag in time for the Holidays!

story:
We've Reached Full Funding!

We're going to do a full print! Thanks everyone! Let us start off by thanking everyone who has pledged onour campaign, we couldn't have done it without you! So, we now have reached full funding which is enough to print Series 1! Once we've printed and sent out all the decks to the contributors, we'll start selling on our website! Thanks again everyone!

 

We have enough for a partial print!

Hey everybody! Great news! We now have enough money for a partial print! We have raised enough that we can print out small quantities of all four decks! The more we print, the less each one costs, which is why we're trying to raise more funds, but as of now we do have enough to print when the campaign ends. If we can reach full funding, we can sell below $15 a deck once we print, so help us get there and make this a successful game! Thanks everyone and don't forget to spread the word!

 

Awesome News!

Super Special Announcement! We've got something very awesome news! We're gonna be making a companion book to the Tails and Tactics Card Game! This book will outline a few things one should or should not do in the Tails and Tactics universe. The book will include funny anecdotes and even informatino about the behind-the-scenes of the Tails and Tactics Card Game. Without giving anything away, it's gonna be awesome!

Even better, the T&T Companion Book will be given away free to anyone who donates at the $100 level or above! Want more good news? If we reach our goal right here on IndieGoGo, we'll give the book to everyone who donates at the $25 level and above! Once we start work on the book we'll post more about it, until then stay tuned! Special note, the book may ship seperate from the other perks, though we'll try our best to ship together.

 

About The Project

Tails and Tactics is an exciting upcoming trading card game featuring light military strategy, good moves, and bad puns. With the support of Jan, the artist responsible for TigerKnight.com, as well as funding from all of our generous backers, this project will be ready for printing in early 2013. Which is where you guys come in! With your support, we’ll be able to begin printing starter decks and finally release this game to the public!

The project goal is simple: we want to be able to print our decks professionally and distribute them! However many decks we can get printed with the money we raise will dictate how much we'll charge for the decks on our website. Our current goal is to be able to set the decks to sell for $15, but if we beat our goal we may be able to sell cheaper! The rewards for helping us out range from our thanks on the website, to free decks and rare cards, to having your very own character featured in the game! So, check out all the reward options, and help us get this game started!

                                
Artwork for the American Card: No-Frills Rifle. Art by Jan.
 
 
 

Monetary Information

This is where the money will be going to! The biggest expense will be going toward the printing costs. Printing is expensive and we want to print as many decks as we possibly can. The more decks we can print, the cheaper each one is. The more money we raise, the less we'll charge for the decks! That's where the bulk of the money goes. Of course, we have bills associated with Tails and Tactics. We have recurring costs from running a website, hiring guest artists, advertising the project, many things. These bills have been paid so far by our staff, individual investors, and by donations on our website. We thank you all for your support!

 

 

A Brief History

The idea for Tails and Tactics was first conceived in October of 2011 by lead producer, Reynard Loustaunau. The search then began for artists crazy enough to contribute to the art of the game. Shortly afterwards, after discovering his style would suit the game perfectly, Jan joined the Tails and Tactics team as the Lead Artist. Since then, dozens upon dozens of cards have been designed and the game has gone through extensive play-testing thanks to the hard work of our testers and friends and one very tired printer. In addition, our website, TailsandTactics.com, is currently up! We've redesigned it and are still working to better it as is needed. Tails and Tactics is scheduled to start professional printing in early 2013.

 

Test Version 11 Decks. Japanese deck not shown because it had no drawings.

 

 

Super Special News!

First-Aid Kitty is a new card we've designed that helped out game testing in Test Version 10. To celebrate getting the game to such a great spot, we decided to include the Rare First-Aid Kitty with every deck here on IndieGoGo! This card won't be availabel again until we work on Series 2 and it'll be rare!

 
 

Even More Super Special News!

The Sponsor Exclusive Card (that only the sponsors on here will get) will have the art drawn by the amazing Tani Da Real! This card will give you an advantage (not game-breaking) over others for helping us get started! All sponsors donating $10 or more will get this awesome card along with our eternal gratitude! This card will never be made available again, never!

 

 
Project Status
 
Main Artwork: 100% Complete. American, German, Russian, and Japanese decks are complete.
Promotional Artwork: 100% Complete. We have three cards down out of the eight special promotional cards.
Design: 99% Complete. Just need to polish a few rough edges.
Testing: 98% Complete. Test Version 12 was a success! The gameplay is at a great point, at most it has a tiny bit of refining. Working on Test Version 13.
story_txt:
We've Reached Full Funding!
We're going to do a full print! Thanks everyone! Let us start off by thanking everyone who has pledged onour campaign, we couldn't have done it without you! So, we now have reached full funding which is enough to print Series 1! Once we've printed and sent out all the decks to the contributors, we'll start selling on our website! Thanks again everyone!
 
We have enough for a partial print!
Hey everybody! Great news! We now have enough money for a partial print! We have raised enough that we can print out small quantities of all four decks! The more we print, the less each one costs, which is why we're trying to raise more funds, but as of now we do have enough to print when the campaign ends. If we can reach full funding, we can sell below $15 a deck once we print, so help us get there and make this a successful game! Thanks everyone and don't forget to spread the word! 
Awesome News!
Super Special Announcement! We've got something very awesome news! We're gonna be making a companion book to the Tails and Tactics Card Game! This book will outline a few things one should or should not do in the Tails and Tactics universe. The book will include funny anecdotes and even informatino about the behind-the-scenes of the Tails and Tactics Card Game. Without giving anything away, it's gonna be awesome!
Even better, the T&T Companion Book will be given away free to anyone who donates at the $100 level or above! Want more good news? If we reach our goal right here on IndieGoGo, we'll give the book to everyone who donates at the $25 level and above! Once we start work on the book we'll post more about it, until then stay tuned! Special note, the book may ship seperate from the other perks, though we'll try our best to ship together.
 
About The Project
Tails and Tactics is an exciting upcoming trading card game featuring light military strategy, good moves, and bad puns. With the support of Jan, the artist responsible for TigerKnight.com, as well as funding from all of our generous backers, this project will be ready for printing in early 2013. Which is where you guys come in! With your support, we’ll be able to begin printing starter decks and finally release this game to the public!
The project goal is simple: we want to be able to print our decks professionally and distribute them! However many decks we can get printed with the money we raise will dictate how much we'll charge for the decks on our website. Our current goal is to be able to set the decks to sell for $15, but if we beat our goal we may be able to sell cheaper! The rewards for helping us out range from our thanks on the website, to free decks and rare cards, to having your very own character featured in the game! So, check out all the reward options, and help us get this game started!

story:
Come on, another strategy game?

Well yes. And no. It depends on your perspective. What really happens is,  we have grown bored of the many easy-to-play designs, games that require more luck than skill or come with a single ‘way to victory’ solution. When we speak about “strategy games”, those words have a serious meaning.

We are four friends, coming out of the dissatisfied players segment to work for it. We are also gamers for the last 20 years, very experienced,  but still very enthusiastic. We appeal to the strategy gamer who wants a challenge. One who does not need to learn the game in 5 minutes, and who can plan actions with long term effects. One who prefers the unpredictability of human opponents over artificial intelligence. One who enjoys a historic atmosphere as a background for his game, and loves to see events unfold in either a similar or a very different way that what really happened.

We are passionate professionals who made job of our hobby. We also have full time jobs, but work on this project during nights and weekends. We have created a small firm and dream on making strategy games for the market segment that wants something more. Should this project succeeds more will follow. Sleep is overrated, we can live without it!

And we are not ‘thinking about it’. We have already started it, and with your help, we will see it through. 

(Players Hall of Fame)

 

Ok then. What is it about?

Empires at war 1805 is a historical strategy game that simulates certain aspects of European history during the Napoleonic era starting in 1805. Each player takes on the role of the national leader of one of the seventeen predominate nations of the era, controlling diplomacy, economy, warfare and colonization. The game takes place on a map divided into four areas, the large one depicting Europe, and the other three the different colonial theaters of war. 

You need a web browser and an internet connection to play, but nothing to download and install. Orders will be inputted by the players through the game’s User Interface at their own leisure until the processing deadline, (that can range depending on player preference, during beta it is weekly)  These orders will be simultaneously processed and the results made readily available on the website. 

Players have a variety of options on how to play and where to expand, but remember this is an era of warfare. Sooner or later your interests with conflict those of another player, and wars will break up. Maintaining a strong economy, a reasonable army, remaining well connected with friends & allies, while carefully choosing when to campaign and when to remain peaceful are all factors that separate your nation from victory or catastrophe. Each action taken results in a collection of “victory points” which will eventually determine the winners of each game.

(Games Lobby) 

So what you need us for?

Dedication, passion and professionalism are all traits needed for a successful project. But there is something more that is needed – resources. As a new firm, we are very low on that… in fact we have already used up our starting capital for the preliminary stages of the project. Apart from us, there are about 8 more people who have worked or are working on various parts of the project - artists, musicians, programmers or web designers, and they need to be paid for their services.

Some people pointed out that it would be simpler and faster to get a small loan from a bank for the expenses and carry on. But thinking about it – why the hell should we pay a bank for any profit we might make? This is a project for gamers, and should come from gamers. Likewise, any rewards should also go back to them. Check out our perks and you will see what we mean. We don’t want donations. We want active participants, we want happy customers. Everything we make should go back to you in one way or another. 

So we appeal to you for support in finishing this project. Your help, regardless how small it is, will be invaluable to us not only as a resource, but also as a morale boost that there is a community here to back us up. Supporting us will not save the whales, nor stop the global warming… we are only making a game. But we are good at it, and given half a chance, we will for sure make some people more happy when its over. 

(Pages from Player's handbook)

 

Interested ? More in-game information follows!

 

Why turn-based?

Turn-based games, as opposed to real-time browser games, have a couple distinct advantages

  • Players can chose to play whenever they have the time, allowing them to lead busy lives but still being able to input a turn at their leisure 
  • The game does not "continue" between turns, so no player can get an advantage by being online all the time.
  • All player orders are simultaneously processed at the deadline, you dont get little bits of info every day. Anticipation is higher on the day when your results come out, as you will see your strategies unfold, and be surprised by opponent actions. 

 

Can we improve our game position by paying? 

No. Although this is a quite popular technique in browser games, we hardly think this will make EaW1805 a proper wargame. Only your decisions will influence the power of your position, you cannot spend real life money to improve it. Would chess game be the same if you could spend $$ to buy an extra Queen?

(Land forces sample report)

(Naval forces sample report)

 

So what do we do during a game turn? 

There is a variety of things you can do in a game turn.

First of all, usually you will read the game newsletter. It is in the form of a newspaper, and will have news from around the world, as well as player announcements. Each newsletter is player-specific and not the same for all : Your country's own news will be the headline, news from other countries are secondary. 

Next can see the reports about your economy, trading, or battles if you have any. Diplomatic messages you need not wait your turn to read them, they arrive immediately to your website account. 

Once you have looked over everything that interests you, it is time for decision making. Basically you can spend your resources towards 2 main directions

  • Improving your economy (eg build new production sites, increase population, trading)
  • Improve your armed forces (eg build new troops, train or upgrade existing ones, build new ships, build fortresses)

Finding the correct balance between these two conflicting directions is one of the decisions you have to make in the game.

Once this is done, perhaps it is organising & movement time: You can organise your ships and brigades into Fleets and Corps respectively, and then Corps into Armies. You can therefore move larger bodies of troops with less effort, maybe use smaller and more mobile armies for faster expansion, or very large ones for battles. Again, how you organise your forces is up to you, but it will have an effect in the game. 

Apart from the players, there will be neutral territories at the start of the game, especially in the colonies and north Africa. Feel free to go for them, the more you have the merrier. Some will require some planning (for example build a Colonial Brigade, train it, load it to a fleet, send it to the colonies) but it will be worth it. 

Your commanders, spies, merchant ships, baggage trains, are also moveable forces - use them as you see fit for trading, spying, or preparing an invasion. 

The above will take most of the turn managment, but there are other management options for players to consider like the Politics screen (change relations with other nations, make alliances, declare wars) the Taxation screen (change taxes, invest goods in the economy) or Newsletter panel (writting eponymous or anonymous propaganda). 

The UI allows you the option to partially do your turn, then reload and change it some other time before the deadline.

 

(User Interface Sample Screens)

 

 

 

 

 

 (Flags of participating Countries & Neutrals)

The perks in detail

 

$10 - Private

  1. Have your name added in our credits page
  2. Receive a free Empires at War 1805 wallpaper
  3. Join a game and play 10 turns for free

$25 - Corporal 

  1. All the benefits of "Private" 
  2. Get the "Fund-Raiser" achievement in your player profile.
  3. Play in a game for an additional 15 turns for free (25 total)

$60 - Sergeant 

  1. All the benefits of "Corporal" Perk (except 3)
  2. Play an entire game for free upon commercial release. (If you lose before 25 turns have passed, play another one).
  3. Receive our fully coloured & illustrated Game Manual to your home address

$100 - Lieutenant

  1. All the benefits of "Sergeant"
  2. Play an aditional game for free upon commercial release (2 in total)
  3. Receive a luxurious cover fully coloured & illustrated Game Manual to your home address

$250 - Colonel

  1. All the benefits of "Lieutenant"
  2. Play unlimited games of EaW1805 for free for two years upon commercial release

$500 - Major General (limited to 8) 

  1. All the benefits of "Colonel"
  2. You earn the right to create one full game (all 17 countries). Name your game as you want, chose the turnaround, the victory points, invite whoever you want to play for free and distribute the countries as you see fit.
  3. Receive two additional luxury Player Handbook (total of 3)

$1000 - Field Marshal (limited to 4)

  1. All benefits of "Major General"
  2. Create your own Eaw1805 scenario in cooperation with GMs. Once created, you name your scenario and is then available for play by all EaW1805 players.
  3. Receive two additional luxury Game Manual (total of 5)
  4. Your name or company is mentioned as a sponsor, and we will include a link or banner to your company/personal website

   

 

PREVIOUS WORK - TOTAL CONQUEST

 

Although not under any corporate umbrella, the same team has worked before on a browser-game development project, mostly for fun and to see if we could do it.

With a very small budget, between 1999 and 2001 we developed and run a fantasy turn-based wargame called Total Conquest.

In that game players took over as Kings of fantasy realms in a contingent emerging out of an Ice Age, the various races expanding and fighting for dominance, their heroes questing in Dungeons of an ancient world, discovering dark secrets of a past that lead to the alleged Demon invasion and subsequent Ice Age.

The made-for-hobby game managed back then some 100 players playing at the same time, and 3,5k gaming accounts in total, before it was eventually sold to an american company.

The experience earned while making that project was invaluable. Rumour has it that the team feels duty-bound to a Total Conquest version II  when the current EaW 1805 project is successfully completed.

 

(UI Screenshot) 

(Army units) 

(Total Conquest wallpaper)

 

Oplon Games

Contact us: admin@eaw1805.com

Company website: www.oplongames.com

Project website: www.empiresatwar1805.com

story:
What is Game For a Cure?

Game For a Cure is a (soon to be) non-profit organization that is striving to touch the lives of thousands of people through the video game community. We started back in early 2010, with an idea to host an online tournament with all proceeds going directly to cancer research.

Our first tournament was a free-to-enter Halo 3 1v1 tournament. Why did we choose to make the tournament free-to-enter? We were a brand new organization and we understood that people weren't going to give money to someone / an organization without actual proof as to where their money was going.

Our second tournament was also on Halo 3, but this time it was a 4v4 game. We had 8 teams register at $20/team. Prizes, in the form of Xbox Live points, were donated by a local company so that none of the money raised was used to purchase prizes.

Who started it?

Game For a Cure was founded by Kyle Sullivan in March 2010; his passion for cancer and finding a cure was originally ignited in 2001 when his mother was diagnosed with breast cancer. Thankfully, the treatment at the time was enough to help significantly, and we’re pleased to note that she has just recently finished taking the necessary post-cancer drugs.

Why do we need your help?

Over the past 2 years, we've attempted to host more tournaments but ran into an issue: people were finding it hard to trust us without us being an actual non-profit organization. With your help, we are looking to change that so we can move on to achieve bigger and better things.

Why are we asking for $3000?

In Ontario it costs about $1100 to register a non-profit organization. So what will we do with the extra $1900?

  • Pay for all the awesome perks we're giving away for your contribution
  • The remainder will go into an organization bank account, and used for future tournament prizes & giveaways
  • Indigogo takes 4% if we raise the $3000 and 9% if we don't

The Future of Game For a Cure

Over time we'd love to do more things than just game tournaments. Here are a few things that our team has thrown up in the air if we ever got the amount of funding to do so.

  • An annual MLG type event, hosted in different cities across North America, with all proceeds going to cancer research
  • Room transformations - We'd be on the lookout for gamers who are in post-cancer treatment and totally transform their room into the most high-tech gaming room possible
  • Mobile gaming devices to be given out to children & teens who are in hospitals for long terms

With your help we believe that we can achieve all of this and more! So even the smallest donation is not treated as such and we thank you for anything that you can afford to give to us.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, don't worry, but please help us spread the word by sharing this page with all your friends & family!

Just click one of our social links below!

-Email Us-
General Inquires: info@gameforacure.com
Media & Sponsorship: sponsorship@gameforacure.com

-Updates-

  • All T-shirt info will be collected via email at at the end of the fundraising campaign. (Style & Size)

What is Game For a Cure?
Game For a Cure is a (soon to be) non-profit organization that is striving to touch the lives of thousands of people through the video game community. We started back in early 2010, with an idea to host an online tournament with all proceeds going directly to cancer research.
Our first tournament was a free-to-enter Halo 3 1v1 tournament. Why did we choose to make the tournament free-to-enter? We were a brand new organization and we understood that people weren't going to give money to someone / an organization without actual proof as to where their money was going.
Our second tournament was also on Halo 3, but this time it was a 4v4 game. We had 8 teams register at $20/team. Prizes, in the form of Xbox Live points, were donated by a local company so that none of the money raised was used to purchase prizes.
Who started it?
Game For a Cure was founded by Kyle Sullivan in March 2010; his passion for cancer and finding a cure was originally ignited in 2001 when his mother was diagnosed with breast cancer. Thankfully, the treatment at the time was enough to help significantly, and we’re pleased to note that she has just recently finished taking the necessary post-cancer drugs.
Why do we need your help?
Over the past 2 years, we've attempted to host more tournaments but ran into an issue: people were finding it hard to trust us without us being an actual non-profit organization. With your help, we are looking to change that so we can move on to achieve bigger and better things.
Why are we asking for $3000?
In Ontario it costs about $1100 to register a non-profit organization. So what will we do with the extra $1900?

Pay for all the awesome perks we're giving away for your contribution
The remainder will go into an organization bank account, and used for future tournament prizes & giveaways
Indigogo takes 4% if we raise the $3000 and 9% if we don't
The Future of Game For a Cure
Over time we'd love to do more things than just game tournaments. Here are a few things that our team has thrown up in the air if we ever got the amount of funding to do so.

An annual MLG type event, hosted in different cities across North America, with all proceeds going to cancer research
Room transformations - We'd be on the lookout for gamers who are in post-cancer treatment and totally transform their room into the most high-tech gaming room possible
Mobile gaming devices to be given out to children & teens who are in hospitals for long terms
With your help we believe that we can achieve all of this and more! So even the smallest donation is not treated as such and we thank you for anything that you can afford to give to us.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, don't worry, but please help us spread the word by sharing this page with all your friends & family!
Just click one of our social links below!
-Email Us- General Inquires: info@gameforacure.comMedia & Sponsorship: sponsorship@gameforacure.com
-Updates-

All T-shirt info will be collected via email at at the end of the fundraising campaign. (Style & Size)

story:
Short Summary

  • We are Civil X, a passionate group of Deep ecologist, System designers and Videogame developers dedicated to creating Games that allow to us to dive deep into our relationships with ourselves, our community and our environment. 
  • This is campaign for Building out the tools of the future . We see the next generations as the solution for a better tomorrow. By providing them with advanced problem solving, organization and resource management tools we choose to create a better future for all.
  • This game is changing how humanity interacts and connects. The magnitude of what you are helping to create when contributing  will help us all achieve more efficient and diverse solutions at a rate like the world has never seen.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We are here to receiving $20k to build out the Civil X avatar Builder.
  • this includes:
  1.  - physical Character Designer    - Skins, Hair, Clothes, items ect.
  2.  - Astrological charts                       - connected to character 
  3.  - Mayan calendar                             - connected to Character 
  4.  - Human design character input - For team building and project matching 
  5.  - Gene Keys Character input        - For team building and project matching 
  6.  - Guild, skills, passion, resume    - For team building and project matching 
  7.  - Mission, Goals, values and path - For team building and project matching 
  • All Character traits will be connected to your own personal 3D avatar when entering any projects or missions. 
  • If you donate any amount you will be first on our list of people to test and try out first versions of the Game
  • $200 or more you will have first access to your own avatar as soon as Builder is Complete
  • $3,000 or more and you will have first access to Avatar builder software when finished, to use with your business, company, game or website

 

The Challenge

We stand out in our Game development, Creating a new sector of Game for community organization that allows for tested ideas to be implanted from the game into real life solutions.

  • We have a diverse and strong team of Game designers and developers that have worked on a multitude of games from sandbox games, Home Tycoon PS3, Big City Stories PS4 to open world RPGs like Shroud of the Avatar for PC and Disney Epic Mickey for Wii
  • With such a powerful team of Whole system designers, Intentional Community builders, Permaculture Activist and teachers we have what it takes to build this truly epic hybrid of a  game.

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • Please spread the word! let others know tools for change are being made. Share with your friends
  • Also if you have skills in Digital media, Game Development, community building or education please reach out to us to see how we can work together .
