story:
Hi there,

My name is Anthony Redoblado. I am currently developing a game called Jubejube the Robot Monkey. It was based on a character I developed almost 6 years ago just after animation school. It wasn't until I took gaming at Seneca College and learned what could be done with game engines that I realized this dream could be real. This character could be fun to play and could be on iOS and Android devices before this Christmas.

My aim is to raise money so that I could purchase the right software, buy the right equipment and get enough help to create a AAA quality game using Unity 3.5, 3D Studio Max, ZBrush, Adobe Photoshop, and necessary SDK's (software development kit).

I am working really hard on this from home and will be working on this dream project of mine from now until October 2012 with a goal to submit this awesome game to Apple and Google before November 1st, 2012.

I just want to express my thanks and appreciation for checking out my campaign, thanks so much for your time and for your support. I really appreciate it!

With so much thanks,

Anthony.

***Note about perks: I am designing the documents for the perks as we speak, my perks are digital files that will be sent before the campaign ends that way no one is waiting for any physical items and your perks are given to you right in your e-mail if you claim it***


Game Story:

In the year 2050, the earth is threatened by evil forces.

There are 7 major kingdoms that rule the earth. Each kingdom each has its own royal family and each has an inherent gift that is connected with a part of life.

Princess Aurelia, the princess of the 1st Kingdom has been kidnapped. Her gift is linked to the nature of the earth so because of her kidnapping, the plants and flowers of the earth begin to die. The enslaved humans are weak fighting against the evil Dr. Nasato. Dr. Nasato is a powerful man who possess great power. He built an army of powerful robots and he is hiding in a castle in the magical floating island in the sky where the princess is held captive.


The imprisoned King of the 1st Kingdom sends his best knight to search for a monkey named Jubejube. A powerful monkey that is rumored to possess great strength and incredible powers. He is a robotic monkey who once had a history with Dr. Nasato at a travelling circus.

The king pleads to Jubejube to save his beloved daughter, the princess of the 1st Kingdom, and also pleads to Jubejube to save the people of the earth and to stop Dr. Nasato from persuing his evil agenda. The king gives his great prized possession, a magical robot dragon to fly Jubejube and to to help him reach the mysterious floating island in the sky.

Jubejube is a rebellious, curious monkey with extraordinary powers. He has powerful acrobatic abilities, his tail is like a whip, and he has the ability to control his inner energy. Jubejube agrees to help the King of the 1st Kingdom, and flies on the magical robot dragon to the mysterious island in the sky to save the princess and to save the world.

and so the magical story begins...


Game Document Prototype: Jubejube the Robot Monkey

 

Game Information:

Game Title:  Jubejube the Robot Monkey

Players:  1 Player (Single Player)

Genre:  Action Adventure

Target ESRB: E (Everyone)

Developer: Anthony Redoblado

Platform: iPad / iPhone / Androi

Game Summary:

Play as Jubejube the Robot Monkey and save Princess Aureilia from Dr. Nasato and his evil group of Banditos. Imagine this awesome monkey doing parkour on platforms, whipping enemies with his hyper extendable robot tail, and go nuts with your gumball gun all while saving the entire world.

Unique Selling Points:

  • Navigate 10 crazy levels with incredible parkour and intense acrobatics
  • Pummel your enemies with your hyper extendable robot tail!
  • Ride zany vehicles such as the Ultra Fast Banana Boat, the Flying Robotic Kimono dragon, and the Orangutan Mecha Power Suit.

 

***Note: Changes could be made to names or designs as development proceeds in order to make the best game possible***


Sample game engine project I worked on at Seneca College:

If you want to see an example project that I worked on with a group of people from school, check this link out. This is what made me realize how powerful games engines could be. 

http://youtu.be/BLLfhbO26tc


Concept Dr. Nasato:

Realtime Shader Low Poly:



Updated: Closer perspective shot of Low Poly Unwrapped with Base Colours


Updated: Low Poly Unwrapped with Base Colours:


Updated Retopologized Mesh: 2,450 Polygons



Lowpoly Model: 2400 Poly's



Character 3D Prototype:



Pics below:

Boss Concept, 3 Banditos Bosses, and early prototype with a surfboard/hoverboard:

story:
Click Here for English!

ENSEMBLE RELEVONS UN DEFI, un défi à la hauteur de son résultat !

Si vous éprouvez le moindre intérêt pour le petit patrimoine, si vous avez envie de participer à la restauration des vieilles pierres, alors voilà une bonne occasion de vous manifester !!! 

Vous pouvez participer à la remise en état de ce Château, 10 €, 20 € ou plus, tout est accepté si c'est de bon coeur !!! vous pouvez donner davantage ... vous pouvez aussi consultez les contreparties qui vous sont proposées plus loin ! merci d'avance à vous tous pour votre aide, pour vos dons ......

JE ME PRESENTE :

Je suis un petit Château de défense, je défendais le Bourg de Lunac (en Aveyron, au sud de la France), ainsi que ses habitants, dans cette région du Rouergue où tant de Bastides Royales ont fleuri en cette époque très rude du Moyen Age. D'origine plus humble, plus modeste, j'ai en ces temps modernes du mal à trouver ma place ... et j'ai quelques problèmes d'isolation à l'eau et ma base souffre de grosse humidité - les revenus dégagés par mes 3 Chambres d'Hôtes ne suffisent pas à y remédier pleinement ... heureusement Hôtes et amis ont convaincus mes maîtres de lancer un appel à l'aide par le biais du Crowdfunding (financement participatif) .

Michel et Marie-Chantal me découvrent en 2004 

MA  MAITRESSE, Marie-Chantal, épouse d'un Architecte passionné de vieilles pierres qui a trouvé sa vocation dans la restauration de vieux mas en Provence, a vite attrapé elle aussi le virus de l'ancien, du passé, des vieilles pierres. Elle a 64 ans, 2 enfants et 2 petits enfants. C'est elle ma porte-parole dans cette aventure. 

          Marie-Chantal au MARCHE MEDIEVAL de Sauveterre de Rouergue

       

A LA RETRAITE DE MICHEL, en 2004, alors âgé de 74 ans, ils vendent leur maison de Provence, après quoi ils  peuvent réaliser leur rêve : devenir propriétaire d'un château à restaurer en Aveyron - fin 2004 ils me découvrent, abandonné de toute vie. Il faut dire que l'Aveyron est le pays natal de Marie-Chantal ! en 2005 ils m'investissent et je sais alors qu'ils vont me sortir de ma longue léthargie. 

             "Siffler en travaillant ..."  :  Quand Michel siffle c'est bon signe !              

MON HISTOIRE : petit château de défense du Moyen Age, ancienne propriété de plusieurs co-seigneurs, vassaux des Comtes de Toulouse, je suis de taille humaine, dans un adorable petit village, avec vue magnifique et imprenable sur une nature verdoyante et vallonnée, avec prairies, bois et rivières .... et le climat  y est plutôt clément, sauf février qui est parfois un peu rude. J'ai été remanié à la Renaissance, au XVIIIème et au XIXème. Un document du XIVème du Parlement de Toulouse autorise le village à "re-fortifier le Château" qui a bien souffert des guerres. Le XIXème et le XXème siècles ne m'ont pas arrangé, ils m'ont défiguré !!! A présent j'ai retrouvé mon caractère du XIII / XIVème avec Michel et Marie-Chantal. Tous les éléments d'époque ont été remis à jour et en valeur. Tous les faux plafonds et les cloisons on été démolis ... les pièces ont donc repris leurs dimensions d'origine, les portes et fenêtres à meneaux condamnées ont été ré-ouvertes, les plâtres remplacés par des enduits à la chaux ..... 

                                            LE  PROJET de RESTAURATION :

- La première étape a été d'aménager 2 étages : premier étage où vivent Michel et Marie-Chantal - second étage : les 3 Chambres d'Hôtes.                            

                La cuisine avant et après travaux par Michel et Marie-Chantal                 

Cheminée du salon avant et après travaux

 - Et aujourd'hui c'est la seconde étape qu'il faut mener à bien :  

   1/ le premier travail est de drainer les eaux pluviales 

    2/ aménager le rez de chaussée afin d'y faire un gîte, style "loft moyenâgeux" 

   3/ j'ai aussi des petites dépendances : un bâtiment appelé le "fournil" avec un grand four à pain à restaurer et un petit four à pâtisseries en assez bon état (voir photos précédentes), et enfin le "couvert" : c'est un des rares bâtiments de ce type, encore en état en Aveyron, c'était le lieu où Seigneur et Prieur rendaient la basse et moyenne justice, il est digne d'être classé - le Choeur de l'Eglise du village, du XIIème est, lui, déjà classé. 

           La tour (entrée) et le "Fournil" à gauche          

Le "Couvert", lequel mérite d'être restauré et qui sera classé

Une des deux pièces à restaurer pour le gîte

La seconde pièce : chambre et salle de bain du gîte

- La troisième étape sera, un jour, la toiture à revoir (avec lauzes) 

DESCRIPTIF DES TRAVAUX 

- Drainage et écoulement des eaux de pluies 

- Aménagement du rez de chaussée 

- Remise en état du "couvert"  et du  "fournil" 


DANS LE CAS OU :

a) ce montant  est inférieur,  les travaux les plus urgents : le drainage, les caves, ensuite la tour, puis le rez de chaussée, seront mis en chantier. 

b) nous tournons autour de cette somme là : une fois les travaux achevés, vous tous réunis, une journée "inauguration" pour vous remercier officiellement et vous présenter "votre" oeuvre ... car sans vous rien n'est possible ...

                                                         N'OUBLIEZ  PAS :

Faites la publicité autour de ce projet - Utilisez les outils de partage Indiegogo !  les réseaux sociaux et les médias ... et n'oubliez pas : participez financièrement !!!

                                      IMPORTANT   POUR   VOUS   TOUS :    

REGARDER  NOS  CONTREPARTIES, elles sont  équivalentes à vos dons ! nous espérons qu'elles vous donneront envie et satisfaction .... voir le site des Chambres d'Hôtes : "chateau-lunac.com"

             NOS CONTREPARTIES : DES IDEES DE CADEAUX, DE VACANCES

PROFITEZ des CONTREPARTIES ci-jointes : c'est  la période  des cadeaux de Noel et de fin d'année, ou  pour  tout autre  événement (mariage, anniversaire, .... ou  pour  vos vacances)  c'est  simple  et  original : vous  participez  à  ce financement à la hauteur de la contrepartie correspondante et vous offrez un séjour au Château de LUNAC  ou un des bijoux magnétiques (aimants) : d' ENERGETIX.

*Les nuitées seront au Château de Lunac : toute l'année sauf du 10 Juillet au 16 Août - Pour 2 personnes et petit déjeuner compris. 

Repas : excellents restaurants aveyronnais : Relais le Mont Le Viaur à St André de Najac, Le Belle Rive à Najac et Le Petit Couvert à Saint Salvadou.

*Toute somme  non  citée  ci-contre  aura  sa contrepartie équivalente,  il n'y a pas non  plus de limite à la  participation ..... possibilité d'investir tout  le Château pour une certaine période  si quelqu'un le souhaite, sachant que la location du château avec ses 3 chambres équivaut à 4000 € pour une semaine + si nécessaire 1000 € pour le gîte !!!

*Les réservations pour les chambres pourront se faire sur le site dès le mois de février sur le site : "chateau-lunac.com" . 

Pour ceux qui le souhaitent, les nuitées peuvent être remplacées par des bijoux ENERGETIX - pour voir toute la collection nous contacter à : bijoux-energetix-marie@orange.fr dès FEVRIER

POUR TOUS CEUX ET CELLES QUI NE POURRONT SE DEPLACER, POUR TOUS CEUX ET CELLES QUI AURONT PU NOUS SOUTENIR MEME POUR QUELQUES EUROS, pour toutes ces personnes nous mettrons des vidéos à disposition sur FACEBOOK, ou envoyées personnellement sur demande. Merci à toutes ces personnes pour leur soutien et leur aide.

Pour tous ceux et celles qui n'ont pas de compte PAYPAL il est possible d'envoyer un chèque directement au Château de LUNAC - 12270  - (ou d'utiliser la CB - n° tel : 06.12.91.02.92)

POUR les financements de 5000 € et plus, en plus des contreparties vous aurez droit à une reconnaissance éternelle du Château de Lunac qui se traduira par le titre de "Chevalier de Lunac" ou de "Gente Dame de Lunac" avec remise du diplôme au Château. 

                                                                         =====

NOUVELLES contreparties pour 2 chambres seulement : NOEL AU CHATEAU  (150 € la nuité (+100 € x nombre de nuités) et ST SYLVESTRE au CHATEAU (avec réveillon au Château préparé ensemble : 200 € + 100 € chaque nuité supplémentaire)  :  faire courrier très vite sur site : chateau-lunac.com et un devis vous sera envoyé aussitôt)

Pour votre PARTICIPATION : soit vous cocher une case en haut et à droite, soit vous allez directement en bas de ce document.

==============================================================

                                                 Traduction en Anglais

TOGETHER, LET'S RISE TO THE CHALLENGE  one that  is worthy of the result! 

If  you have any  interest in local heritage,  if you  want to participate in  restoring ancient buildings, now is the chance to get involved!

               LET ME INTRODUCE MYSELF : I am a small defensive castle

I was brought to life in an ancient region called the Rouergue where, in the Middle Ages, so many Royal Bastides were to be built and to flourish around me. But my own origin was more humble, as part of a fortified village called Lunac, which I defended alongside its inhabitants for many  generations. Now, sadly, things have changed. In modern times it is hard for me to adapt … I am no longer young and my foundations have become afflicted by a severe  damp, in need of an urgent cure, and unfortunately the revenue generated by my lovely, historic 3 Bed and Breakfasts rooms is insufficient for the purpose. But of late I have become lucky, as many of my masters’ guests and friends have convinced them to launch this call for help through crowdfunding and Indiegogo.

2004 : Michel et Marie-Chantal find me !

Marie-Chantal is 62 years old and the wifeof an architect, who has passed on to her his passion for restoring ancient buildings. She has a daughter and two grandchildren. Her earlyvocation in education ledher, in the 80’s, to establish one of the first associative and parental nurseries in France. Today, she is the spirit of my rebirth and my adventure.

Marie-Chantal : MEDIEVAL MARKET to Sauveterre de Rouergue

   

Michel, her husband, had previously spent 20 years lovingly restoring a ruined building in Provence back to its original beauty. On retiring, in 2004, at the age of  74, he  and Marie-Chantal finally realised their lifelong dream, which was to own and restore to life a castle in the Aveyron. And it was in that same year they found me abandoned and languishing neglected in the village of Lunac.

Why Aveyron ? Because Aveyron was the birthplace of Marie-Chantal, who after many years away was anxious to return to her roots. So, in 2005, after completing my purchase, she came back and, along with Michel, has every day been working to restore me to my original splendour. But the time they have been dreading has finally arrived – they have spent all their life-savings on their project and work on me has almost stopped.

But Michel, who will be 82 in January, still carries on alone : he repairs a stone wall here, replaces an old  beam there, repairs a damaged ceiling, checks the dampness in the foundations, but everything would be so much quicker if he was able to employ help. In his dedication, he has already drawn up plans for the work and deserves to live to see his project to fruition.

Unfortunately, the income earned from their B & B business is insufficient for the purpose. Now, they need extra support. Marie-Chantal has taken a part-time job selling ‘Energetix’ magnetic jewellery. Soon, we will discover whether or not she is a good sales person.  Also she has  had to start to part with some of the less essential furniture and objects from within my walls.

                                                     MY   STORY :

As I told you before, I was a small defensive castle constructed as the central part of  the fortified village of  Lunac. I was formely owned by several  co-seigneurs, who were the vassals of the Counts of Toulouse. Since the thirteenth century, I have stood proudly in a lovely little village with magnificent breathtaking views across a rolling, green landscape of meadow, woodland and river valley.  Apart from the winters, which can often be cold, the climate is mild and in the summer hot with cool soothing evenings in which to relax and absorb the fragrance of the co.

During the Renaissance,  and in  the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries, I was redesigned. A document of  the Parliament of Toulouse, in the  fourteenth century, authorised  the village to “re-fortify the castle“, because   had already suffered disfiguring scars from the rigours of war.  But the nineteenth and twentieth centuries d isfigured me more. Until, I was discovered by Marie-Chantal and Michel who have restored much  f my thirteenth and fourteenth century character. Now, all the false ceilings have been removed, closed-up doorways and covered mullioned windows have been re-opened and plaster replaced by  ime coating. But I have been tastefully modernised too : electricity has been brought up to present-day standard, the water in the taps is running again and modern bathrooms have been integrated into the prevailing style.


*A character from my past : The Prefect of Morbian: Sieur De Chazelles, son of Sir de Chazelles, Lord of Lunac, and Lady born "de Montlauzeur" * Right: the village of Lunac, I am situated on the left the Church



                                                   THE  PROJECT :

The first step has been to refurbish two of the floors. Marie-Chantal and Michel live on my first floor where there is now a magnificent dining room, which is shared with guests, as is the large terrace of verlooking a sweep of beautiful countryside. They also have a lovely, historic beamed living room with a large stone fireplace, bedroom, bathroom and small dressing room. On the second floor are the three Bed & Breakfast rooms, which are rented to guests, all with en suit e bathrooms, containing either a shower or bath.  (See www.chateau-lunac.com for further details).

The kitchen before and after work by Michel and Marie-Chantal

Fireplace in the lounge before and after work  

TODAY SEES THE NEED for further and very necessary stages in my continued renovation:

  1. because I’m half-buried on the north  side, I need protection from the damp from the rainwater which has been seeping through my walls for centuries and into the windows and under the spiral, stone staircase in the round tower, which needs to be saved from further damage;

  2.  *when this damp problem is solved, my ground floor will be ready to be developed into a medieval style apartment for guests to be able to rent and to enjoy;                                                                                                                                                                The tower, the "Bakehouse" left                                                                                                                                                                                               The "Couvert"                                                                                                                                                                                                   Two rooms for medieval style apartment                                                                                                                                                           *also, I  have several small dependances in need of further : repair a building called the “bakery” because it has a large restored bread oven and smaller pastry oven, which remains in fairly good condition, but the building itself requires attention; and the Couvert,  where in past times the Lord and  the Prior administere  lesser forms of justice on the local people     

  3. to fully complete the restoration, my roof needs repairing with its original lauzes (stone roof tiles

WHISTLE  WHILE YO WORK  ...  "When Michel whistles it is a good sign !


HELP   ME   BY   CIRCULATING    AROUND   quickly   in   ALL   YOUR   FRIENDS, RELATIVES RELATIONS  MEDIA  this  call  for help  ...  accompanied with a short explanatory note and social networking !  I thank you all in advance

                                                       IN CASE THAT

a)  the  amount  collected  is  lower,  the most  urgent  works will be undertaken : drainage, caves, then the tower and the apartment on the ground floor. Couvert and bakery will be ignored ....

b)  we  reach  the target : we  complete  the  program  and all of  you together, an "opening" day will be held to formally thank you and show you "your" work ... because without you nothing is possible ...

c) we exceed  this amount : 1 / there would still be many things to do (restore the old  pavement at  the entrance of  the  castle village side  and rebuild the border wall  80 cm  high   2 / possibility  to  buy  back  the historical heritage Cross of the village  church  which  was  stolen some years ago  -  we know who bought it and this  person is  willing to sell back to the village. It would be nice to bring it back, right ?  3 /  we save for roof repair ...

                                                       DON’T  FORGET

-  You  can  help us  through  this  participative  financing  but  you can  also and above  all  spread  the word and advertise on this project  -  do not forget to use the sharing tool Indiegogo! and social networks !

-  You can  also help us  with your  ideas, advice, encouragement -  you, all those who want  to, can contact us,  meet us, we will keep you informed of progress via Facebook.

                                         PERKS : GIFTS, HOLIDAYS IDEAL

ENJOY  the  COUNTERPARTS  proposed : this  is  the  period of Christmas and New Year gifts,  or any other event (wedding, birthday, or holiday ....) it is simple and origina l: you  participate  in  this  funding  up  to  the  value  of  the  counterpart  chosen !  or  one magnetic jewellery "ENERGETIX  Bingen".


STAY AT THE CASTLE OF LUNAC : The  nights  offered  will  be  in  April, May, June, from 1 to 10 July, and August 20 to 30  -  Maybe  September  and  October if necessary - for 2 people - Breakfast included. 

MEALS : in an excellent local restaurant: Relais Mont Le Viaur in St André de Najac - The Belle Rive Najac or Le Petit Couvert in St Salvadou.

Get its equivalent counterpart, there is no limit to the participation ..... one might even consider  having  the  opportunity  to  privatize  the  whole  Castle  for  a certain period if someone wishes, knowing the rent  for  the  entire castle with its 3 bedrooms equivalent to  € 4,000 for a  week if necessary  +  € 1,000  for vacation  rental apartment if needed !

ROOM  Reservations  can be  on  the  site  as  from Fébruary  2014  on : www.chateau-lunac.com

For those who wish, the nights can be replaced by ENERGETIX jewelry - to see the whole collection contact us at : bijoux-energetix-marie@orange.fr from February

FOR ALL THOSE WHO WILL MOVE TO ALL THOSE WHO HAVE PU WE SUPPORT EVEN FOR A FEW EUROS for all these people we put videos available on FACEBOOK, personally or sent on request. Thank you to all these people for their support and help.

For all those who do not have a PAYPAL account you can send a check to Castle LUNAC - 12270 - (or use the CB - No tel: 06.12.91.02.92)

FOR FUNDING OF € 5,000 or more, and more counterparties you will receive eternal gratitude Castle Lunac which will result in the title of "Knight Lunac" and "Gente Dame Lunac" with graduation at the Castle .
story_txt:
Click Here for English!ENSEMBLE RELEVONS UN DEFI, un défi à la hauteur de son résultat !Si vous éprouvez le moindre intérêt pour le petit patrimoine, si vous avez envie de participer à la restauration des vieilles pierres, alors voilà une bonne occasion de vous manifester !!! Vous pouvez participer à la remise en état de ce Château, 10 €, 20 € ou plus, tout est accepté si c'est de bon coeur !!! vous pouvez donner davantage ... vous pouvez aussi consultez les contreparties qui vous sont proposées plus loin ! merci d'avance à vous tous pour votre aide, pour vos dons ......JE ME PRESENTE :Je suis un petit Château de défense, je défendais le Bourg de Lunac (en Aveyron, au sud de la France), ainsi que ses habitants, dans cette région du Rouergue où tant de Bastides Royales ont fleuri en cette époque très rude du Moyen Age. D'origine plus humble, plus modeste, j'ai en ces temps modernes du mal à trouver ma place ... et j'ai quelques problèmes d'isolation à l'eau et ma base souffre de grosse humidité - les revenus dégagés par mes 3 Chambres d'Hôtes ne suffisent pas à y remédier pleinement ... heureusement Hôtes et amis ont convaincus mes maîtres de lancer un appel à l'aide par le biais du Crowdfunding (financement participatif) .Michel et Marie-Chantal me découvrent en 2004 MA  MAITRESSE, Marie-Chantal, épouse d'un Architecte passionné de vieilles pierres qui a trouvé sa vocation dans la restauration de vieux mas en Provence, a vite attrapé elle aussi le virus de l'ancien, du passé, des vieilles pierres. Elle a 64 ans, 2 enfants et 2 petits enfants. C'est elle ma porte-parole dans cette aventure.           Marie-Chantal au MARCHE MEDIEVAL de Sauveterre de Rouergue       A LA RETRAITE DE MICHEL, en 2004, alors âgé de 74 ans, ils vendent leur maison de Provence, après quoi ils  peuvent réaliser leur rêve : devenir propriétaire d'un château à restaurer en Aveyron - fin 2004 ils me découvrent, abandonné de toute vie. Il faut dire que l'Aveyron est le pays natal de Marie-Chantal ! en 2005 ils m'investissent et je sais alors qu'ils vont me sortir de ma longue léthargie.              "Siffler en travaillant ..."  :  Quand Michel siffle c'est bon signe !              MON HISTOIRE : petit château de défense du Moyen Age, ancienne propriété de plusieurs co-seigneurs, vassaux des Comtes de Toulouse, je suis de taille humaine, dans un adorable petit village, avec vue magnifique et imprenable sur une nature verdoyante et vallonnée, avec prairies, bois et rivières .... et le climat  y est plutôt clément, sauf février qui est parfois un peu rude. J'ai été remanié à la Renaissance, au XVIIIème et au XIXème. Un document du XIVème du Parlement de Toulouse autorise le village à "re-fortifier le Château" qui a bien souffert des guerres. Le XIXème et le XXème siècles ne m'ont pas arrangé, ils m'ont défiguré !!! A présent j'ai retrouvé mon caractère du XIII / XIVème avec Michel et Marie-Chantal. Tous les éléments d'époque ont été remis à jour et en valeur. Tous les faux plafonds et les cloisons on été démolis ... les pièces ont donc repris leurs dimensions d'origine, les portes et fenêtres à meneaux condamnées ont été ré-ouvertes, les plâtres remplacés par des enduits à la chaux .....                                             LE  PROJET de RESTAURATION :- La première étape a été d'aménager 2 étages : premier étage où vivent Michel et Marie-Chantal - second étage : les 3 Chambres d'Hôtes.                                            La cuisine avant et après travaux par Michel et Marie-Chantal                 Cheminée du salon avant et après travaux - Et aujourd'hui c'est la seconde étape qu'il faut mener à bien :     1/ le premier travail est de drainer les eaux pluviales     2/ aménager le rez de chaussée afin d'y faire un gîte, style "loft moyenâgeux"    3/ j'ai aussi des petites dépendances : un bâtiment appelé le "fournil" avec un grand four à pain à restaurer et un petit four à pâtisseries en assez bon état (voir photos précédentes), et enfin le "couvert" : c'est un des rares bâtiments de ce type, encore en état en Aveyron, c'était le lieu où Seigneur et Prieur rendaient la basse et moyenne justice, il est digne d'être classé - le Choeur de l'Eglise du village, du XIIème est, lui, déjà classé.            La tour (entrée) et le "Fournil" à gauche           Le "Couvert", lequel mérite d'être restauré et qui sera classéUne des deux pièces à restaurer pour le gîteLa seconde pièce : chambre et salle de bain du gîte - La troisième étape sera, un jour, la toiture à revoir (avec lauzes) DESCRIPTIF DES TRAVAUX - Drainage et écoulement des eaux de pluies 
- Aménagement du rez de chaussée 
- Remise en état du "couvert"  et du  "fournil" DANS LE CAS OU :a) ce montant  est inférieur,  les travaux les plus urgents : le drainage, les caves, ensuite la tour, puis le rez de chaussée, seront mis en chantier. b) nous tournons autour de cette somme là : une fois les travaux achevés, vous tous réunis, une journée "inauguration" pour vous remercier officiellement et vous présenter "votre" oeuvre ... car sans vous rien n'est possible ...                                                         N'OUBLIEZ  PAS : 
Faites la publicité autour de ce projet - Utilisez les outils de partage Indiegogo !  les réseaux sociaux et les médias ... et n'oubliez pas : participez financièrement !!!                                      IMPORTANT   POUR   VOUS   TOUS :    REGARDER  NOS  CONTREPARTIES, elles sont  équivalentes à vos dons ! nous espérons qu'elles vous donneront envie et satisfaction .... voir le site des Chambres d'Hôtes : "chateau-lunac.com"             NOS CONTREPARTIES : DES IDEES DE CADEAUX, DE VACANCESPROFITEZ des CONTREPARTIES ci-jointes : c'est  la période  des cadeaux de Noel et de fin d'année, ou  pour  tout autre  événement (mariage, anniversaire, .... ou  pour  vos vacances)  c'est  simple  et  original : vous  participez  à  ce financement à la hauteur de la contrepartie correspondante et vous offrez un séjour au Château de LUNAC  ou un des bijoux magnétiques (aimants) : d' ENERGETIX.*Les nuitées seront au Château de Lunac : toute l'année sauf du 10 Juillet au 16 Août - Pour 2 personnes et petit déjeuner compris. Repas : excellents restaurants aveyronnais : Relais le Mont Le Viaur à St André de Najac, Le Belle Rive à Najac et Le Petit Couvert à Saint Salvadou.*Toute somme  non  citée  ci-contre  aura  sa contrepartie équivalente,  il n'y a pas non  plus de limite à la  participation ..... possibilité d'investir tout  le Château pour une certaine période  si quelqu'un le souhaite, sachant que la location du château avec ses 3 chambres équivaut à 4000 € pour une semaine + si nécessaire 1000 € pour le gîte !!!*Les réservations pour les chambres pourront se faire sur le site dès le mois de février sur le site : "chateau-lunac.com" . Pour ceux qui le souhaitent, les nuitées peuvent être remplacées par des bijoux ENERGETIX - pour voir toute la collection nous contacter à : bijoux-energetix-marie@orange.fr dès FEVRIERPOUR TOUS CEUX ET CELLES QUI NE POURRONT SE DEPLACER, POUR TOUS CEUX ET CELLES QUI AURONT PU NOUS SOUTENIR MEME POUR QUELQUES EUROS, pour toutes ces personnes nous mettrons des vidéos à disposition sur FACEBOOK, ou envoyées personnellement sur demande. Merci à toutes ces personnes pour leur soutien et leur aide.Pour tous ceux et celles qui n'ont pas de compte PAYPAL il est possible d'envoyer un chèque directement au Château de LUNAC - 12270  - (ou d'utiliser la CB - n° tel : 06.12.91.02.92)POUR les financements de 5000 € et plus, en plus des contreparties vous aurez droit à une reconnaissance éternelle du Château de Lunac qui se traduira par le titre de "Chevalier de Lunac" ou de "Gente Dame de Lunac" avec remise du diplôme au Château.                                                                          =====NOUVELLES contreparties pour 2 chambres seulement : NOEL AU CHATEAU  (150 € la nuité (+100 € x nombre de nuités) et ST SYLVESTRE au CHATEAU (avec réveillon au Château préparé ensemble : 200 € + 100 € chaque nuité supplémentaire)  :  faire courrier très vite sur site : chateau-lunac.com et un devis vous sera envoyé aussitôt)Pour votre PARTICIPATION : soit vous cocher une case en haut et à droite, soit vous allez directement en bas de ce document.==============================================================                                                 Traduction en AnglaisTOGETHER, LET'S RISE TO THE CHALLENGE  one that  is worthy of the result! If  you have any  interest in local heritage,  if you  want to participate in  restoring ancient buildings, now is the chance to get involved!               LET ME INTRODUCE MYSELF : I am a small defensive castleI was brought to life in an ancient region called the Rouergue where, in the Middle Ages, so many Royal Bastides were to be built and to flourish around me.  *when this damp problem is solved, my ground floor will be ready to be developed into a medieval style apartment for guests to be able to rent and to enjoy;                                                                                                                                                                The tower, the "Bakehouse" left                                                                                                                                                                                               The "Couvert"                                                                                                                                                                                                   Two rooms for medieval style apartment                                                                                                                                                           *also, I  have several small dependances in need of further : repair a building called the “bakery” because it has a large restored bread oven and smaller pastry oven, which remains in fairly good condition, but the building itself requires attention; and the Couvert,  where in past times the Lord and  the Prior administere  lesser forms of justice on the local people     
to fully complete the restoration, my roof needs repairing with its original lauzes (stone roof tiles
WHISTLE  WHILE YO WORK  ...  "When Michel whistles it is a good sign !HELP   ME   BY   CIRCULATING    AROUND   quickly   in   ALL   YOUR   FRIENDS, RELATIVES RELATIONS  MEDIA  this  call  for help  ...  accompanied with a short explanatory note and social networking !  I thank you all in advance                                                       IN CASE THATa)  the  amount  collected  is  lower,  the most  urgent  works will be undertaken : drainage, caves, then the tower and the apartment on the ground floor. Couvert and bakery will be ignored ....b)  we  reach  the target : we  complete  the  program  and all of  you together, an "opening" day will be held to formally thank you and show you "your" work ... because without you nothing is possible ...c) we exceed  this amount : 1 / there would still be many things to do (restore the old  pavement at  the entrance of  the  castle village side  and rebuild the border wall  80 cm  high   2 / possibility  to  buy  back  the historical heritage Cross of the village  church  which  was  stolen some years ago  -  we know who bought it and this  person is  willing to sell back to the village. It would be nice to bring it back, right ?  3 /  we save for roof repair ...                                                       DON’T  FORGET-  You  can  help us  through  this  participative  financing  but  you can  also and above  all  spread  the word and advertise on this project  -  do not forget to use the sharing tool Indiegogo! and social networks !-  You can  also help us  with your  ideas, advice, encouragement -  you, all those who want  to, can contact us,  meet us, we will keep you informed of progress via Facebook.

story:
"We have experienced all the games and we really couldn't stop playing it. It's really awesome!"
- CEO of company with 2,000 VR Arcades in China

"@VirZOOM Curse your horrible VR bike. I now go to work exhausted every morning because I can't stop playing Lord of Tanks after I wake up!"
- weaksauce12 ‏@weaksauce12

"This is very addictive. I am having to force myself to get off the bike after 25 Kilometers in one session just with bandits game. I am strongly recommending VZ to everyone I know and they can see the results for themselves."
- VirZOOM Investor

The VirZOOM Virtual Reality Game System is an exercise-bike based game controller in combination with continuously evolving VirZOOM Arcade games that make you move.  VirZOOM is currently compatible with PlayStationVR, HTC Vive and Oculus Rift (Headset Sold Separately).  Play VR games. Get fit.

The VirZOOM Bike Controller

The ultimate locomotion solution for VR has arrived

  • Accurate Speed and Direction Detection: The faster you pedal in the real world, the faster you go in VR.
  • Steer by leaning to the left and right
  • Action buttons, triggers and D-pad on handlebars for gameplay (VirZOOM Arcade Included Free)
  • 8 Tension Control Settings and Heart Rate Sensors (Heart Rate & Calorie Tracking)
  • Folds up for easy storage. Weighs under 40 lbs.
  • Wireless Connectivity: Low Energy Bluetooth
  • Compatible with Oculus Rift, HTC Vive and PlayStationVR Headsets. Mobile VR support coming soon!

VirZOOM Arcade

Play exciting VR games and enjoy the health & wellness benefits 

  • Included Free with the VirZOOM Gaming System
  • Continuously evolving content. New levels and games each month.
  • Workout Modes: Online Multiplayer, Quick-play, Timed, Custom, Award Challenge or Hot Seat.
  • Online multiplayer competition, leader-boards and fitness data tracking
  • Ships with 5 VR Exercise games: 
    • Cowboy: Woo eee!  Ride as a horseback riding sheriff out to lasso Wild Pete and his gang of horse thieves.
    • Racecar: Get ready to race.  The setting: the cockpit of a race car with multiple exciting tracks. Make good use of your mirrors and gears to stay ahead. You may be a puppy? What... 
    • Pegasus: Fly a winged Pegasus in a giant beautiful canyon. Don’t forget to eat apples for energy.
    • Tank: Power a T-90 tank in a rugged landscape and battle against other online players and AI bots.
    • Chopper: You're an attack helicopter shooting turrets while avoiding returned fire all while collecting fuel to fly! 

Additional Features

  • PC Gamepad Emulator: Play Existing VR games on your VirZOOM Controller by mapping existing game controls to the VirZOOM Bike.
  • Free Unity SDK: Create your own VirZOOM games. Initially available with Unity 5.4, the SDK provides access to pedaling speed, direction, resistance, user heart rate and 10 gameplay buttons and triggers. 
  • Free Strava Integration and MyVirZOOM fitness profile tracking.Track your distance, heart rate, power output and average speed. 

Press

"I NEVER WANT TO GET OFF THIS BIKE.” 

 

"THE FUTURE OF FITNESS MAY BE A VR EXERCISE BIKE"

 

“THE ONLY  HEALTH & WELLNESS VR PRODUCT OUT THERE RIGHT NOW” 

"THESE GAMES ARE FUN.  AND THEY GET YOU TO EXERCISE. WHAT'S NOT TO LIKE?” 

"Exactly what I wrote down in my notebook: FLYING. I'M F***ING FLYING"

"VIRZOOM PLUS PS4 AND PSVR EQUALS A LITTLE BIT OF MAGIC” 

 

"I CANT TELL WHAT I FEEL LIKE MORE: A KID WHO JUST PLAYED MARIO KART OR AN ADULT WHO HAD HIS A** KICKED IN SOME HIGH OCTANE SPIN CLASS"

The VirZOOM Impact

Healthy Gaming:

  • 97% of teens play computer, web, portable, or console games. 
  • Only 27% of teens meet minimum CDC guidelines for physical exercise.
    • Traditional gaming is often sedentary.  We know... Combining fitness and gaming is not a novel idea.  This has been tried with various levels of success in the past.  What is new?  Introducing virtual reality as a differentiating medium to truly motivate users.  By immersing the user in a virtual world, users can enjoy exhilarating VR games and get a workout without the work.

Fun Fitness:

  • Everyone does it… music, TV, 2D maps – anything to distract themselves from 30 minutes of cardio.  VirZOOM brings you into the action and the games are designed to motivate you to move.  Play through fun arcade games and time flies by.  Let the VR move you. 

    Distribution and Development

    • Shipped Early Access: VirZOOM has shipped early access product to pre-order customers in June. 
    • Retail Launch: We are now gearing up for our commercial launch at the end of October on retail websites as well as in-store locations.  Order now and join us in the active VR movement.
    • Mobile Compatibility:  VirZOOM will offer GearVR and Google DayDream support in early 2017.
    • Exclusive U.S. distribution via COKeM International who manages consumer technology retail channels and distribution. 
    • International orders will begin around the world in the near future.

    The VirZOOM Vision

    • VR Tourism, Competitive Cycling, VR Education and more on every piece of fitness equipment you can imagine.  This is only the beginning...
    • Strategic Partnerships: We plan to have VirZOOM in every home, office and gym on the planet.  VirZOOM is collaborating with fitness and gaming industry leaders to develop high-end fitness VR and healthy active VR for kids in 2017 and 2018. 
    • E-sports: VirZOOM online competition is fierce.  We believe the heightened level of immersion in VR will provide the ultimate e-sports and online multiplayer community.

    Our Story

    Co-founder and CEO Eric Janszen lives in New England, where biking enthusiasts who hope to stay in condition are stuck on stationary bikes indoors in the winter. One cold winter day in the early 1980's he was riding a stationary bike in a basement fitness room. Bored, he closed his eyes and imagined himself pedaling through a 3D wireframe world, a game that challenged him to quickly choose between branching tunnels for points. Wire frame was as much graphics detail as he could imagine for VR, given the limitations of computers and video screens at the time. 

    Not until he met with his friend Eric Malafeew in early 2014 did the vision of VirZOOM start to come together.  In early 2014, Co-founder and CTO Malafeew built a VirZOOM prototype using his daughter's bike, a laptop, and an Oculus DK2. After several experiments, the co-founders were convinced that a great VR motion product could be created. 

    Soon, the two founders realized that games could be made that cause users to react emotionally and physically to VR and that, by designing the games the right way, they could channel those reactions into physical activity to keep users moving. They believe that unlike traditional exercise bikes, VirZOOM games so deeply engage users that they do not even notice that they are exercising. Most of VirZOOM's games can also operate in multiplayer mode, which they believe increases user engagement. With an internet connection, users can play VirZOOM with other VZ players, anywhere in the world. 

    The Team

    From some of the creative minds behind Guitar Hero, Rock Band and Dance Central... VirZOOM: VR That Moves You. Eric Malafeew leads the VirZOOM Development team with many colleagues he worked with at Harmonix Music Systems.  Serial investor and entrepreneur CEO Eric Janszen leads the business team. The VirZOOM family is hard at work creating new games and introducing VirZOOM to technology and VR enthusiasts.    

    Check out the entire VirZOOM Family Here

    Proprietary Technology

    • VR Locomotion Discomfort Solution:  Users can experience locomotion discomfort from moving through large virtual worlds.  A simplified explanation to why this occurs: Your mind believes what is seeing in the VR headset but your body is often stationary using a joystick. This causes issues with your inner ear.  This disconnect between your body and mind can be jarring and cause simulator sickness. 

    VirZOOM solves this problem in two ways:

    • You move proportionately through the virtual world with your pedaling speed and body lean.  This connects your real world body with its interpretation of your virtual body motion.
    • Patent pending software motion controls move you through the virtual world in a proprietary way to limit discomfort. 

    Hardware Specifications

    • 24” X 26” footprint when in use
    • Bike folds up for storage
    • Bike Weighs 39 lbs
    • 8 tension control resistance settings
    • Heartrate sensors
    • Supports player heights from 4'4" to 6'2" comfortably
    • Weight limit: 260 lbs
    • 1 Year Limited Warranty on Frame, 90-day Limited Warranty on components
    • Operates with low noise levels

story:
Would you eat, drink, smoke or do a horse? The answer may surprise you in this fast pased fun game designed for your sophomoric senses.

Eat It, Drink It, Smoke It, Do It - The Game is the ultimate party starter and boredom killer. Grab your buddies and start rolling the die.

Ever since I was a young child I loved to play board games, but somewhere along the way I got bored with board games. I realized that I had grown up, but the board games I loved so much as a child hadn't. After years of throwing noodles at the walls to see what stuck I came up with the idea for a board game that anyone could learn to play in two minutes or less, set up to play in one minute or less and enjoy for a lifetime. Eat It, Drink It, Smoke It, Do It! - The Game came to exist that day.

Every answer to any question in the game's card deck can be answered, "That could be eaten" or "One could potentially drink it" or "That could be smoked (like pork ribs or herring)" or "A person would do that". Even if a player cannot deduce the answer, just saying anything yields that player a twenty-five percent chance of winning the game. Some questions are tricky and may have more than one right answer. Also, hidden in each game playing deck are ten Easter Egg questions, those answers are worth twenty times the normal answers value, but they are very difficult to come by.

Eat It, Drink It, Smoke It, Do It! - The Game

The standard game includes, a one inch color box with instruction book; eight pawns, one deck of three hundred playing cards (expansion packs will be available and the first expansion pack is already-ready-already), and thirty-two award cards plus one die. There is a standard full color board with sixty-four playing squares that have four 'hidden' short cuts to beat your opponent to the end of the game.

The first player to either cross the finish line, or amass four different colored award cards is declared as the winner. 

Sample cards

Well, that's the game in a nutshell; please watch the video to see a live round in play. I am ready to live the dream of bringing a little happiness into the lives of those who like to have fun activities for their dinner parties and social gatherings. The games' name is edgy and the game play is a riot - simply put - if you miss the fun of the board games you grew up with and want that same sense of fun but with a more grown up and contemporary game I encourage you to support this game title. Also, check out the sweet rewards in the rewards section.

The use for the money we raise is simple - $5,000 for the final boxed set design and $5,000 for printing costs. I have the game publisher lined up and ready when we are.

Once funded we can have boxed game sets into your hands within sixty days of our initial production run. Play safe and have a great life!

story:
Remember TILT, Time Zone, DownTown and Magic Mountain?

***UPDATE*** We have 5 councils searching for a new place for us.  With support from Prospect, Charles Sturt, Salisbury, Playford and Port Adelaide we will find a BETTER venue than our current ***

GameRoom Essentials is a retro gaming centre for ALL AGES from 2 to 82 and all in between.  It is family friendly and has a variety of games to suit the young and young at heart.

The Port Adelaide Enfield Council came to us 3 weeks ago with a surprise visit. 
3 Inspectors, 2 for building and 1 for food. Food inspection went well with little problems but the other two were ready to shut me down before they walked through the door.

They kept saying that the building was inadequate and I said that what ever needed to be done, I would organize to get done. They said "Don't bother. Don't waste your time and money" and yes that is in quotes. 

They said it much more than once too. They mentioned that the upper levels had no fire escape and if there was a fire at the stairs, that there was no way down. I totally understand this and spent the following week clearing rooms downstairs which had storage, and moved the things from upstairs (like xbox and console rooms) to the now vacant rooms. Stairs were blocked off with no access.

Thursday 26th February they came back with a letter stating that we had to vacate the premises. We were to cease trade immediately and would have an $8000 fine if we did trade. I said I would fix anything that needed done but they were not interested. 

I had a birthday party for a 10 year old later that day and asked if I could run that as they would not be able to find somewhere at late notice. They refused. I said I would move the machines to the car park so they could play the games. They refused and said that I would have to provide toilets. I said I would hire toilets and they refused again. I asked why and they said "We would find something" yes quoted again. 

They said they would help us out by giving a couple of weeks to get all our stuff out.
They left, my family cried.

We need to move

The costs to move our business will be huge.  We will be looking for financial support as well as manual labour to move everything from our Dr Who pinball to Big Buckhunter to our Space Invaders arcade machine.  With close to 100 machines, it's no small task.

When we find a suitable location, we need fire assesments, council planning, fit out, possibly electrical and plumbing.  Also bond and rent in advance.

We want everyone to enjoy the games of old before they dissappear completely.

We were visited by Autism SA, Playford council with downs syndrome gamers, school OSHC groups, Life FM charities, sporting and social groups, up to 8 birthday party's per week, and our famous lock-in gaming sessions.  The list goes on and we want more to share the joy of retro gaming. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need funds to set up a new shop.  We have all the equipment, just need to setup.

At our currently location, we have cheap rent.  To move to our NEW location, we either need to downsize or pay much more rent.  More rent means larger bond.

To help you turn over your hard earned cash, we would like to offer you our services in exchange.

Gaming sessions, partys, arcade machines and more.

Saturday night sessions are from 7pm to midnight.  Either grab a single voucher, family voucher or a book of 12 vouchers.  Once through the door, there is nothing that you need to pay for 5 hours.  Play 8 ball, Daytona racing, air hockey, pinball, arcades like Ninja Turtles and Pacman.  Also Xbox360, Atari 2600 and other consoles.

Other Ways You Can Help

Many people are not in a position to help financially.  But there are so many other ways that you can help. Trades and services, advice or even just sharing this campaign to your friends. It all helps us immensely.  Thank you.
story_txt:
Remember TILT, Time Zone, DownTown and Magic Mountain?
***UPDATE*** We have 5 councils searching for a new place for us.  With support from Prospect, Charles Sturt, Salisbury, Playford and Port Adelaide we will find a BETTER venue than our current ***
GameRoom Essentials is a retro gaming centre for ALL AGES from 2 to 82 and all in between.  It is family friendly and has a variety of games to suit the young and young at heart.
The Port Adelaide Enfield Council came to us 3 weeks ago with a surprise visit. 3 Inspectors, 2 for building and 1 for food. Food inspection went well with little problems but the other two were ready to shut me down before they walked through the door.
They kept saying that the building was inadequate and I said that what ever needed to be done, I would organize to get done. They said "Don't bother. Don't waste your time and money" and yes that is in quotes. 
They said it much more than once too. They mentioned that the upper levels had no fire escape and if there was a fire at the stairs, that there was no way down. I totally understand this and spent the following week clearing rooms downstairs which had storage, and moved the things from upstairs (like xbox and console rooms) to the now vacant rooms. Stairs were blocked off with no access.
Thursday 26th February they came back with a letter stating that we had to vacate the premises. We were to cease trade immediately and would have an $8000 fine if we did trade. I said I would fix anything that needed done but they were not interested. 
I had a birthday party for a 10 year old later that day and asked if I could run that as they would not be able to find somewhere at late notice. They refused. I said I would move the machines to the car park so they could play the games. They refused and said that I would have to provide toilets. I said I would hire toilets and they refused again. I asked why and they said "We would find something" yes quoted again. 
They said they would help us out by giving a couple of weeks to get all our stuff out.They left, my family cried.

We need to move The costs to move our business will be huge.  We will be looking for financial support as well as manual labour to move everything from our Dr Who pinball to Big Buckhunter to our Space Invaders arcade machine.  With close to 100 machines, it's no small task.
When we find a suitable location, we need fire assesments, council planning, fit out, possibly electrical and plumbing.  Also bond and rent in advance.
We want everyone to enjoy the games of old before they dissappear completely.
We were visited by Autism SA, Playford council with downs syndrome gamers, school OSHC groups, Life FM charities, sporting and social groups, up to 8 birthday party's per week, and our famous lock-in gaming sessions.  The list goes on and we want more to share the joy of retro gaming. 
What We Need & What You Get
 We need funds to set up a new shop.  We have all the equipment, just need to setup.
At our currently location, we have cheap rent.  To move to our NEW location, we either need to downsize or pay much more rent.  More rent means larger bond.
To help you turn over your hard earned cash, we would like to offer you our services in exchange.
Gaming sessions, partys, arcade machines and more.
Saturday night sessions are from 7pm to midnight.  Either grab a single voucher, family voucher or a book of 12 vouchers.  Once through the door, there is nothing that you need to pay for 5 hours.  Play 8 ball, Daytona racing, air hockey, pinball, arcades like Ninja Turtles and Pacman.  Also Xbox360, Atari 2600 and other consoles.
Other Ways You Can Help
 Many people are not in a position to help financially.  But there are so many other ways that you can help. Trades and services, advice or even just sharing this campaign to your friends. It all helps us immensely.  Thank you.

story:
Prosperous, galactic realm of a thousand worlds, ruled by a pantheon of mechanical gods, was brought down to its knees by a sudden and devastating war. 
The gods betrayed each other, civilizations turned to dust, and only the smallest fractions of life could survive the aftermath by turning themselves more machine than man.

Eons later mechanized horrors break into a long lost tomb of a dead god, craving after its forbidden powers, bent on creating a demented pantheon of their own.

You take control of a reanimated guardian; who now must brave the ancient halls of his creator. Learn what caused the death of an universe, enhance yourself with the powers of your defeated enemies, and prevent history from repeating itself!

 

 

 

INTENSE BOSS FIGHTS

  • Avernus has Five extremely challenging boss battles, spread throughout the games Four unique and complex dungeons, which can be completed in any order.
  • Successfully killing one of the great mechanized beasts will reward you with their own special powers, giving you the upper hand against the remaining dangers to come.

 

RESPONSIVE AND CHALLENGING COMBAT

  • Fast-paced and gripping combat, bordering on bullet hell, as you jump from range to melee while trying to weave between swarms of bullets, environmental hazards and puzzles.
  • Master the game as Avernus will put your skills to the test and lets the truly devoted shine.

 

INNATE TELEPORTATION ABILITY

  • The monsters within the tomb are relentless and will give no quarter. To survive, you must learn their patterns, weaknesses and never stop moving.
  • Use your special teleportation ability to slip through and between your enemies; live on your feet or die on your knees. 

 

CHARACTER PROGRESSION VS. PRESERVATION

  • Slaying monsters and finding the tombs ancient secrets will reward you with Power.
  • Energy that can be used for two very important things: permanent upgrades that can make your journey slightly more bearable or burn it to instantly recover from harm.

 

LOVINGLY CRAFTED SPACE-FANTASY WORLD

  • Every single 3D model, animation, particle, texture, sound effect, music track or bit of code in Avernus is done by our own hands.
  • We take great pride in what we do and wish to bring you as beautiful and high quality game as we possibly can.

 

 

Explore the tomb for fragments of history, embed into ancient murals and statues throughout the game. These fragments will shed light upon the fate of the fallen gods. Every piece you discover will further your understanding on how a civilization that once flourished so fell into such ruin.

The storytelling relies entirely on illustrations that uncover the grim story of betrayal, war, and destruction. Find them all to learn the whole truth about the war that tore the universe apart.

 

 

 

 

Although the game will be completed no matter what, with the help of crowdfunding we can have more precious time to concentrate on the development of the game instead of having to focus so much on the day-to-day expenses of our company. This will enable us to create far more depth to the game.

To us games are wonderful works of craftsmanship and the funding raised will not only increase the content within the game, but also help us achieve what we value most: 
sharp and challenging gameplay, strong visual designs and as much polish as we possibly can. By backing Avernus you can support it to reach its full potential while securing your digital copy of the game.

 

 

 

 

Subsolar Entertainment was founded in 2017 and consists of a dedicated bunch of gaming enthusiasts always striving to improve as game developers.

For us, games are an art platform, and we wish to hone each of our pieces to perfection. By combining unique, pleasing or even downright strange visuals with prominent combat mechanics and enemy design, we aspire to create something that can produce sense of wonder and leave a lasting memory in the minds of players. Even though the development process of Avernus has already been very enlightening with many lessons learned, there is still much to discover and improve – and this is exactly why we love the gaming industry!

We have a principle of open communication, and to stay true to it, we will share development material as often as possible from our games to our Discord community.

 

 

 

Join the Community!

story:
"From the forges of Iron Mountain's stronghold, the legend of the best team in the dwarven leagues arises. It's players merge the long tradition of the Blacksmiths' Guild and their folk's passion for their sacred sport. Now it's time to conquer the major tournaments...
A team determined to reach glory in the competition.
A team determined to stop the rival's advance. 
A team ready to defend like a shield.
A team ready to smash like a hammer.
When the referee blows the whistle their charge is unstoppable....
They are the Iron Forgers !!"



All pledge levels will benefit from free shipping worldwide. Any unlocked stretch goals will be added for free (except the Dwarven Golem) to these pledges: 

  • Level 4- Early Team 12
  • Level 5- Team 12
  • Level 6- Early Full Team
  • Level 7- Full Team
  • Level 8- 5 x Full Team

All stretch goals could also be purchased as pledges independetly once unlocked.
















Unlocking the Dwarven Golem stretch goal will allow backers with pledge levels 3, 6, 7 and 8 to choose one of the two available models for deathroller. 

Dara the Slayer, Rozel the Sacred Comissioner and Pride the Cheerleader are available as pledges but are not added for free to current pledges.







Add-Ons can be purchased like any other pledge levels.


Iron Golems is a new project formed by four friends Ivan, Jorge, Lucas and Ricardo. We base ourselves between Valencia (Spain) and Bristol (UK). We are long-time players of role playing games, wargames and fantasy football games. Our love of the latter game has led us to take the step of creating a brand under which make real our player dreams. We firmly believe that you will be pleased with what we have to offer. 

To achieve our goals we rely on three pillars:  

1. Good ideas;

2. Great artists to materialize them;

3. Financing through crowdfunding for direct support and customer's feedback.


We want to start our catalogue with a high quality Fantasy Football dwarven team, the Iron Forgers! Pedro Ramos has sculpted for us what we think is the best dwarven team ever made, capturing a classical spirit and with lot of personality. Production will be made in metal at a 28mm scale. Models will be supplied unpainted. 


To be able to produce this wonderful team we need your support. Not only for the funds needed for the whole process of creating a miniatures team but also to know if our product is welcomed by the wider Fantasy Football community. As we said before, your direct support and feedback are very important to us. We also have a strong believe in the stretch goals system in exchange for that support so our backers can be well rewarded for their collaboration.


Although we are seasoned adventurers and avid fantasy football players this is our first outing into the crowdfunding world as team owners. However, we are using experienced partners in this endeavour who have produced fantasy football teams for some of the top providers currently in the scene. Based on that and the advanced state of production of the Iron Forgers' miniatures we are confident we can deliver this project as presented in this crowdfunding campaign.

We are familiar with the delays that can unexpectedly pop up, whether they be due to production, shipping or customs. The estimated delivery date for this project is November 2015, but please keep in mind that this is an informed guess. Also note that due to logistical restrictions in different regions, some backers may receive their pledge rewards before others. We will be doing our utmost to avoid these situations.


To achieve the campaign objectives is very important to get a good diffusion of the project. You can help us to reach more would-be backers by sharing the campaign and our publications at social networks and with the Indiegogo's sharing tools.


We would like to thank all the people who have helped us with this project. The people who believe in us and are at hand when we need them.

Our backers: for trusting and helping us bring this team to live. 

Pedro Ramos: for sculpting this amazing team, and putting pen and paper together to materialize our crazy ideas.

Pedro Asensio: for painting the team with such a master skill.

Jorge Ruiz: for sharing with us all his knowledge of this miniatures world.

Álvaro Ramirez: for the best illustration and logo of a fantasy football team ever made.

Javier Donate & Víctor J. Buforn: for producing a campaign video beyond our dreams.

The wide Fantasy Football Community: for keeping this great game alive and for its constant interest in this project and support. Special thanks to all the forums that gave us a space to share our project and to Blood Bowl Blog and to FF Fields.

and last but not least to our families: for all the love and support they give us, especially during the difficult times.


  

Except where otherwise noted, content on this project is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license.

story:
* We have lauched a Flexible Funding Campaign, and we are going to release the game in any case on the Q1 2014.

A stealth game with a fantasy setting that puts you in the shoes of a funny little knight that grapples with a dreadful evil master: available for PC, Mac, iOS devices and Android!

 


DevBlog | Facebook | Youtube


Coward Knight: A Stealth Adventure is inspired by Metal Gear Solid: Special Missions, The Legend of Zelda and Ghost’n Goblins. The goal of the game is to complete all the 48 levels without being seen by the dreadful enemies, avoiding traps, collecting rupees and completing every level in the shortest possible time! You can also compare your scores with those of other players, to see who has the best one!

Click here to see the complete gallery


Look a little gameplay video!!!


It was a dark and stormy night… ehm… no, that’s another story! In a kingdom where princesses are regularly kidnapped by evil masters, heroes begin to run out. On an unlucky day the King’s daughter is kidnapped too! The King spends many days trying to find a young and strong man who is able to rescue her, but he only finds a little knight named Coward, with neither experience nor physical prowess! The King gives him two choices: rescue his daughter and get a huge reward or die! So, Coward looks at the tower, clenches his teeth and gets ready for his new adventure! Will he finally become a true Hero?

In Coward Knight you can move silently or you can run, it’s up to you! If you run you will make noise and enemies could hear you. Instead, if you walk you can sneak silently through the level!

   
                            Walk                                                                Run!

 Our little hero can hit and defeat the guards, but be careful! He is smaller and more defenceless then those who keep him apart from his beloved, so you should use your offensive capability with intelligence and strategy.

In Coward Knight you can unlock several goals in every level! For example, you can collect every rupee of every level, improve your score, complete the levels unseen and kill all the guards unheard!


The levels are full of dreadful traps, like thorns, noisy worms, dangerous axes and many other insidious dangers.

Axes!

Bombs!

Spikes!

In the dangerous levels, besides death traps, you can find magic power-ups too that improve some skills, for example speed, or give you other skills, like invisibility.

   

Besides traps, there are a lot of enemies that will try their best to stop you!


Coward

This little warrior has never distinguished himself as a courageous and strong knight. Unfortunately all the other knights have already been defeated by the evil master, so he has no option but to fight. In spite of his slight build, he is very skilful in the use of the sword, but he finds it difficult to face his enemies openly: you will better attack them in the rear!


Final Boss

 This mysterious and terrible monster is greedy for young princesses, he loves to eat them with onions and carrots! He fears nothing and he has faced all the knights the King sent him. He has many aces in his sleeve and he feels invincible at the top of his tower. Will Coward snatch the princess from his clutches?


Princess

As in every fairy tale, the princess is beautiful like a goddess and bewitches everyone who looks at her. Unfortunately she has attracted the attention of the evil master too, who wants to prepare a big banquet with the princess as the main dish....


Guards

These fearful muscle mountains are everywhere through the levels, and they will try to stop you from reaching the beloved Princess! Coward is very skilful in the use of the sword and with technique he can defeat them! But remember, the bigger they are, the louder they fall.


Flying Eyes

These flying eyes cannot move, but they never take their eyes off! They cannot attack you, but be careful, because if they see you, they will attract every nearby guard!


Jellyfish

These disgusting creatures float everywhere through the levels. The worse thing is that, thanks to their shape, they can see 360 degrees! You should pay attention and avoid being too close to them!


Banshee

Hey, you look like you’ve seen a ghost! Well, there are also ghosts that terrify our little spineless warrior with their terrible screaming!


Snail

These funny creatures wander about the levels carrying weak lights. There are some levels without any light, so you will be very lucky if you find one of these snails!


Worms

What a disgusting creatures! These revolting one-eyed invertebrates are harmless, but if you trample on them, they will make loud noises and everyone around you will notice you! Be careful!





The setting of Coward Knight is a castle; there are 4 worlds, each of them is made up of 12 levels, with a total of 48 levels.

Undergrounds


Tavern


Gardens


Castle







Here you can hear 2 tracks of the game’s soundtrack, available with the Count (and higher) reward.



The soundtrack has been entirely recorded at Sun Keeper Studio. Visit the website: http://www.sunkeeperstudio.com/

Studio Leaves is a small independent group of people who joined their experiences in order to improve the video game setting in the south of Italy, our small Silicon Valley 2.0. After hours spent playing Metal Gear Solid and The Legend of Zelda, we came up with the idea of Coward Knight. Even if the programming is self-funded, we need your help in order to pay for other key collaborators, to buy licences and to put the finishing touches to “Coward Knight: A Stealth Adventure”: thus you will be 100% satisfied with our game. Therefore we have chosen IndieGoGo to see our game grow and thrive, as we thought since the beginning!





Gaetano Lenoci
Gameplay, Programmer

I have been working for several years with other companies as a Game Programmer, now I'm working with our own company to realise our game! I’m the core programmer of Coward Knight and I’m dealing with the main features of the game too. While working on this project, I have been influenced by my favorite games: Shenmue, Castlevania: Symphony of the Night and Broken Sword.
Marco Claudio
Level Design, Programmer

I have been working for two years in a software house where I realised a little mobile game and an online card game. I deal with the creation of challenging and amusing levels. My favourite games are: Metal Gear Solid saga, Yakuza saga and Okami.
Gameras Giuseppe Albergo
3D Graphics

I’m the artist of the team. Previously I have been working on “Yes I can”, available on the Apple Store and Google Play. I deal with the 2D and 3D graphics of Coward Knight. My favourite games are The Elder Scroll V: Skyrim and Dark Souls. Click on thumbnails to see more of my work...
Fabio Minenna
Music and Sound Effects

Music Producer at Sun Keeper Studio and guitarist of the band “Vinterblot”. I deal with the creation of atmospheric and absorbing soundtracks that can delight and make the gaming experience gripping. My favourite games are: World of Warcraft, Neverwinter Nights e TES V: Skyrim.
